subject: MSUD102 online lecture link
snippet: Dear students, Kindly join the online lecture of MSUD102 (Engineering Mathematics II) from 02.50 pm onwards on 04th April, Saturday (Tomorrow), 2025 through the following link of Microsoft teams. https
content:
Dear students,

Kindly join the online lecture of MSUD102 (Engineering Mathematics II)
from *02.50
pm onwards *on *04th April, Saturday (Tomorrow), 2025* through the
following link of Microsoft teams.

https://teams.microsoft.com/l/meetup-join/19%3ameeting_NTVmZmNlNzgtOTJiMy00NDU0LWJmNWEtZDI5MTRhY2I1MDY2%40thread.v2/0?context=%7b%22Tid%22%3a%228dbd2884-120c-413b-80b2-1117dd3469a4%22%2c%22Oid%22%3a%223ed35552-5e3c-4b13-916a-3622e7a12052%22%7d

This lecture will cover the *improper integral* topic of unit 5 (Multiple
Integrals and Improper Integrals).

Kindly join the lecture with your name as id number and join it before 5
minutes of the schedule.

Thank you.

Subject: *Important* - NCIIPC-AICTE Pentathon 2025 - Registration is now
live - Deadline 4th April 2025 by 11.59 PM
To: <bankimpatel.dcs@charusat.ac.in>


Dear Sir/Madam,

I hope you are doing well.

This is with reference to cited subject regarding the registration of the
NCIIPC-AICTE Pentathon 2025.

In this regard, we wish to inform you that the registration for the
Hackathon is now open. Please register now at:

* Click here to Register:  * * https://pentathon2025.in/ *
<http://elink.aicte-india.org/vtrack?clientid=183745&ul=A1YIBw4fAhkBUg1aUA9GBUFUDxxXARVyVl1UERYRWBUcVgFPWghPTUxT&ml=BlEBBgkfAhlWAlJN&sl=cx1ySm0wTjYuZx9UVQtYDxtQClFHB0tbW1FcAk0NSwZOBw==&pp=0&ga=utm_source%3DNetcore%26utm_campaign%3DPentathon%2B2025%26utm_medium%3DEmail%26utm_content%3D&fl=WRVFRktZHUoTVg1FWBZeC1sDUwAGTA9cGg==&ext=>


To know more about the hackathon, Click here:
https://mic.gov.in/pentathon2025/
<http://elink.aicte-india.org/vtrack?clientid=183745&ul=A1YIBw4fAhkBUg1aUA9GBUFUDxxXARVyVl1UERYRWBUcVgFPWghPTUxT&ml=BlEBBgkfAhlWAlFN&sl=cx1ySm0wTjYuZx9UVQtYDxtQClFHB0tbW1FcAk0NSwZOBw==&pp=0&ga=utm_source%3DNetcore%26utm_campaign%3DPentathon%2B2025%26utm_medium%3DEmail%26utm_content%3D&fl=WRVFRktZHUoOWgAfXg1ASlxfTEJWDBJTQV1aDVFSC1Qd&ext=>


* Event Details:  *

* Name of the Event  *

NCIIPC Pentathon CTF

* Homepage URL *

http://mic.gov.in/pentathon2025
<http://elink.aicte-india.org/vtrack?clientid=183745&ul=A1YIBw4fAhkBUg1aUA9GBUFUDxxXARVyVl1UERYRWBUcVgFPWghPTUxT&ml=BlEBBgkfAhlWAlBN&sl=cx1ySm0wTjYuZx9UVQtYDxtQClFHB0tbW1FcAk0NSwZOBw==&pp=0&ga=utm_source%3DNetcore%26utm_campaign%3DPentathon%2B2025%26utm_medium%3DEmail%26utm_content%3D&fl=WRVFRgJMHQgKUE1WVhQYDVseE1ddFgdGXVpbUVNQDA==&ext=>

* Registration URL *

https://pentathon2025.in
<http://elink.aicte-india.org/vtrack?clientid=183745&ul=A1YIBw4fAhkBUg1aUA9GBUFUDxxXARVyVl1UERYRWBUcVgFPWghPTUxT&ml=BlEBBgkfAhlWAlJN&sl=cx1ySm0wTjYuZx9UVQtYDxtQClFHB0tbW1FcAk0NSwZOBw==&pp=0&ga=utm_source%3DNetcore%26utm_campaign%3DPentathon%2B2025%26utm_medium%3DEmail%26utm_content%3D&fl=WRVFRktZHUoTVg1FWBZeC1sDUwAGTA9cGg==&ext=>

* Start Date *

05th April 2025, 12:00 AM (Midnight)

* End Date *

06th April 2025, 11:59 PM (Midnight)

* Duration *

48 Hours

* Rules for the hackathon *

https://pentathon2025.in/rules
<http://elink.aicte-india.org/vtrack?clientid=183745&ul=A1YIBw4fAhkBUg1aUA9GBUFUDxxXARVyVl1UERYRWBUcVgFPWghPTUxT&ml=BlEBBgkfAhlWAldN&sl=cx1ySm0wTjYuZx9UVQtYDxtQClFHB0tbW1FcAk0NSwZOBw==&pp=0&ga=utm_source%3DNetcore%26utm_campaign%3DPentathon%2B2025%26utm_medium%3DEmail%26utm_content%3D&fl=WRVFRktZHUoTVg1FWBZeC1sDUwAGTA9cGkdADwYR&ext=>
 (attached as well)

* CTF Timeline   *

* CTF Starts (1st Wave) *

05th April 2025,12:00 AM (Midnight)

* 2nd Wave of Challenges *

05th April 2025, 12:00 PM (Afternoon)

* 3rd Wave of Challenges *

06th April 2025, 12:00 AM (Midnight)

* 4th Wave of Challenges *

06th April 2025, 12:00 PM (Afternoon)

* End of CTF *

06th April 2025, 11:59 PM (Midnight)

* Note: *

   1. The  * team leader along with team members need to
   individually register for the hackathon * . Please circulate the above
   email with your team members to individually register for the hackathon


   2. The  * deadline to submit the registration closes on 4th April 2025
   at 11.59 PM * .


   3. The  * stage 1  * of the NCIIPC-AICTE Pentathon 2025  * starts on 5th
   April 2025 (12:00 AM) till 6th April 2025 (11.59 PM) (48 Hours Non-stop
   hackathon) *


   4. * Flag Sharing Prohibited * : Sharing flags or any solution details
   with other participants or outsiders is strictly prohibited. Participants
   should not collaborate on solving challenges or share answers in any form.


   5. * Respect Towards Participants and Organizers * : All participants
   are expected to treat each other and the organizers with respect and
   professionalism. Any form of harassment, discrimination, or disrespectful
   behavior will not be tolerated.  * No spamming in discord channel.  *


   6. The  * team members or individual participation will be from the
   students of the HEI's (pursuing). * No faculty or mentors will be part
   of the team.


   7. * Challenges Released in Waves * : Challenges will be released in
   waves, and participants are advised to regularly check the notices provided
   on the CTF platform for updates regarding the release schedule and details
   of each wave.


   8. * Unlocking Challenges * : Some challenges may require participants
   to solve specific challenges or a series of challenges to unlock subsequent
   ones. This approach promotes progression and guarantees that participants
   engage with a diverse range of tasks throughout the competition.

For any queries, please use the discord channel or email to us at
pentathon@aicte-india.org
 or call at 011-29581239/1240/1241/1223

subject:
New announcement: "Dear Students,

I hope this email finds‚Ä¶"
snippet: Notification settings Communicative English Depstar CE -1 New announcement Dear Students, I hope this email finds you well. We are excited to announce that CHARUSAT University has launched BA English
content:
Notification settings  
<https://accounts.google.com/AccountChooser?continue=https://classroom.google.com/s?email%3D24dce084@charusat.edu.in&Email=24dce084@charusat.edu.in>
Communicative English Depstar CE -1  
<https://accounts.google.com/AccountChooser?continue=https://classroom.google.com/c/NzAxODYxODkwNTEx?email%3D24dce084@charusat.edu.in&Email=24dce084@charusat.edu.in>
New announcement

Dear Students,

I hope this email finds you well.

We are excited to announce that CHARUSAT University has launched BA English  
and BLIS programs from the academic year 2025-2026. Industry-oriented BA  
English program is designed to provide students with an enriching  
experience in the world of English literature and language and Literature.

If someone in your circle or relation is passionate about exploring English  
literature, enhancing language skills, or looking to build a promising  
career in this field, this program offers a perfect opportunity.

Who should consider this BA English program?
If someone you know has recently passed or appeared for the 12th exam in  
any stream - Arts, Commerce, or Science and is eager to embark on an  
academic journey through the lens of English studies, we encourage you to  
explore the benefits of enrolling in our BA English program to the  
potential candidate.

Career Opportunities:
A degree in BA English opens up numerous career avenues, such as:

    - Content Writing
    - Journalism & Media
    - Teaching & Education
    - Translation & Interpretation
    - Public Relations & Corporate Communication
    - Publishing & Editing
    - Advertising & Marketing
    - Corporate Training & Development
    - Entrepreneurship
    - Soft Skills Trainer
    - Competitive Exam Coaching
    - IELTS trainers and many more

Why choose CHARUSAT for your BA English degree?
At CHARUSAT, under the Faculty of Humanities, we are committed to providing  
an education that not only develops linguistic proficiency but also  
sharpens critical thinking, creativity, and communication skills which are  
highly valued in today‚Äôs job market. Our faculty, modern infrastructure,  
and vibrant campus environment will ensure that students receive a  
well-rounded and rewarding experience.

Where/How to contact for Admission?
If you know any aspirant who is looking for the right institute to pursue  
their passion for English, please share this information with them. For  
admission enquiries, student aspirants may do the following:

For admission visit to:

https://admission.charusat.ac.in/Registration.aspx

For admission Enquiry, Click on the given link and fill in the details. We  
will reach out to you.


Link: https://forms.gle/hNkr58XZSKKci35w5

For direct interaction, contact at:

+91 98793 34259

Thank you for your kindness and for spreading the word!

With Regards,
Pranjal Bhatt
See details  
<https://accounts.google.com/AccountChooser?continue=https://classroom.google.com/c/NzAxODYxODkwNTEx/p/NzUzNDgyNDcxMjYw?email%3D24dce084@charusat.edu.in&Email=24dce084@charusat.edu.in>
Posted on 10:10 AM, Apr 3 (GMT+05:30) by Pranjal Bhatt

Google LLC 1600 Amphitheatre Parkway, Mountain View, CA 94043 USA

email notifications from Google Classroom. If you don't want to receive  
emails like this, you can unsubscribe or change your settings  
<https://accounts.google.com/AccountChooser?continue=https://classroom.google.com/s?email%3D24dce084@charusat.edu.in&Email=24dce084@charusat.edu.in>.

subject: Fwd: Request to Share BA English and BLIS Program Information
snippet: Dear all Please share the information in your circle, also guide the students who are looking for a future ready course and programme in the field of Humanities.Contact me in case of inquiry for the BA
content:
Dear all

Please share the information in your circle, also guide the students who
are looking for a future ready course and programme in the field of
Humanities.Contact me in case of inquiry for the B.A. English programme and
Library Science course. Refer to the attached flyers for more details.

Looking forward to your quick and kindly support.

Regards
Ms. Jayshree Mehta

---------- Forwarded message ---------
From: Kaushik Trivedi <kaushiktrivedi.cs@charusat.ac.in>
Date: Wed, Apr 2, 2025, 16:36
Subject: Request to Share BA English and BLIS Program Information
To: Vijay Makwana <vijaymakwana.cs@charusat.ac.in>, kinjal bhatia <
kinjalbhatia.cs@charusat.ac.in>, DR. HIREN PATEL <
hirenpatel.cs@charusat.ac.in>, Bharati Kaknani <
bharatikaknani.cs@charusat.ac.in>, Pranjal Bhatt <
pranjalbhatt.cs@charusat.ac.in>, Celine Davla <celinedavla.cs@charusat.ac.in>,
Priyanka Patel <priyankapatel.cs@charusat.ac.in>, vikas raval <
vikasraval.cs@charusat.ac.in>, Jayshree Mehta <
jayshreemehta.cs@charusat.ac.in>, Pradipsinh Zala <
pradipzala.cs@charusat.ac.in>, Robert Parmar <robertparmar.cs@charusat.ac.in
>
Cc: Bhaskar Pandya <bhaskarpandya.cs@charusat.ac.in>


Dear Faculty Members,

As instructed by Bhaskar Sir during today‚Äôs meeting, we would like to
request your assistance in sharing the details of the BA English and BLIS
programs with the students you have taught in the past or are currently
teaching.

Our current students, past students and network can serve as a bridge to
spread the word about the program within their personal circles and
networks. Their recommendations and word of mouth can be a powerful tool in
encouraging prospective students to apply. If you could kindly encourage
them to share the details of the program with friends, family, or
acquaintances who may be interested, it would greatly contribute to the
programs' growth.

Please make sure to send the provided email along with all the attachments
of BA English and BLIS program to all Google Classrooms, Teams, Email
groups, and WhatsApp groups where you are /have been involved in teaching.
It is important that there is no confusion in completing this task, and the
information should be shared widely.

Once you have shared the email, kindly update Bhaskar Sir and me via email,
including the list of groups to whom you have sent the information. Give
this task a priority and complete it by 12:00 pm tomorrow.

*Your efforts and support in the admission process will be noted and
appreciated!*

With regards,

Kaushik Trivedi

*............................*

Subject: A request to share the word-of-mouth regarding BA English and BLIS
at CHARUSAT University

Dear Students,

I hope this email finds you well.

We are excited to announce that *CHARUSAT* University has launched *BA
English and BLIS programs from the academic year 2025-2026. *
Industry-oriented BA English program is designed to provide students with
an enriching experience in the world of *English literature and language
and Literature.* *If someone in your circle or relation is passionate about
exploring English literature, enhancing language skills, or looking to
build a promising career in this field, this program offers a perfect
opportunity.*

*Who should consider this BA English program?*

If someone you know has recently passed or appeared for the *12th exam in
any stream - Arts, Commerce, or Science* and is eager to embark on an
academic journey through the lens of English studies, we encourage you to
explore the benefits of enrolling in our BA English program to the
potential candidate.

*Career Opportunities:*

A degree in BA English opens up numerous career avenues, such as:

   - Content Writing
   - Journalism & Media
   - Teaching & Education
   - Translation & Interpretation
   - Public Relations & Corporate Communication
   - Publishing & Editing
   - Advertising & Marketing
   - Corporate Training & Development
   - Entrepreneurship
   - Soft Skills Trainer
   - Competitive Exam Coaching
   - IELTS trainers and many more

*Why choose CHARUSAT for your BA English degree?*

At CHARUSAT, under the *Faculty of Humanities*, we are committed to
providing an education that not only develops linguistic proficiency but
also sharpens critical thinking, creativity, and communication skills which
are highly valued in today‚Äôs job market. Our faculty, modern
infrastructure, and vibrant campus environment will ensure that students
receive a well-rounded and rewarding experience.

*Where/How to contact for Admission?*

*If you know any aspirant who is looking for the right institute to pursue
their passion for English, please share this information with them. For
admission enquiries, student aspirants may do the following:*

For admission visit to:

https://admission.charusat.ac.in/Registration.aspx



For admission Enquiry, Scan QR code or Click on the given link and fill in
the details. We will reach out to you.
[image: IMG-20250127-WA0011 (1).jpg]



Link: https://forms.gle/hNkr58XZSKKci35w5

For direct interaction, contact at:

+91 98793 34259


Thank you for your kindness and for spreading the word!

With Regards,

.............................

--

subject: Recruitment For Nakshatra Aerospace
snippet: Hello everyone! üöÄ Nakshatra Aerospace is an Official Club under CSPIT, Electronics & Communication and Mechanical Department As a Member of Nakshatra Aerospace we tend to perform research and
content:
*Hello everyone! üöÄ*

Nakshatra Aerospace is an Official Club under CSPIT, Electronics &
Communication and Mechanical Department

As a Member of Nakshatra Aerospace we tend to perform research and
development on the Propulsion Systems, Design, Avionics, Recovery and
Material Science

*NOTE* :
DEADLINE FOR REGISTRATION ARE EXTENDED TILL 7th April 2025


*Why Join Us?*

Being part of Nakshatra Aerospace means you‚Äôll engage in hands-on projects,
collaborate with like-minded peers, and prepare for interviews with
industry leaders. Plus, it‚Äôs a fantastic way to enhance your resume!
Don‚Äôt miss out on this incredible opportunity to soar high with Nakshatra
Aerospace! üåå

Looking forward to seeing your applications!

https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSeqw-dwcGPZxyFV196urPrrAdpQljpJn72pVQy4-0QQjfVExQ/viewform?usp=header


For further Queries you can Contact:

nakshatraaerospaceclub@gmail.com

content:
Dear students,

Due to Parents meeting, the quiz for Engineering Physics‚Äî2 subject is put
back with the same link.
The new time is given below.

*Date:* 29/03/2025

*Day:* Saturday

*Time:* 6:00 PM to 6:30 PM

*Mode:* Online (Google Form)

*Total Marks:* 25 MCQs
The link will start working sharply at 6:00 PM.

Dr. Manan N Shah

content:
Dear Students,


Due to a technical error, we are currently unable to proceed with the quiz.
We apologize for the inconvenience and will reschedule it for another day.
Further details will be shared via email.

subject: Submission Deadline for Programming with C++ (CEUC102) CIE2
snippet: Dear Students, Please find attached the Programming with C++ (CEUC102) CIE2 assignment. The submission consists of two parts, and you must complete both as per the instructions in the attached file:
content:
Dear Students,

Please find attached the *Programming with C++ (CEUC102) CIE2* assignment.
The submission consists of *two parts*, and you must complete both as per
the instructions in the attached file:

   1.

   *Concept Map Design*
   2.

   *Practical Implementation* .

The last date for submission is *2nd April 2025*. Ensure that you complete
both parts on time.


Google form Link: *https://forms.gle/TjBFvhsNHYUWqMhv9
<https://forms.gle/TjBFvhsNHYUWqMhv9>*

-- 
*Regards:*
Mr. Pravin Jadav,
Assistant Professor,
Department of Computer Engineering,
Devang Patel Institute of Advance Technology and Research (DEPSTAR),
Charotar University of Science and Technology (CHARUSAT),
 AT: Changa, Ta:Petlad, Dist:Anand, Gujarat.

--

subject: Exciting Academic Summer/ Winter Internship Opportunity ‚Äì Apply Now!
snippet: Welcome to LaunchED Global! Internship Program Details Dear CHARUSAT UNIVERSITY Student, We warmly invite you to participate in the Launched Global Collaboration with the KSHITIJ IIT KHARAGPUR
content:
Welcome to LaunchED Global!

Internship Program Details
Dear CHARUSAT UNIVERSITY Student,

We warmly invite you to participate in the *Launched Global*
<http://launchedglobal.in/> Collaboration with the *KSHITIJ IIT
KHARAGPUR* Industrial
Learning and Certification Program.
*Learn more about you, please fill out the application form.*Submit Now
<https://forms.gle/Bqo98gcFeFsBogTM7>

IMPORTANT ANNOUNCEMENT: Once you fill out the form, kindly share it with
your friends and ensure that everyone fills it out.

*Join Our Official WhatsApp Group For More Information:*
Join WhatsApp Group <https://chat.whatsapp.com/LiAZB7NDBFa4hVXStKAoFc>Preferred
Slots: APRIL TO JULY*FIND THE BELOW ATTACHMENTS FOR REFERENCE*

*First Month: *Industrial training has been designed in the form of Live
lectures along with living mentorship from industry professionals. (Login
credentials will be provided to students after registration).

*Second Month:* Internship with live mentorship for projects from
professionals. The LIVE INDUSTRY PROJECT will give students experience in
solving real-world problems.
*PROJECTS :*

*Project 1* 10 individual projects are assigned to each intern, which they
must complete with their mentor.

*Project 2 (Capstone Project):* It's a group project assigned to 15
interns. For each intern particular work will be assigned to them, and they
have to work on it.
(Essential data and materials required for the project will be provided by
the company side itself)
*Here are two types of Classes we are providing:*

*1.Blended Program/Recorded classes:* You will receive recorded sessions,
whatever doubts you have you can clear them in live doubt-clearing sessions
organized every weekend.

*2.Mentor-led/Live classes* You will have live Zoom classes at 6:30 PM 2 to
3 days a week. You will get your recorded sessions as well
You will have access to the LMS(Learning Management System) portal for 6
months.
*Program Highlights:*

   - India's First - offering programs with low-code and no-code tools,
   with a promise of 100% outcome-driven results
   - Certifications from *LaunchEd - KSHITIJ IIT KGP* verified through
   Wipro Dice ID
   - Learn from tech-giant mentors and industry leaders
   - Cutting-edge curriculum including generative AI and prompt engineering
   - Exclusive masterclasses with students, founders, and CXos from top
   global companies
   - Personalized instructors for comprehensive guidance from start to
   finish

*Secure your spot now to pave the way for a successful career journey with
LaunchED Academy!*

Your Success Awaits !

Don't miss this chance to advance your career with our exclusive Upskilling
Program. Limited slots available ‚Äì *apply now!*

*ÔøΩÔøΩÔøΩÔøΩÔøΩÔøΩ Take the first step with LaunchED Global!
<http://launchedglobal.in/>*

content:
Dear Students,

As responsible individuals in your respective roles, I expect you to
understand your responsibilities. I have not received any response
regarding the deadline, nor have I received the reports as per the required
format.

You Have to ensure that all reports are submitted by tomorrow, on or
before *2:20
PM*, without fail.

Thank You.
*with Regards,*
*Binal S. Kaka*
*Assistant Professor *
*Department of Computer Engineering*
*Devang Patel Institute of Advance Technology and Research*

subject: Recruitment For Nakshatra Aerospace
snippet: Hello everyone! üöÄ Nakshatra Aerospace is an Official Club under CSPIT, Electronics & Communication and Mechanical Department As a Member of Nakshatra Aerospace we tend to perform research and
content:
*Hello everyone! üöÄ*

Nakshatra Aerospace is an Official Club under CSPIT, Electronics &
Communication and Mechanical Department

As a Member of Nakshatra Aerospace we tend to perform research and
development on the Propulsion Systems, Design, Avionics, Recovery and
Material Science

We're thrilled to announce an exciting opportunity for all B.Tech students!
The Nakshatra Aerospace Club is officially recruiting new members, and we
want YOU to be a part of this Stellar journey into the world of Aerospace
innovation!


*Why Join Us?*

Being part of Nakshatra Aerospace means you‚Äôll engage in hands-on projects,
collaborate with like-minded peers, and prepare for interviews with
industry leaders. Plus, it‚Äôs a fantastic way to enhance your resume!
Don‚Äôt miss out on this incredible opportunity to soar high with Nakshatra
Aerospace! üåå

Looking forward to seeing your applications!


https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSdpMxTKdA4gNtlLeGDoM0W5D6Ch-tKuZQnDJlMonw97xbJpGQ/viewform

For further Queries you can Contact:

nakshatraaerospaceclub@gmail.com

Hitarth Chauhan(24ME006)
+91 7405312628
Vishwesh Patel(24ME057)
+91 9726798232

subject: Re: Important: Online Quiz Scheduled on March 29th ‚Äì Instructions Inside
snippet: The syllabus of this is the same as in the first internal examination. On Tue, Mar 25, 2025 at 12:24 PM Dr. Bina Patel <binapatel.maths@charusat.ac.in> wrote: Dear Students, The first online quiz
content:
The syllabus of this is the same as in the first internal examination.

On Tue, Mar 25, 2025 at 12:24‚ÄØPM Dr. Bina Patel <
binapatel.maths@charusat.ac.in> wrote:

> *Dear Students,*
>
> The first online quiz is scheduled for *March 29th from 11:20 to 11:30 AM*.
> Please keep the following points in mind:
>
>    1.
>
>    The quiz consists of *5 MCQs* and must be completed within *10 minutes*
>    .
>    2.
>
>    Incorrect *ID inputs* will not be considered and will result in *zero
>    marks*.
>    3.
>
>    Ensure you are in a *stable network environment*. Any *network or
>    technical issues will not be considered*.
>    4.
>
>    The *Google Form link* will be sent to you via email on the day of the
>    quiz.
>    5.
>
>    Login is allowed *only* using your *Charusat email ID*.
>    6.
>
>    For any queries, please write an email.
>
> Best regards,
> *Dr. Bina Patel*

subject: Important: Online Quiz Scheduled on March 29th ‚Äì Instructions Inside
snippet: Dear Students, The first online quiz is scheduled for March 29th from 11:20 to 11:30 AM. Please keep the following points in mind: The quiz consists of 5 MCQs and must be completed within 10 minutes.
content:
*Dear Students,*

The first online quiz is scheduled for *March 29th from 11:20 to 11:30 AM*.
Please keep the following points in mind:

   1.

   The quiz consists of *5 MCQs* and must be completed within *10 minutes*.
   2.

   Incorrect *ID inputs* will not be considered and will result in *zero
   marks*.
   3.

   Ensure you are in a *stable network environment*. Any *network or
   technical issues will not be considered*.
   4.

   The *Google Form link* will be sent to you via email on the day of the
   quiz.
   5.

   Login is allowed *only* using your *Charusat email ID*.
   6.

   For any queries, please write an email.

Best regards,
*Dr. Bina Patel*
*Assistant Professor*
*Department of Mathematical Sciences *
*PDPIAS, CHARUSAT, Changa-388421*
*Accredited Grade A+ by NAAC*

*Mob. No: **+91-9427777856  *

subject: Reminder: HSUS109 DRAMATICS | LIBERAL ARTS 2025
snippet: Dear Students, Hope you are all excited for the HSUS109 Dramatics workshop! The course will be conducted in Workshop Mode from March 25 to March 28, 2025 (9:10 AM ‚Äì 4:30 PM) at CHARUSAT Campus, Changa.
content:
Dear Students,

Hope you are all excited for the *HSUS109 Dramatics* workshop!

The course will be conducted in *Workshop Mode* from *March 25 to March 28,
2025 (9:10 AM ‚Äì 4:30 PM)* at *CHARUSAT Campus, Changa*. Your *Internal and
External Evaluations* will also take place during these four days.

üìç *Venue Details:*


*On Day 1 (09:10 AM ‚Äì 11:10 AM), there will be a General Briefing Session
for all students in the IIIM Building, Room No. 214.*
Attendance is mandatory for all participants. After that and for the
remaining three days, sessions will be conducted in the DEPSTAR building.
Room allocations are as follows:

Room No. 123 ‚Äì Group A (Students of CSPIT EE, IT, EC, ME, CSE)
Room No. 124 ‚Äì Group B (Students of IIIM, PDPIAS and CSPIT CE)

Room No. 125 ‚Äì Group C (Students of DEPSTAR, RPCP, CMPICA)




Please ensure you are seated in your assigned room for each session.

üìå *Important Instructions:*

   -

   *100% Attendance is Compulsory.*
   -

   Carry your *Identity Card* at all times.
   -

   Wear comfortable clothes

For *regular updates*, please join the *Google Classroom* using this
link: click
here <https://classroom.google.com/c/NzUyNDQxMzg3MTE3?cjc=23tria7>

It is *mandatory* to complete all *assignments, tasks, activities, and the
viva* during these four days. Failure to do so may result in a *backlog*.

For any queries, feel free to contact:
üìû *Ms. Celine Davla - 9737517553*

Looking forward to an engaging and exciting workshop!

Regards,

-- 
*Ms. Celine Davla*
*Assistant Professor*
*HSS Department*
*Indukaka Ipcowala Institute of Management*
*CHARUSAT*
*Mo. 9737517553*

--

subject: Online Quiz 1 Notification for Engineering Physics - 2 (Experiments 5 to 9)
snippet: Dear First-Year Students, The Department of Physical Sciences is conducting an online quiz for Engineering Physics - 2, covering Experiments 5 to 9. Please find the details below: Date: 29/03/2025 Day:
content:
Dear First-Year Students,

The Department of Physical Sciences is conducting an online quiz for
Engineering Physics - 2, covering Experiments 5 to 9. Please find the
details below:

*Date:* 29/03/2025

*Day:* Saturday

*Time:* 4:00 PM to 4:30 PM

*Mode:* Online (Google Form)

*Total Marks:* 25 MCQs

*Evaluation Component:* Continuous Assessment

The Google Form link for the quiz will be shared on the day of the exam. I
just wanted to let you know that *no excuses related to internet*
connectivity issues will be entertained. Just so you know, this quiz is
part of your *continuous evaluation*, and failing to attempt it will
significantly impact your overall grades as per NEP.

The components for internal evaluation (25 Marks).

Quiz 1

Quiz 2

Lab Manual

Journal

20%

20%

20%

40%

Ensure your availability and preparedness for the quiz. For any queries,
feel free to reach out to your lab-in-charge for further assistance.

Best regards,
Sanni


-- 
*Thanks,*



*Sanni, Ph.D.Assistant professorDepartment of Physical Sciences
<https://www.charusat.ac.in/PDPIAS/people/>Faculty of Applied SciencesP D
Patel Institute of Applied Sciences,CHARUSAT
<https://www.charusat.ac.in/>, Changa. - 388 421, India*

*Email: sannikapatel.phys@charusat.ac.in <sannikapatel.phys@charusat.ac.in>*
*            sunkapatel@gmail.com <sunkapatel@gmail.com>*
*Phone: (M) +91 - 9978577009*

--

subject: "Internship_Career - Students of CHARUSAT UNIVERSITY"
snippet: Dear Student bearing enrollment ID 24dce084, From CHARUSAT UNIVERSITY. Congratulations! You've been selected for a unique 2-month Training & Internship program to give you valuable industry
content:
*Dear Student bearing enrollment ID 24dce084, From CHARUSAT UNIVERSITY.*

*Congratulations! You've been selected* for a unique *2-month Training &
Internship program* to give you valuable industry experience. *LaunchEd
Global* is offering this opportunity, with *certifications* *verified by
WIPRO Dice ID* and aligned with *AICTE* standards.

*Fill out the Google Form to Apply to this program:*
                    *https://forms.gle/VWhzEk9Fp23BKQmV9*
<https://forms.gle/VWhzEk9Fp23BKQmV9>

*Here‚Äôs what you can expect:*

*1. Comprehensive Training:*

   - *Live Expert Sessions:* Evening classes (6:30 PM - 8:00 PM) via Zoom,
   guided by industry professionals.
   - *Skill Development:* Learn from foundational to advanced concepts,
   perfect for all levels.
   - *Practical AI:* Build applications, explore Generative AI, and master
   prompt engineering with minimal coding.
   - *Flexible Learning:* Access recorded sessions on our LMS for 6 months
   after the program starts.

*2. Hands-On Internship Experience:*

   - *Individual Projects:* Complete 10+ focused projects, applying what
   you learn.
   - *Team Collaboration:* Work on a major capstone project in a group of
   3-4, with clear roles and responsibilities.
   - *Career Preparation:* Receive expert guidance on resume building and
   practice your interview skills with mock interviews.
   - *Industry Insights:* Learn from leaders at prominent global companies
   through masterclasses.

*Valuable Certifications:*

   - *Course Certificate:* Earn a certificate from IIT-KHARAGPUR(Kshitij)
   - *Internship Certificate:* Receive a certificate from our partner
   companies.
   - *Verified Credibility:* Both certificates are verified by WIPRO Dice
   ID.
   - Ãâ*Career Support:* Join our community for placement assistance and
   connections with leading companies.

*Om Jena*
Senior Internship Counsellor, LaunchEd Global

subject: Regarding Submission of Assignments 1 & 4 of MSUD102 (EM-2)
snippet: Dear Students, Kindly submit assignments 1 & 4 of MSUD102 (EM-2) in room number: 309 (EC/EE building) as soon as possible. Please ensure to write your ID number, name, and branch on the assignment
content:
Dear Students,

Kindly submit assignments 1 & 4 of MSUD102 (EM-2)  in room number: 309
(EC/EE building) as soon as possible.

* Please ensure to write your ID number, name, and branch on the assignment
book. *

with regards,
-- 
*Dr. Pragneshkumar R. Makwana*

*M.Sc., M.Phil., Ph.D.*


*Assistant Professor,Department of Mathematical Sciences,P. D. Patel
Institute of Applied Sciences,*

*Charotar University of Science & Technology,Changa, Gujarat, India.*

--

subject: Sessional Examination Marks of MSUD102, which was held on 10-03-2025 (Monday)
snippet: Dear students, I have attached the marks (out of 20) for the sessional examination of MSUD102 (Engineering Mathematics-2), which was held on 10-03-2025 (Monday). Please let me know if you have any
content:
Dear students,

I have attached the marks (out of 20) for the sessional examination of
MSUD102 (Engineering Mathematics-2), which was held on 10-03-2025 (Monday).

Please let me know if you have any queries *on or before* 24th March 2025.

*After that, no queries will be entertained.*

Thank you.

-- 
*Dr. Pragneshkumar R. Makwana*

*M.Sc., M.Phil., Ph.D.*


*Assistant Professor,Department of Mathematical Sciences,P. D. Patel
Institute of Applied Sciences,*

*Charotar University of Science & Technology,Changa, Gujarat, India.*

subject: Thank You for Registering for Open Mic - Bebaak Batein in Gustakhi
snippet: Dear Participant, Thank you for registering for the Open Mic - Bebaak Batein organized under the event titled Gustakhi. This event is jointly organized by the Faculty of Humanities (FoH), Indukaka
content:
Dear Participant,

Thank you for registering for the *Open Mic - Bebaak Batein * organized
under the event titled *Gustakhi*. This event is jointly organized by
the *Faculty
of Humanities (FoH), Indukaka Ipcowala Institute of Management (IIIM), and
the Women‚Äôs Development Cell (WDC-IIIM).*

üìç *Venue:*  IIIM Auditorium
‚è∞ *Time:* 2:00 PM onwards

Please take Your seats ahead of time. We appreciate your enthusiasm and
look forward to your active participation in the engaging portrayals.
*Pranjal Bhatt*
*Assistant Professor*
*Faculty of Humanities*
*Indukaka Ipcowala Institute of Management*
*CHARUSAT University, Changa, India.*
*Accredited with "Grade A+" by NAAC*

*Contact: 9429296329*

subject: Fwd: Late Kamlaben Ambalal bin Becharbhai, Bakrol and Mrs. Pushpaben Dinesh Patel Merit Cum Means Scholarship 2024-25
snippet: Dear Students, Please find the " Late Kamlaben Ambalal bin Becharbhai, Bakrol and Mrs. Pushpaben Dinesh Patel Merit Cum Means Scholarship for 1 st Year Students of B.Tech Program DEPSTAR for the
content:
*Dear Students,*


*Please find the "* *Late Kamlaben Ambalal bin Becharbhai, Bakrol and Mrs.
Pushpaben Dinesh Patel Merit Cum Means Scholarship **for 1st Year Students
of B.Tech Program DEPSTAR for the *

*academic year (2024-25).*




*CHAROTAR UNIVERSITY OF SCIENCE & TECHNOLOGY*



*Date: 19/03/2025   *

*NOTICE*


*Subject: - Late Kamlaben Ambalal bin Becharbhai, Bakrol and Mrs. Pushpaben
Dinesh Patel Merit Cum Means Scholarship for 1st * *Year Students of B.Tech
Program DEPSTAR **for **the academic year (2024-25).*



This is for information to all the concerned students that, Late Kamlaben
Ambalal bin Becharbhai, Bakrol and Mrs. Pushpaben Dinesh Patel Merit Cum
Means Scholarship will be awarded to the students of 1st year of B.Tech
(DEPSTAR) program for academic year 2024-25, with the following Criteria:



*Eligibility Criteria to get Scholarship for the Academic Year 2024-25:*

v Students of *1st year* who have secured *60 percentage* or above in the 12
th standard.

v Students whose family income is not more than `4.5 lacs.

v To continue to be eligible for availing Scholarship, the Student has to
secure 7.00 CGPA or above at the end of every year without backlog.

v In case, student will not score minimum 7.00 CGPA in consecutive year,
then scholarship will be awarded to another eligible student, selected by
the Donor and recommended by CHARUSAT.

v Only Two students shall be selected for the scholarship each Year.

v Students receiving any other scholarship (e.g. MYSY) and Students
admitted under Tuition Fees waiver Scheme (TFWS) are not eligible to apply.

v The Scholarship is meant to provide maximum support to two students,
selected by Donor based on merit-cum-means, and complying above conditions.





*The forms for the scholarship are available and is to be submitted as per
following details:*



*Name of Institute*

*Forms to be collected from*

*Room No.*

DEPSTAR

Mr. Dharmendra Patel

DEPSTAR Building

*Last Date of Submission of Form:   01.04.2025*



**Note: No Form will be accepted after the last date.*


-- 
*VISHAL M PATEL*
*OFFICE EXECUTIVE*
*CHANDUBHAI S. PATEL INSTITUTE OF TECHNOLOGY.(CSPIT)*
*CHAROTAR UNIVERSITY OF SCIENCE & TECHNOLOGY*
*CHARUSAT CAMPUS, CHANGA*

_______________________________________________________________________
*P Please don't print this e-mail unless you really need to.*

--

.


-- 
*Regards:*
Mr. Pravin Jadav,
Assistant Professor,
Department of Computer Engineering,
Devang Patel Institute of Advance Technology and Research (DEPSTAR),
Charotar University of Science and Technology (CHARUSAT),

Dear All,

We are thrilled to invite all the students of CHARUSAT to participate in  
the upcoming event , a vibrant platform for fearless storytellers, bold  
visionaries, and defiant poets to express their creativity and challenge

subject: Important Notice: Kit distribution | DRAMATICS
snippet: Dear Students, Greetings! Please note that the kit distribution for your liberal arts workshop on DRAMATICS is scheduled on Tuesday, 18th March 2025(Today). You need to collect the kits from Indukaka
content:
Dear Students,



Greetings!



*Please note that the kit distribution for your liberal arts workshop on
DRAMATICS is scheduled on Tuesday, 18th March 2025(Today).* You need to
collect the kits from Indukaka Ipcowala Institute of Management between
1:15 PM to 4:15 PM.


Please note the following instructions for the courses:



1.       100% Attendance is Compulsory.

2.       It is required that you carry your own Identity Card.

3.       Details of the schedule/venue of the course will be there in your
Kit.

4.    Check the SOP, kit letter, Schedule and Syllabus in the kit


Contact the Institute / Department Coordinators or your Mentor in case you
have any queries.



We hope you will have a wonderful learning experience.



Thank you.



Regards,


-- 
*Ms. Celine Davla*
*Assistant Professor*
*HSS Department*
*Indukaka Ipcowala Institute of Management*
*CHARUSAT*
*Mo. 9737517553*

--

subject: Fwd: Request to Forward Traffic Awareness Event & Poster Making Competition Details
snippet: ---------- Forwarded message --------- From: DHRUVI MAHALE <22cs036@charusat.edu.in> Date: Sat, Mar 15, 2025 at 9:07 PM Subject: Request to Forward Traffic Awareness Event & Poster Making
content:
---------- Forwarded message ---------
From: DHRUVI MAHALE <22cs036@charusat.edu.in>
Date: Sat, Mar 15, 2025 at 9:07‚ÄØPM
Subject: Request to Forward Traffic Awareness Event & Poster Making
Competition Details
To: <coordinator.nss@charusat.ac.in>
Cc: <pinalhansora.cse@charusat.ac.in>, <22cs051@charusat.edu.in>


Respected Sir,

I hope this email finds you well.

We, the *CSE NSS Unit*, are organizing a *Traffic Awareness Program* on *20th
March 2025* to spread awareness about road safety and responsible driving
among students. As part of this initiative, we are hosting a *Poster Making
Competition* on *18th March 2025*.

üìå *Competition Details:*

   - Open to all students of *Charusat University*
   - Teams of *2 or 3 members* can participate
   - Only *20 teams* will be selected on a *first-come, first-serve* basis
   - The best posters will be showcased at the *Traffic Awareness Program*
   - *Participants must bring their own laptops for designing the poster  *

We request you to kindly forward this information to all departments so
that interested students can participate. They can register by filling out
the form linked below:

üìç *Registration Link: *https://forms.gle/nFMfduwfUAyHPfzX6

Attached is the *poster for the event* for further reference.
[image: image.png]

For any queries, students can contact:
üìû  *9328068864 **, *99790 99218

We appreciate your support in spreading the word about this initiative.
Looking forward to your kind cooperation.

Best Regards,
Dhruvi mahale



-- 
Thanks & Regards
--

--

subject: Fwd: [CALIBER 2025 - Call for Papers] Library 2047: Democratizing Knowledge Towards Viksit Bharat at Sri Venkateswara University (SVU), Tirupati, Andhra Pradesh
snippet: A good opportunity to showcase your research paper in following topics: Theme "Library 2047: Democratizing Knowledge Towards Viksit Bharat" Sub-Themes Digital Knowledge Creation, Sharing and
content:
A good opportunity to showcase your research paper in following topics:

Theme
"Library 2047: Democratizing Knowledge Towards Viksit Bharat"
Sub-Themes
Digital Knowledge Creation, Sharing and Infrastructure
Designing Policies to Strengthen Library Systems Across India
The Role of Cloud Computing, AI, and Blockchain in Library Systems
Strengthening the Open Access Movement for Research and Education
Open Educational Resources (OERs) for Equitable Learning Opportunities
The Role of Government, Private Sector, and NGOs in Democratizing Access
and Funding Strategies for Scaling and Modernizing Library Infrastructure
Libraries as Enablers of Social Equity and SDGs
Expanding Library Services for Underserved and Marginalized Communities
Libraries Empowering Women, Children, and Differently-abled Individuals
Inclusive Library Programs to Bridge the Urban-Rural Knowledge Gap
Libraries as Advocates for Environmental Awareness and Education
The Role of Libraries in Achieving Sustainable Development Goals (SDGs)
Libraries as E-resource Gateways and Innovation Hubs
Federated Search and Discovery Services to Access E-resources
Strengthening Library Networks for Global Information Access
Fostering Startup Ecosystems through Knowledge Access and Mentorship
Strengthening Research and Innovation through Smart Libraries, Makerspaces
and Digital Labs
Benchmarking and Performance Metrics for Academic Libraries

Please mark the deadline of submission.

All the best üëç

---------- Forwarded message ---------
From: No Reply: INFLIBNET Event <noreply.event1@mail.inflibnet.ac.in>
Date: Sun, Mar 16, 2025, 3:02‚ÄØAM
Subject: [CALIBER 2025 - Call for Papers] Library 2047: Democratizing
Knowledge Towards Viksit Bharat at Sri Venkateswara University (SVU),
Tirupati, Andhra Pradesh
To: <jaypatel.dce@charusat.ac.in>


14th International CALIBER 2025 is being organised by Information and
Library Network (INFLIBNET) Centre, Gandhinagar, Gujarat in collaboration
with Sri Venkateswara University (SVU), Tirupati, Andhra Pradesh (Convention
Date: November 17-19, 2025)

Dear Sir/Madam,

Greetings from INFLIBNET Centre!

We are delighted to invite you to participate in the *14th International
CALIBER 2025* (Convention on Automation of Libraries in Education and
Research Institutions), organized by the *INFLIBNET Centre, Gandhinagar,
Gujarat * in collaboration with *Sri Venkateswara University (SVU),
Tirupati, Andhra Pradesh*. The convention will take place from *November
17-19, 2025* at SVU, Tirupati.

CALIBER is a prestigious *biennial international convention* that brings
together *library and information science professionals, IT and knowledge
sector experts, policymakers, academicians, researchers, and students* to
deliberate on the latest developments and emerging trends in Digital
Knowledge Creation, Sharing and Infrastructure; Libraries as Enablers of
Social Equity and SDGs; and Libraries as E-resource Gateways, etc.

The Convention seeks high-quality technical papers related to the theme and
sub-themes but not limited to the areas as specified below. We strongly
encourage you to send the final version of your article electronically
through online.
Theme
"Library 2047: Democratizing Knowledge Towards Viksit Bharat" Sub-Themes

   - Digital Knowledge Creation, Sharing and Infrastructure
      - Designing Policies to Strengthen Library Systems Across India
      - The Role of Cloud Computing, AI, and Blockchain in Library Systems
      - Strengthening the Open Access Movement for Research and Education
      - Open Educational Resources (OERs) for Equitable Learning
      Opportunities
      - The Role of Government, Private Sector, and NGOs in Democratizing
      Access and Funding Strategies for Scaling and Modernizing Library
      Infrastructure
   - Libraries as Enablers of Social Equity and SDGs
      - Expanding Library Services for Underserved and Marginalized
      Communities
      - Libraries Empowering Women, Children, and Differently-abled
      Individuals
      - Inclusive Library Programs to Bridge the Urban-Rural Knowledge Gap
      - Libraries as Advocates for Environmental Awareness and Education
      - The Role of Libraries in Achieving Sustainable Development Goals
      (SDGs)
   - Libraries as E-resource Gateways and Innovation Hubs
      - Federated Search and Discovery Services to Access E-resources
      - Strengthening Library Networks for Global Information Access
      - Fostering Startup Ecosystems through Knowledge Access and Mentorship
      - Strengthening Research and Innovation through Smart Libraries,
      Makerspaces and Digital Labs
      - Benchmarking and Performance Metrics for Academic Libraries

Important Dates

   - *Paper Submission Deadline:* May 30, 2025
   - *Paper Acceptance Notification:* August 30, 2025

Important Links

   - Submission Portal: https://caliber.inflibnet.ac.in/submission/
   - Author Submission Guidelines:
   https://caliber.inflibnet.ac.in/author-guidelines.php
   - Citation and Referencing Guidelines:

Submission Process

The full-text paper (Max. 3500 words) must be submitted electronically, as
a .DOCX or .ODT file, and uploaded on
https://caliber.inflibnet.ac.in/submission/.
For more information, visit our website at [https://caliber.inflibnet.ac.in]
<https://caliber.inflibnet.ac.in>.

subject: Summer Internship with Wipro Dice ID and NSDC Certification
snippet: Dear Student of Charusat University, "INTERNSHIPS DON'T JUST ADD TO YOUR RESUME; THEY DEFINE YOUR FUTURE. GET AHEAD BEFORE THE WORLD LEAVES YOU BEHIND üåê" INTERNSHIP WITH NSDC
content:
*Dear Student of Charusat University,*

*"INTERNSHIPS DON‚ÄôT JUST ADD TO YOUR RESUME; THEY DEFINE YOUR FUTURE. GET
AHEAD BEFORE THE WORLD LEAVES YOU BEHIND üåê"*

*INTERNSHIP WITH NSDC CERTIFICATION!*
üëâ We are excited to announce that all students attending this exclusive
2-Month Summer Training + Internship Program will now receive an *NSDC
(National Skill Development Corporation)  and WIPRO DICE ID Certification* ‚Äì
a valuable credential that can be used for *placement and college purposes*.

üìå *Application Form:* https://forms.gle/DDjMnNEeBnEXV4pPA

*Referral ID:* DICE_25
üìå *Program Highlights*

‚úÖ *Month 1:* Advanced training through live interactive sessions with
industry experts.
‚úÖ *Month 2:* Hands-on internship with real-world projects and expert
mentorship.
‚úÖ *Continuous Support:* 24/7 mentorship, doubt-clearing sessions, and
career guidance.
üéì *Certifications & Credentials*

üèÜ *Certificate of Completion* accredited by *AICTE*.
üèÜ *Internship Certificate* verified by *Wipro DICE ID* & leading MNCs.
üèÜ *Letter of Recommendation* for outstanding performers, endorsed by
industry experts.
üèÜ *NSDC Certification* ‚Äì Students will now receive an *NSDC (National
Skill Development Corporation) Certification* upon completion, which can be
used for *placement and college purposes*.
üìà *Additional Benefits*

‚ú® *6-month access* to a personalized LMS portal.
‚ú® *Placement assistance* through a dedicated career community for 6 months.
‚ú® 24/7 mentorship and doubt-clearing support.
‚ú® *6 months of recorded sessions* with access to LMS software, including:

   - *Resume building assistance*
   - *Mock interviews* to help prepare for real-world opportunities
   - *Assessments* for the sessions and mock interviews

üìå Apply Now:  https://forms.gle/DDjMnNEeBnEXV4pPA

*Referral ID:* DICE_25

üö® *Reminder: **Students kindly fill out the application form and complete
your registration by EOD.*

üëâ *For students already enrolled, please disregard this message.*

Best regards,
*Training and Internship Cell*
*LaunchEd Global*

*Dear All, *


We're excited to announce the upcoming batch of the AWS Academy's *"Cloud
Practitioner Foundational"* course, scheduled for March 2025!


Please find the attached brochure


*Benefits on enrollment *



   - 50% AWS exam voucher will be provided to students
   - Full access to all modules of AWS LMS and Hands-on lab.
   - Exam preparation material with Mock exam




*Benefits of AWS Certification*


There are numerous advantages to becoming AWS certified. Amazon Web
Services certifications‚Ä¶



   - Validate your skills and knowledge in the preeminent cloud computing
   platform.
   - are consistently listed among the top-paying info-tech certifications
   worldwide.
   - Garner more interviews for aspiring cloud specialists and higher wages
   once hired.
   - Are recognized industry-wide as reliable and well-designed tech
   credentials.
   - Demonstrate credibility and dedication to your cloud computing career
   path.
   - Provide access to a network of like-minded peers and AWS
    thought-leaders.
   - Require recertification which ensures that your AWS skills remain
   current.


Interested students are requested to register themselves using the
following link:

<https://forms.gle/EAo4zLYKoBKGmc7N9>

in your respective Institute / Branch.*

subject: A COURSE ON LIBERAL ARTS | HSUS109 DRAMATICS | MARCH 2025
snippet: Dear Students, Greetings! You must be aware that your curriculum offers a 2 Credit Compulsory Course on Liberal Arts. We thank you for selecting HSUS109 Dramatics. Please note that the course will be
content:
Dear Students,



Greetings!



You must be aware that your curriculum offers a 2 Credit Compulsory Course
on Liberal Arts. We thank you for selecting HSUS109 Dramatics.



Please note that the course will be taught in the Workshop Mode (9:10 am to
4:30 pm) during 25th to 28th March 2025 at CHARUSAT Campus, Changa. *Your
Internal as well as External Evaluation will also be carried out during
these 4 days only. *


*The venue for your 4 days workshop will be informed shortly.*

*For regular updates please join the google classroom using this link.
(Click here for the link
<https://classroom.google.com/c/NzUyNDQxMzg3MTE3?cjc=23tria7>)*



It is compulsory for you to attend the course and complete all assignments,
tasks, activities given and appear in the Viva (Internal and External)
during those 4 days only.



*If you fail to attend, complete the tasks, activities and
assignments, you may fail in the second semester and get a backlog.*



Please note the following instructions for the courses:



1.      Students are required to collect a Course Kit from Indukaka
Ipcowala Institute of Management on *Monday- March 24, 2025. *

2.       100% Attendance is Compulsory.

3.       It is required that you carry your own Identity Card.

4.       The details regarding schedule and venue will be informed through
email shortly.



Please find the Standard Operating Procedure(SOP) attached herewith for
your reference and understanding.


Feel free to contact the course coordinator in case of any queries.

Ms. Celine Davla - 9737517553



Happy Learning!



Regards,


-- 
*Ms. Celine Davla*
*Assistant Professor*
*HSS Department*
*Indukaka Ipcowala Institute of Management*
*CHARUSAT*
*Mo. 9737517553*

--

subject: Fwd: Invitation to Participate in Viksit Bharat Youth Parliament 2025
snippet: Dear Students, The CHARUSAT NSS Cell is pleased to invite you to participate in the Viksit Bharat Youth Parliament 2025, an incredible opportunity to express your vision for a developed India. This
content:
Dear Students,

The *CHARUSAT NSS Cell* is pleased to invite you to participate in the *Viksit
Bharat Youth Parliament 2025*, an incredible opportunity to express your
vision for a developed India. This initiative, supported by the *Ministry
of Youth Affairs & Sports, Govt. of India*, encourages youth engagement in
policy discussions and leadership development.
*Event Details:*

*District-Level Competition:* 17th March 2025
*Venue:* Sardar Patel University, Vallabh Vidyanagar

*Register Here:* https://mybharat.gov.in/ -> Viksit Bharat Youth Parliament
2025 <https://mybharat.gov.in/mega_events/viksit-bharat-youth-parliament>
(*Register as soon as possible!*)
*Deadline : 16th March 2025*
*Participation Guidelines:*

   - Open to students aged *18-25 years*.
   - Submit a *1-minute video* on the topic: *"What does Viksit Bharat mean
   to you?"*
   - Language options: *Gujarati, Hindi, or English*.
   - *Selected 150 participants* will compete at the District Level.
   - *Top 10* will advance to the State Level, and winners will qualify for
   the *National Level* competition.

For detailed guidelines and further information, please find the *attached
PDF*.

*We encourage all eligible students to take advantage of this opportunity
and make CHARUSAT proud! *

For any queries, feel free to contact the *CHARUSAT **NSS Cell*.
-- 
Thanks & Regards
--



-- 
*Regards:*
Mr. Pravin Jadav,
Assistant Professor,
Department of Computer Engineering,
Devang Patel Institute of Advance Technology and Research (DEPSTAR),
Charotar University of Science and Technology (CHARUSAT),
 AT: Changa, Ta:Petlad, Dist:Anand, Gujarat.

--

subject: Important: MSUD102 Practice Session Starting from March 18, 2025
snippet: Dear Students, Your tutorial (Practice Session for MSUD102) will commence on March 18, 2025. This session is part of continuous evaluation, and your attendance is mandatory. If you are absent for even
content:
Dear Students,

Your tutorial (Practice Session for MSUD102) will commence on *March 18,
2025*. This session is part of *continuous evaluation*, and your attendance
is *mandatory*.

*If you are absent for even one session, we will inform your parents*.
Please ensure your participation to avoid any issues.

 Each class has been divided into *two equal partitions*, and sessions will
be conducted by *two different faculty members*. Please *check your ID
number in the attached file* and ensure that you always *sit in your
allotted classroom* throughout the sessions.

Thank you.
*Dr. Bina Patel*
*Assistant Professor*
*Department of Mathematical Sciences *
*PDPIAS, CHARUSAT, Changa-388421*
*Accredited Grade A+ by NAAC*

subject: Invitation to Participate in Viksit Bharat Youth Parliament 2025
snippet: Dear Students, The CHARUSAT NSS Cell is pleased to invite you to participate in the Viksit Bharat Youth Parliament 2025, an incredible opportunity to express your vision for a developed India. This
content:
Dear Students,

The *CHARUSAT NSS Cell* is pleased to invite you to participate in the *Viksit
Bharat Youth Parliament 2025*, an incredible opportunity to express your
vision for a developed India. This initiative, supported by the *Ministry
of Youth Affairs & Sports, Govt. of India*, encourages youth engagement in
policy discussions and leadership development.
*Event Details:*

*District-Level Competition:* 17th March 2025
*Venue:* Sardar Patel University, Vallabh Vidyanagar

*Register Here:* https://mybharat.gov.in/ -> Viksit Bharat Youth Parliament
2025 <https://mybharat.gov.in/mega_events/viksit-bharat-youth-parliament>
(*Register as soon as possible!*)
*Deadline : 16th March 2025*
*Participation Guidelines:*

   - Open to students aged *18-25 years*.
   - Submit a *1-minute video* on the topic: *"What does Viksit Bharat mean
   to you?"*
   - Language options: *Gujarati, Hindi, or English*.
   - *Selected 150 participants* will compete at the District Level.
   - *Top 10* will advance to the State Level, and winners will qualify for
   the *National Level* competition.

For detailed guidelines and further information, please find the *attached
PDF*.

*We encourage all eligible students to take advantage of this opportunity
and make CHARUSAT proud! *

For any queries, feel free to contact the *CHARUSAT **NSS Cell*.
-- 
Thanks & Regards
--

--

subject: Fwd: Announcing PENTATHON 2025 ‚Äì A National-Level Cybersecurity Challenge -Regarding.
snippet: ---------- Forwarded message --------- From: AICTE <no-reply@sampark.gov.in> Date: Mon, Mar 10, 2025 at 2:32 PM Subject: Announcing PENTATHON 2025 ‚Äì A National-Level Cybersecurity Challenge -
content:
---------- Forwarded message ---------
From: AICTE <no-reply@sampark.gov.in>
Date: Mon, Mar 10, 2025 at 2:32‚ÄØPM
Subject: Announcing PENTATHON 2025 ‚Äì A National-Level Cybersecurity
Challenge -Regarding.
To: <principal.depstar@charusat.ac.in>


Having trouble reading this email? View it in your mobile/ web browser
<https://jan-sampark.nic.in/campaigns/2025/07-Mar/AICTE/index.html>
------------------------------

Dear Sir/Madam,

We are pleased to announce the launch of PENTATHON 2025, a premier
national-level hackathon on Capture the Flag (CTF) Challenge and VAPT
exercise, jointly organized by NCIIPC, AICTE and MIC. This initiative aims
to identify and nurture top talent in cybersecurity, and Vulnerability
Assessment & Penetration Testing (VAPT).

About PENTATHON 2025:
ÓÅûÈöº Stage 1 (Online Qualification Round): A jeopardy-style Capture The Flag
(CTF) challenge covering Web Attacks, Network Exploitation, API
Vulnerabilities, OT SCADA, and more.
ÓÅûÈöº Stage 2 (Physical Grand Finale): A high-stakes live cybersecurity
exercise focused on protecting Critical Information Infrastructure (CII)
from advanced cyber threats.
ÓÅûÈöº Stage 3: Bootcamp and Training for shortlisted teams


Eligibility Criteria:
1. Regular Students (UG/PG/PHD) from the Higher Educational Institutions
(HEIs) are eligible to apply for this hackathon
2. No Professional or startup can take part in this hackathon

This hackathon will provide participants with an opportunity to engage in
real-world cybersecurity challenges, test their skills against the best
minds in the country, and contribute to national cyber resilience.

ÓÅûÊù± Register your interest and stay updated. The deadline for submitting
your interest is 15th March 2025.

Website: https://mic.gov.in/pentathon2025/
<https://jan-sampark.nic.in/jansampark/click.jsp?tab=pmo&urlid=68f887221a9ba660e1823af68c5f21e03c147b7b&lat=2025&mid=99515409b676c4dc5e9dc25e0c7bc11be08b6cfe>


Register to show your interest: https://forms.gle/Q5zLPueEa2AUZjXXA
<https://jan-sampark.nic.in/jansampark/click.jsp?tab=pmo&urlid=ce50a54793962c9d1808559bbf1460bd1d735562&lat=2025&mid=99515409b676c4dc5e9dc25e0c7bc11be08b6cfe>


Link to creatives:
https://drive.google.com/drive/folders/1wD-IdtwxhE2_q6o6xsPqwxM_XtXytbOp?usp=sharing
<https://jan-sampark.nic.in/jansampark/click.jsp?tab=pmo&urlid=abc0bcd1488b57d96d8c7f6663248251b19bfd58&lat=2025&mid=99515409b676c4dc5e9dc25e0c7bc11be08b6cfe>


We look forward to your participation in this prestigious event. For any
queries, feel free to reach out.

*Best regards,*
*PENTATHON 2025 Organizing Team*

<https://www.facebook.com/sharer/sharer.php?u=https%3A%2F%2Fjan-sampark.nic.in%2Fcampaigns%2F2025%2F07-Mar%2FAICTE%2Findex.html>

subject: The Quill: CHARUSAT Chronicles | Volume 10 - Issue 2
snippet: Welcome to Quill The Quill: CHARUSAT Chronicles Greetings from CHARUSAT! In the ever-evolving journey of academic excellence and innovation, we are delighted to introduce Quill ‚Äî the official
content:
[Welcome to Quill]
[https://mailer.charusat.org.in/index.php/campaigns/pj902x2k39ea7/track-url/ls409tohbwc79/cde86d8c0da7b957c934ecfd99c713dcf0d13606]


THE QUILL: CHARUSAT CHRONICLES

Greetings from CHARUSAT!

In the ever-evolving journey of academic excellence and innovation, we
are delighted to introduce QUILL ‚Äî the official newsletter of
CHARUSAT. True to its name, Quill embodies the spirit of creativity,
intellect, and expression that defines our vibrant community.

WHAT‚ÄôS INSIDE QUILL?

 	* ACCOLADES: CHARUSAT'S EXCELLENCE ‚Äì Celebrating extraordinary
accomplishments of our students, faculty, and alumni.
 	* RESEARCH PUBLICATIONS: THE EDGE OF EXPLORATION ‚Äì Showcasing
groundbreaking discoveries.
 	* EMINENT SPEAKERS: UNVEILING NEW PERCEPTIONS ‚Äì Dive into engaging
conversations and transformative ideas.
 	* CAMPUS BUZZ: CELEBRATING CAMPUS LIFE ‚Äì Experience the energy and
excitement of campus life.
 	* FACULTY SPOTLIGHT: ACADEMIC EXCELLENCE ‚Äì Highlighting the
brilliance of our faculty.
 	* STUDENT SPOTLIGHT: RISING STARS ‚Äì Inspiring stories of our
student community.

Quill is more than just a newsletter; it is a chronicle of our shared
vision, growth, and success. Join us in celebrating the milestones and
moments that make CHARUSAT a hub of inspiration and innovation.

[Quill Cover Page]
[https://mailer.charusat.org.in/index.php/campaigns/pj902x2k39ea7/track-url/ls409tohbwc79/6a1d41c8c004b6b45507b44a8baa19329fc0135a]

Warm regards,

Executive Officer - Corporate Communications

subject: Fwd: Call for Student Entries ‚Äì FICCI Best Animated Frames (BAF) Awards 2025 | Send entries latest by 15 March 2025
snippet: Dear Students, Greetings from FICCI! We are pleased to invite students from your Institute/ University to send their entries for BAF Awards 2025 across various categories - Animation, Visual Effects (
content:
Dear Students,

Greetings from FICCI!

*We are pleased to invite students from your Institute/ University to send
their entries for BAF Awards 2025 across various categories - Animation,
Visual Effects (VFX), Gaming, Comics, and Extended Reality (AVGC-XR).* This
is a unique opportunity for aspiring creators to gain national recognition
and showcase their talent amongst industry veterans, studios, and
decision-makers.

*Best Animated Frames (BAF) Awards ceremony will take place on March 27,
2025, at Sofitel, Mumbai.*

*Award Categories for Students:*

   - Best Student Short Film (2D & 3D Animation)
   - Best Student Character Design
   - Best Student Game Design & Development
   - Best Student Visual Effects (VFX) Project
   - Best Student Comic or Graphic Novel
   - Best Student XR (AR/VR/MR) Experience


*Why should Students participate in BAF Awards 2025?*
‚úî Gain National Recognition ‚Äì Showcase your work to industry leaders and
global experts.
‚úî Engage with Top Creators ‚Äì Network with leading animation, gaming, and
VFX professionals.
‚úî Get Industry Insights ‚Äì Attend thought-provoking sessions on the latest
AVGC-XR trends.
‚úî Win Prestigious Awards ‚Äì Boost your career prospects with a BAF
Award-winning portfolio.
‚úî Showcase at FICCI FRAMES ‚Äì Your work could be featured at India‚Äôs biggest
M&E industry platform.

*Judging Criteria:*
A distinguished jury panel comprising renowned animators, game developers,
VFX supervisors, and industry experts will evaluate the entries based on
creativity, technical execution, and storytelling impact. Winning entries
will receive trophies, certificates, and industry-wide recognition,
providing an unparalleled boost to emerging talent.

*Timeline and Process:*

   - Submit your entries *before March 15, 2025* at
*https://registrations.ficci.com/baf/baf-reg-online.asp
   <https://post.spmailtechnolo.com/f/a/50Mh_Ln6TQ5haliEm6dp4g~~/AAUvfxA~/2qiZh96vMLcNGup3r4X4MBhkc5uqHDaC9M-6oC8AxK7lorIMn4tHtvpAJshlAn_--yWMHD_eBUW1QpoHDhWvbCYTT4ffD5wriwsjbKEqAzrOd_KH_K6zEip92hHztUhgW0WhLQK7NAFh8WH_xAxjkCt3if2uvE84e1S-AV4bD_EPlkr5BRJoDADOtKQ61SUfhZRQXW-JQsQ1gs2F7UE82_LhjCoIMqJ7tEE2CUFiJ5tOZeWAq5t2FiMdxRWtn4vr>*

   for guidelines and registration


For queries, contact Ms. Pratibha Sharma at *pratibha.sharma@ficci.com
<https://post.spmailtechnolo.com/f/a/2TeVTq_Y8j8LyZbgFear1A~~/AAUvfxA~/2qiZh96vMLcNGup3r4X4MBhkc5uqHDaC9M-6oC8AxK7lorIMn4tHtvpAJshlAn_--yWMHD_eBUW1QpoHDhWvbCYTT4ffD5wriwsjbKEqAzo-Al3YPDE298QKfm28tgBCk9zyOrjjNWK5CfOUSFUPn-dsTOW4uh9-Czg7wFcLt3fkHX3PF0FQBxsbDxnh0GjZR800KOyADsOvsINlxNHJSFRC8IcEV-luzWPhrBI90vfcvPTytqemOAFVIxYaO1r->*
| +91 8800434844.



We look forward to celebrating the creative brilliance at BAF Awards 2025!


Warm Regards,

*Leena Jaisani*
Deputy Secretary General & Cluster Head ‚Äì Media & Entertainment, Retail,
FMCG, E-Commerce, IPR, Cascade and Young Leaders Forum

*Industry‚Äôs Voice for Policy Change*

content:
---------- Forwarded message ---------
From: Amit Thakkar <amitthakkar.it@charusat.ac.in>
Date: Fri, 7 Mar 2025, 11:55‚ÄØam
Subject: Hands on Workshop on HIgh Performance Computing under Super
Computing Facility @ CHARUSAT
To: <21cspitstudents@charusat.edu.in>, <22cspitstudents@charusat.edu.in>, <
23cspitstudents@charusat.edu.in>, <24cspitstudents@charusat.edu.in>

principal.depstar@charusat.ac.in>, CE CSPIT <ce.cspit@charusat.ac.in>, IT <

riteshpatel.ce@charusat.ac.in>, Harshul Yagnik <
harshulyagnik.cse@charusat.ac.in>


Hands-On Workshop on High Performance Computing

Organized by Supercomputing Facility at CHARUSAT & AIML Club at CHARUSAT

Dear Students and Faculty members,

We are excited to invite you to a two-day hands-on workshop on High
Performance Computing (HPC) at CHARUSAT. This workshop will provide you
with practical experience in parallel computing techniques and technologies.
*Workshop Details:*

üìÖ Date: 11-12 March 2025

üìç Venue: 323A, A6 Building

üë• Maximum participants: 40

üí∞ Registration: Free of cost

*Note:* E-certificates will be provided to participants with 100%
attendance and 100% allocated task submission.
About the Workshop

This workshop will introduce you to the Supercomputing Facility at
CSPIT-CHARUSAT. You'll gain hands-on experience with various parallel
computing paradigms including:

   - ‚Ä¢ GPU Programming with CUDA
   - ‚Ä¢ Shared Memory Parallelism with OpenMP
   - ‚Ä¢ Distributed Memory Parallelism with MPI
   - ‚Ä¢ Multi-GPU training with PyTorch

Workshop Schedule
Time Day 1 (March 11) Day 2 (March 12)
9:10 AM - 10:00 AM Super computing in action - Transforming Science and
Innovation
Dr. Amit Thakkar
10:00 AM - 12:00 PM Shared Memory Parallelism with OpenMP
Dr. Ritesh Patel GPU Programming with CUDA (continued)
Dr. Ritesh Patel
12:00 PM - 1:00 PM Lunch Break Lunch Break
1:00 PM - 2:00 PM Shared Memory Parallelism with OpenMP (continued)
Dr. Ritesh Patel Multi-GPU training with PyTorch
Mr. Harshal Yagnik
2:00 PM - 4:20 PM Distributed Memory Parallelism with MPI
Mr. Harshal Yagnik Multi-GPU training with PyTorch (continued)
Mr. Harshal Yagnik
Benefits

   - ‚Ä¢ Hands-on experience with the Supercomputing Facility
   - ‚Ä¢ Learn from experts in the field of high-performance computing
   - ‚Ä¢ E-certificates for participants with 100% attendance and task
   completion
   - ‚Ä¢ Valuable skills for research and industry applications

Registration Information

The workshop is open to all students and faculty members. Registration is
required as seats are limited to 40 participants.

Limited seats available - Register today!
Register Now <#m_3565061123934775921_>

Registration closes on March 9, 2025 or when all seats are filled

Organized by Supercomputing Facility at CHARUSAT & AIML Club |
CSPIT-CHARUSAT

"EMPOWERING THE POTENTIAL OF PARALLEL COMPUTING"


With Regards,

Amit Thakkar, Ph.D.
Professor & Head
Department of Computer Science & Engineering
Chandubhai S Patel Institute of Technology (CSPIT)
Charotar University of Science & Technology.(CHARUSAT)
Jay Swaminarayan.

subject: Fwd: Inauguration of IEEE CHARUSAT Student Branch - Women in Engineering (WIE)
snippet: ---------- Forwarded message --------- From: Principal CSPIT <principal.cspit@charusat.ac.in> Date: Fri, 7 Mar 2025, 9:36 am Subject: Inauguration of IEEE CHARUSAT Student Branch - Women in
content:
---------- Forwarded message ---------
From: Principal CSPIT <principal.cspit@charusat.ac.in>
Date: Fri, 7 Mar 2025, 9:36‚ÄØam
Subject: Inauguration of IEEE CHARUSAT Student Branch - Women in
Engineering (WIE)
To: Charusat Family <charusatfamily@charusat.ac.in>



Inauguration of IEEE CHARUSAT Student Branch Women in Engineering Affinity
Group and Seminar talk on "Women Innovators in Tech: Success Stories and
Lessons Learned"

Newly Established IEEE CHARUSAT Student Branch Women in Engineering
Affinity Group invites all female students and faculties of CHARUSAT to
participate in the inauguration ceremony followed by a seminar talk.
About IEEE WIE

*Vision:* "To be globally recognized for its contributions in STEM fields.
Our goal is to facilitate the recruitment and retention of women in
technical disciplines globally. We envision a vibrant community of IEEE
women and men collectively using their diverse talents to innovate for the
benefit of humanity."

*Mission:* "To connect, support, and inspire women and girls worldwide, and
facilitate their recruitment and retention in STEM fields, fostering
technological innovation and excellence for the benefit of humanity."
Guest Speaker
Ruzan Khambatta

A visionary entrepreneur, social innovator, and passionate advocate for
women's empowerment. Through her groundbreaking initiatives like Wajra O'
Force, PoliceHEART 1091, and Halla Bol, she has transformed thousands of
lives. Her success mantra? Small steps today lead to giant leaps tomorrow!

Learn more about Ruzan Khambatta <https://ruzankhambatta.com/wizzo1/>
Event Details

   - *Date:* *10th March 2025*
   - *Time:* *9:45 AM to 11:00 AM*
   - *Venue:* *2nd floor, Seminar hall, CSPIT EC-EE(A6 building), CHARUSAT*

This event is a milestone moment as we officially launch the Student
Chapter of WiE Society of IEEE, a dedicated community to uplift and support
women in technology. Whether you're a student, professional, or tech
enthusiast, this is an opportunity to connect, learn, and be part of a
movement that drives change.

E-Certificates will be provided to all the participants.

Let's come together to celebrate, empower, and innovate!
Register Here
<https://docs.google.com/forms/d/1YtXFaNHx3A12jsPhcPr6jRjZWwjOh48EskA9I3Ra9Mg/edit>

Looking forward to your presence!

Regards,

-- 
Dr. Trushit Upadhyaya
Professor & I/c Principal
Chandubhai S Patel Institute of Technology
Faculty of Technology & Engineering
Charotar University of Science & Technology (CHARUSAT)
CHARUSAT Campus, Changa, 388421
Petlad, Anand, Gujarat, India.
M: 7874840344
https://scholar.google.com/citations?user=Gzsxo-oAAAAJ&hl=en

--

subject: Gujarat Cultural Elocution Competition ‚Äì 2025 (University Level) || Registration Deadline: March 6, 2025, 8:00 PM
snippet: Dear CSPIT & DEPSTAR Students, The CHARUSAT NSS Unit is organizing the University Level Gujarat Cultural Elocution Competition ‚Äì 2025 as part of the initiative by the State NSS Department. We
content:
Dear CSPIT & DEPSTAR Students,

The CHARUSAT NSS Unit is organizing the *University Level Gujarat Cultural
Elocution Competition ‚Äì 2025* as part of the initiative by the State NSS
Department. We invite interested students to participate and showcase their
oratory skills.

*Date:* March 8, 2025
*Time:* 12:15 PM (Updated) Onwards
*Venue: *RPCP Auditorium
*Levels:* University ‚Üí Zone ‚Üí State

*Topics (Choose One):*

   - Character Building for Nation Building
   - Importance of Constitution in a Citizen‚Äôs Life
   - Youth: The Future of the Nation ‚Äì Challenges and Responsibilities
   - Values, Morality, and Ethics: Pillars of Indian Culture
   - Developed India 2047: Vision for a Better Future

*Eligibility:* Participants must be born on or after January 1, 1999.
*Registration Deadline:* March 6, 2025, 8:00 PM


*Registration Link:* <goog_111173522>https://forms.gle/LPeLhMmYZheqgaRr9

For further details, please refer to the attached PDFs.

For any queries, contact:

   - *Mr. Kishan Patel* (NSS Coordinator) ‚Äì +91 97244 42255
   - *Mr. Dhruv Rupapara* (Student Coordinator) ‚Äì +91 63539 33976

*We encourage students to participate.*

Best Regards,
*NSS Unit, CHARUSAT*

---Thanks & Regards---
*Dhruv D. Rupapara*
2nd Year B.Tech. EC
NSS Student Coordinator
V.T. Patel Department of Electronics & Communication Engineering
CSPIT, CHARUSAT, Changa 388421
--

---------- Forwarded message ---------
From: Dr. Priteshkumar Prajapati <priteshprajapati.it@charusat.ac.in>
Date: Thu, Mar 6, 2025 at 2:57‚ÄØPM
Subject: Certified Ethical Hacker v13 (CEHv13) - World‚Äôs No. 1 Ethical
Hacking Certification, now with the power of AI (March 2025)
To: Madhav Ajwalia <madhavajwalia.it@charusat.ac.in>, Pritesh Prajapati <
priteshprajapati.it@charusat.ac.in>, Martin Parmar <
martinparmar.ce@charusat.ac.in>, sneha padhiar <
snehapadhiar.ce@charusat.ac.in>, AKSHITA KADAM <
akshitakadam.cse@charusat.ac.in>, Pinal Hansora <
pinalhansora.cse@charusat.ac.in>, Shital Sharma <
shitalsharma.dit@charusat.ac.in>, Hardik Jayswal <
hardikjayswal.it@charusat.ac.in>, Ritika Jani <ritikajani.dit@charusat.ac.in>,
Ashish Katira <ashishkatira.dit@charusat.ac.in>, Khushi Patel <
khushipatel.ce@charusat.ac.in>, Kajal Parmar <kajalparmar.dce@charusat.ac.in>,
Sachi Joshi <sachijoshi.dce@charusat.ac.in>, Naina Parmar <
nainaparmar.dcs@charusat.ac.in>, Bansari Patel <
bansaripatel.dcs@charusat.ac.in>
Cc: Parth Shah <parthshah.ce@charusat.ac.in>


Dear Sir/Madam,

Please share the email below with your students to get benefit from
subsidized academic costs as an EC-Council Academia Partner.
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Dear students,

We are glad to inform you that *"Charotar University of Science and
Technology - CHARUSAT"* is the official *EC-Council Academia Partner *since
January 2020. We are immensely pleased to welcome ‚ÄúCHARUSAT‚Äù *students* to
EC Council's newly launched *CEHv13* program. Certified Ethical
Hacker CEHv13
<https://www.eccouncil.org/programs/certified-ethical-hacker-ceh/> will
teach you the latest commercial-grade hacking tools, techniques, and
methodologies hackers and information security professionals use to hack an
organization lawfully. *110+ students have benefited from CEH at CHARUSAT
with a subsidized academia kit price.*

*What‚Äôs new in CEHv13?*: *From the creators of Certified Ethical Hacker
(CEH) comes the latest and evolved version 13 with added AI capabilities.
Structured across 20 learning modules covering over 550 attack techniques,
CEH provides cybersecurity professionals with the core knowledge they need
to detect and defend against emerging threats.*

*You will get:*

   - EC-Council Official Course Book for CEHv13 for self-study (24 Months) -
   Accessible Online/Offline. To Download App
   <https://support.vitalsource.com/hc/en-us/articles/201344733-Bookshelf-Download-Options>

   - Access To iLabs for 6 Months. Check the ilabs Demo Here:
   *https://youtu.be/iU_7zKypJZI* <https://youtu.be/iU_7zKypJZI>.
   - An Exam Voucher (1 Year) - *Get a globally recognized certificate
for* passing
   the exam. Accreditations
   <https://linkprotect.cudasvc.com/url?a=https%3a%2f%2fwww.eccouncil.org%2faccreditations%2f&c=E,1,hLej6Kb3ZRL_QKhhm71kedMm89bbj8UclU3d50zuCt2frG_t19Fir_60SvUk16RJBGYXwVBLF11HLMhr7nDv8WGkPElWNiTm9zdZ_xfo&typo=1>
   - Over 200 hands-on labs with Over 3,500 hacking tools. Learn how to
   hack multiple operating systems (Windows 11, Windows servers, Linux,
   Ubuntu, Android)
   - The venue of the Exam will be our University Premises.

*Popular Cybersecurity Tools in the Course:*


* - Network scanning and mapping tools (e.g., Nmap, hping3)- Vulnerability
assessment tools (e.g., OpenVAS, Nessus)- Penetration testing tools (e.g.,
Metasploit, Aircrack-ng)- Packet sniffers and network analyzers (e.g.,
Wireshark, Omnipeek Network Analyzer)- Social engineering tools (e.g.,
Social-Engineer Toolkit (SET), SpeedPhish Framework (SPF))- Password
cracking tools (e.g., John the Ripper, L0phtCrack)- Forensics tools (e.g.
FTK, EnCase, Autopsy)- Wireless hacking tools (e.g., Aircrack-ng,
Wifiphisher)- Encryption tools (e.g., CryptoForge, VeraCrypt)*
*Master AI to automate ethical hacking tasks and hack and defend against AI
systems.*

*‚Ä¢ ShellGPT* ‚Äì Automates various reconnaissance and penetration testing
tasks using AI-driven scripting.
*‚Ä¢ ChatGPT *‚Äì Helps generate code, automate tasks, and create scripts for
ethical hacking.
‚Ä¢ *FraudGPT* ‚Äì Simulates AI-assisted malicious activities to learn defense
strategies.
‚Ä¢ *WormGPT* ‚Äì An offensive AI tool used to simulate exploitations and
malware creation.
‚Ä¢ *DeepExploit* ‚Äì AI-powered vulnerability scanning and exploitation tool.
‚Ä¢ *Nebula* ‚Äì Automates network discovery and vulnerability identification
with AI.
‚Ä¢ *Veed.io* ‚Äì Can visualize security analytics and post-exploitation
results for better reporting.


*Typical Job Roles for C|EH :*

   - Mid-Level Information Security Auditor
   - Cybersecurity Auditor
   - Security Administrator
   - IT Security Administrator
   - Cyber Defense Analyst
   - Senior Security Consultant
   - Information Security Manager
   - Senior SOC Analyst
   - Solution Architect
   - Cybersecurity Consultant



   - Vulnerability Assessment Analyst
   - Warning Analyst
   - Information Security Analyst 1
   - Security Analyst L1
   - Infosec Security Administrator
   - Cybersecurity Analyst L1, L2, & L3
   - Network Security Engineer
   - SOC Security Analyst
   - Security Analyst
   - Network Engineer

detailed points for chapters/units: 3,6 & 10, you can find it from the FY
Handbook/Syllabus booklet.

Importance of engineering drawing, drawing instruments and materials, BIS
and ISO
Different types of lines used in engineering practice, methods of
projections as per SP 46-1988.
Engineering scale.
Title block, Types of line, Geometric construction,Dimensioning System

*6. Introduction of Mechanical Engineering*
*10. Scope of Civil Engineering*

subject: Fwd: Bhupendrabhai Narshibhai Patel & Kokilaben Bhupendrabhai Patel Merit-cum-Means Scholarship for the First Year Students of Undergraduate Program of DEPSTAR (2024-25)
snippet: Dear Students, Please find the "Bhupendrabhai Narshibhai Patel & Kokilaben Bhupendrabhai Patel Merit-cum-Means Scholarship" for the First Year Students of Undergraduate Program of DEPSTAR
content:
*Dear Students,*



*Please find the "Bhupendrabhai Narshibhai Patel & Kokilaben Bhupendrabhai
Patel Merit-cum-Means Scholarship" for the First Year Students of
Undergraduate Program of DEPSTAR (2024-25)*



*You are requested to send the filled form with documents received from the
eligible students latest by 28th march 2025.*

*CHAROTAR UNIVERSITY OF SCIENCE & TECHNOLOGY*



 NOTICE


*Date: 05/03/2025*


Bhupendrabhai Narshibhai Patel & Kokilaben Bhupendrabhai Patel
Merit-cum-Means Scholarship for the First Year Students of Undergraduate
Program of DEPSTAR (2024-25)



This is for information to all the concerned students that Bhupendrabhai
Narshibhai Patel & Kokilaben Bhupendrabhai Patel Merit-cum-Means
Scholarship will be awarded to Undergraduate program Student of *DEPSTAR *for
academic year 2024-25, with the following Criteria:
Eligibility Criteria to get Scholarship for the Academic Year 2024-25:



v  The Student of F Y B Tech whose 12th Standard result is more than 70
Percentage & family income is not more than Rs. 7 lacs will be eligible to
apply

v  To continue to be eligible for availing Scholarship, the Student has to
secure 7.00 CGPA or above at the end of every Year without backlog.

v  In case, student will not score minimum 7.00 CGPA in consecutive Year,
then scholarship will be awarded to another eligible student.

v  Students receiving Govt. / Donor / CHARUSAT / any other scholarship or
admitted under the Tuition Fee Waiver Scheme (TFWS) are not eligible to
apply.

v  The Scholarship will be awarded to maximum one eligible student of
DEPSTAR



*The forms for the scholarship are available and is to be submitted as per
following details:*



*Name of Institute*

*Forms to be collected from*

DEPSTAR

Mr. Dharmendra Patel



*Last Date of Submission of Form: 25.03.2025*





**Note: No Form will be accepted after the last date.*

-- 
*VISHAL M PATEL*
*OFFICE EXECUTIVE*
*CHANDUBHAI S. PATEL INSTITUTE OF TECHNOLOGY.(CSPIT)*
*CHAROTAR UNIVERSITY OF SCIENCE & TECHNOLOGY*
*CHARUSAT CAMPUS, CHANGA*

_______________________________________________________________________

--
