Department of Computer Engineering,
Devang Patel Institute of Advance Technology and Research (DEPSTAR),
Charotar University of Science and Technology (CHARUSAT),
 AT: Changa, Ta:Petlad, Dist:Anand, Gujarat.

subject: Important Email: Clarification on Syllabus and Reading Material
snippet: Dear Students, In my last email, I shared the syllabus, and some of you raised concerns about a mismatch in section numbering. To clarify, please refer to the following reading material for Unit 2 and
content:
Dear Students,

In my last email, I shared the syllabus, and some of you raised concerns
about a mismatch in section numbering. To clarify, please refer to the
following reading material for *Unit 2* and *Unit 5* to verify the
syllabus. Do not get confused.

   - *Unit 2:* Up to *Subsection 2.2* (*Complementary Functions and Their
   Examples*). Please check *Subsection 2.2* in this reading material.
   - *Unit 5:* Only *Section 5.3* (*Evaluation of Double Integrals and Its
   Examples*), *excluding Sections 5.1 and 5.2*.  Please check *Subsection
   5.3* in this reading material

If you still have any doubts, feel free to contact me.

Best regards,
*Dr. Bina Patel*
*Assistant Professor*
*Department of Mathematical Sciences *
*PDPIAS, CHARUSAT, Changa-388421*
*Accredited Grade A+ by NAAC*

*Mob. No: **+91-9427777856  *

*Dear all,*

*In today‚Äôs world, personal safety and self-defense skills are essential
for everyone, especially for girls and women. *

*With rising concerns about safety and personal security, it is imperative
to equip young women with the skills and knowledge to protect themselves in
various situations.*

*CMPICA is organizing Interactive and hands-on self-defense training
session for female students and staff members of CHARUSAT, under EOC on 6th
March, 2025, 10:00AM to 12:00PM by **Sensei Chetan Fumakiya, Pratibha
Academy, Under the Project of Pratibha Self Defense Foundation.*

*All the interested female students and staff members are requested to
register using below link on or before 4/3/2025:*
https://forms.gle/FHRA2WXU6t7zX2YZ6

participate and please forward this mail to students of your department.*

subject: Fwd: self-defense training session for female students and staff members of CHARUSAT, under EOC
snippet: ---------- Forwarded message --------- From: Principal CMPICA CHARUSAT <principal.cmpica@charusat.ac.in> Date: Mon, Mar 3, 2025 at 9:35 AM Subject: self-defense training session for female
content:
---------- Forwarded message ---------
From: Principal CMPICA CHARUSAT <principal.cmpica@charusat.ac.in>
Date: Mon, Mar 3, 2025 at 9:35‚ÄØAM
Subject: self-defense training session for female students and staff
members of CHARUSAT, under EOC
To: Principal <principal@charusat.ac.in>
Cc: Dean FCA CHARUSAT <dean.fca@charusat.ac.in>, mittal desai <
mittaldesai.mca@charusat.ac.in>



Dear All,
You are requested to circulate the trailing mail to staff members and
students groups and encourage them for the active participation.

______________________________________________________________________
Dear all,

In today‚Äôs world, personal safety and self-defense skills are essential for
everyone, especially for girls and women.

With rising concerns about safety and personal security, it is imperative
to equip young women with the skills and knowledge to protect themselves in
various situations.

CMPICA is organizing Interactive and hands-on self-defense training session
for female students and staff members of CHARUSAT, under EOC on 6th March,
2025, 10:00AM to 12:00PM by Sensei Chetan Fumakiya, Pratibha Academy, Under
the Project of Pratibha Self Defense Foundation.

All the interested female students and staff members are requested to
register using below link on or before 4/3/2025.
https://forms.gle/FHRA2WXU6t7zX2YZ6

For more information , contact coordinator of the programme : Dr.Mittal
Desai ( mittaldesai.mca@charusat.ac.in, (M)  6352954942)


I/C Principal,
Smt.Chandaben Mohanbhai Patel Institute of Computer Applications(CMPICA),
(M.C.A,M.Sc.(IT),B.C.A, B.Sc.(IT) and Ph.D Programmes)
Charotar University of Science and Technology(CHARUSAT),CHANGA
*( NAAC Accredited with "A+"  Grade)*

Contact No:- 02697-265241
Website: www.charusat.ac.in

subject: üöÄ Register Now! AWS Fundamentals Technical Session-1 : 3rd March 2025
snippet: Dear Students, We are excited to invite you to an AWS Fundamentals Technical Session, designed especially for 2nd semester students to introduce you to Cloud Computing and AWS‚Äîthe world's leading
content:
Dear Students,

We are excited to invite you to an *AWS Fundamentals Technical Session*,
designed especially for *2nd semester students* to introduce you to *Cloud
Computing and AWS‚Äî*the world's leading cloud platform. This session will
provide you with a foundational understanding of AWS services and how they
are used in the real world.

üìå *Session** Details:*
üìÖ *Date:* 3rd March 2025
‚è∞ *Time:* 12:10 PM ‚Äì 1:10 PM
üè¢ *Venue: *Will be shared to register participants only.
üë®‚Äçüè´ *Speakers:* Manasvi Vachhani & Jills Patel
*What You Will Learn?*

‚úÖ Introduction to *Cloud Computing* & Why It Matters
‚úÖ Overview of *AWS & Its Core Services* (EC2, S3, IAM, etc.)
‚úÖ *Real-World Applications* & How AWS is Used in Industry
‚úÖ *Live Hands-on Demo‚Äî*Navigating the AWS Console
*Why Should You Attend?*

üîπGain insights into *one of the most in-demand technologies* today.
üîπLearn how *AWS powers major companies* like Netflix, Airbnb, and more.
üîπGet *hands-on experience* with AWS, useful for projects & internships.
üîπ*No prior knowledge is required‚Äî*we will start from the basics!

üìå [Register Here] <https://forms.gle/s3Nx7Ui4BrnFkrkW9>(Fill this form to
confirm your participation.)

Don't miss this opportunity to kickstart your *Cloud Computing journey*! üöÄ

Looking forward to seeing you all at the session.
*Best regards,*
*Mr. Jay Patel,*
*Assistant Professor,*
*University-Level Central Students Council**,*
*Department of Computer Engineering,*
*Devang Patel Institute of Advance Technology and Research (DEPSTAR)*
*Charotar University of Science and Technology (CHARUSAT)*
*(M) +919428153390*
*LinkedIn: *www.linkedin.com/in/jrbpatel


*Stay healthy and fit.*
  *Please don't print this e-mail unless you really need to.*

--

subject: Fwd: Stipend + PPO Opportunities at Ninjacart | Deadline Extended
snippet: Dear all Ninjacart is back again with the second batch of openings for their Tech Internship Program after hiring multiple students for the 1st batch PAN India. Upon receiving multiple requests, the
content:
Dear all

Ninjacart is back again with the second batch of openings for their *Tech
Internship Program* after hiring multiple students for the 1st batch PAN
India. *Upon receiving multiple requests, the registration has been
extended till Monday, 3rd March 2025, 10 AM.*

We‚Äôre excited to invite your students to apply for the *Ninjacart Tech
Internship Program 2.0*
<https://apna.co/contests/ninjacart-tech-ninja-intern-hiring-challenge-2025?utm_source=Email&utm_medium=Email&utm_campaign=POC20&utm_id=2002>
‚Äî
a fantastic opportunity to work on impactful agritech projects and gain
hands-on experience in a fast-growing sector.

*Application Link*:
https://apna.co/contests/ninjacart-tech-ninja-intern-hiring-challenge-2025?utm_source=Email&utm_medium=Email&utm_campaign=POC20&utm_id=2002

*Highlights of the Internship Program:*

   - *Role: *Tech Interns
   - *Stipend*: ‚Çπ15,000/month
   - *PPO Opportunity*: ‚Çπ7 LPA
   - *Location*: Bengaluru (Accommodation & food included)
   - *Duration*:  ‚Äì 1st April - 31st May

*Eligibility:*

   - B.Tech/B.E. students in CSE/IT (2024/2025 batches).
   - Minimum CGPA/Percentage: 7/70%.

*Important Dates:*

   - *Application Deadline*: 3rd March 2025 - 10 AM
   - *Assessment*: 3rd March 2025 - 2 PM - 8 PM (They can attempt for 30
   minutes anytime basis their availability)

We encourage you to share this exciting opportunity with your students. For
details and application, visit the official website
<https://apna.co/contests/ninjacart-tech-ninja-intern-hiring-challenge-2025?utm_source=Email&utm_medium=Email&utm_campaign=POC20&utm_id=2002>
.

Warm regards,
Team apna

--

subject: Fwd: „Äê2 days left„ÄëRegister for Hack the Future 2025 ‚Äì Hackathon for Solving Real-World Challenges with AI & Data
snippet: Dear all Kindly go through the trailing mail. ---------- Forwarded message --------- From: IIEC IIT Gandhinagar <iiec@iitgn.ac.in> Date: Wed, Feb 26, 2025 at 7:57 PM Subject: „Äê2 days left„Äë
content:
Dear all

Kindly go through the trailing mail.


---------- Forwarded message ---------
From: IIEC IIT Gandhinagar <iiec@iitgn.ac.in>
Date: Wed, Feb 26, 2025 at 7:57‚ÄØPM
Subject: „Äê2 days left„ÄëRegister for Hack the Future 2025 ‚Äì Hackathon for
Solving Real-World Challenges with AI & Data
To:


Dear friends and Innovators,


Greetings from the IIT Gandhinagar Innovation and Entrepreneurship Center
(IIEC)!


We are thrilled to invite you to *Hack the Future 2025: Innovating
Intelligent Data Insights*, a national-level hackathon organized by IIEC,
IIT Gandhinagar, in collaboration with the *Ministry of Statistics and
Programme Implementation (MoSPI), Government of India*.


This *36-hour immersive challenge*, scheduled for *March 21‚Äì23, 2025*, at
IIEC, IIT Gandhinagar, will bring together developers, designers,
innovators, and students to leverage *AI and data science* in addressing
critical socio-economic and development challenges using publicly available
data.



*Why Participate?*

‚úÖ *Solve Real-World Problems:* Tackle challenges curated by MoSPI,
Government of India, and contribute to meaningful solutions.
üèÜ *Win Exciting Prizes:*

   - *1st Place:* ‚Çπ2,50,000
   - *2nd Place:* ‚Çπ1,50,000
   - *3rd Place:* ‚Çπ1,00,000
   - *2 Special Mentions:* ‚Çπ35,000 each
   üöÄ *Incubation & Piloting Opportunities:* Selected projects may be
   incubated at IIEC, IIT Gandhinagar, and piloted in collaboration with MoSPI.
   üöÄ *Network & Learn:* Connect with industry experts, policymakers, and
   fellow innovators to expand your horizons.


*Key Dates*

üìÖ *Application Window:* February 7‚Äì28, 2025
üì¢ *Shortlisted Participants Announced:* March 5, 2025
üí° *Hackathon & Pitching Event:* March 21‚Äì23, 2025


If you are passionate about *AI, data science, and innovation*, this is
your opportunity to showcase your skills, collaborate with like-minded
individuals, and create a lasting impact.


*Take the First Step*

üîó *Apply Now <https://form.jotform.com/250342766778468>*
üì© *For inquiries:* iiec@iitgn.ac.in | *Visit Us
<https://chat.deepseek.com/a/chat/s/127f9456-4fc6-47ab-bf6e-760519fe586c>*


We can‚Äôt wait to see your groundbreaking ideas at *Hack the Future 2025*!



Warm regards,
*Team IIEC*

--

snippet: Create and share beautiful email templates banner-bg.jpg Dear All, The Artificial Intelligence and Machine Learning Department at Charotar University of Science and Technology is pleased to invite you
content:

Dear All,

*The Artificial Intelligence and Machine Learning Department at Charotar
University of Science and Technology is pleased to invite you to
participate in our upcoming Equal Opportunity Cell (EOC) Activity on the
theme "**AI for Social Good ‚Äì Solving Real-World Issues**"*
Date: 7th March 2025
Timing: 12:00 to 2:00 pm
Registration Link: https://forms.gle/4dnzcafVqqNKr8cd9
Rules:

   -

   Students may present AI-based solutions for improving daily life,
   supporting disabled individuals, enhancing healthcare, or addressing social
   causes.
   -

   Students may submit their ideas in a group of up to 3 members.
   -

   Poster Presentation size: A2 *(presentation format is attached
   herewith.)*
   -

   The poster presentation must be in hard copy.

*Exciting Prizes:*

*1st Prize: ‚Çπ1500/-*

*2nd Prize: ‚Çπ1000/-*
*3rd Prize: ‚Çπ500/-*

   - All participants will receive an e-Certificate of Participation.

We request your kind cooperation and adherence to the above rules to ensure
the smooth conduct of the event.



-


*Thanks and Regards,*


*Gaurang A. Patel*

Charotar University of Science & Technology

subject: Join Us for the UniExplore 2.0 International Fair at Charusat University! üåç
snippet: Dear All, We're excited to announce the upcoming UniExplore 2.0 International Fair at Charusat University on February 28th ‚Äì a must-attend event for students aspiring to study abroad! ‚ú® Here's
content:
>
> Dear All,
>
> We‚Äôre excited to announce the upcoming *UniExplore 2.0 International Fair*
>  at *Charusat University* on *February 28th* ‚Äì a must-attend event for
> students aspiring to study abroad! ‚ú®
>
> *Here‚Äôs what you can look forward to:*
>
>    1.
>
>    *On-the-Spot Counseling*
>    Direct guidance from university representatives, answering all your
>    study abroad questions.
>    2.
>
>    *Complete Guidance for Education Loans*
>    Get a clear understanding of the documentation and loan process
>    step-by-step.
>    3.
>
>    *Exclusive Scholarships*
>    Discover scholarship opportunities for studying in top destinations
>    like the *USA, UK, Canada, NZ, Australia*, and *Germany*.
>    4.
>
>    *One-to-One Profile Evaluation*
>    After pre-counseling, meet university reps tailored to your profile
>    for more personalized advice.
>
> This event is a your *gateway to transforming their future* and gaining
> clarity about your educational journey.
>
> *üìå Don‚Äôt miss out!*
> Mark your calendars for *February 28th*, and take your first step toward
> international education.
>
> *To register, click the link below*:
> *Register Now* <https://arisoverseas.com/uniexplore/>
> *Venue: Central Lawn, CHARUSAT*
> *Time: 10.00 A.M to 03.00 P.M*
> *Date: 28 FEB 2025*
>
> We look forward to seeing you there and helping you take the next big step
> in students academic journey!
>
> *Thanks & Regards,**Career Development and Placement Cell (CDPC)*
> *Charotar University of Science & Technology (CHARUSAT) *
> AT: Changa, Ta:Petlad, Dist:Anand, Gujarat
> (T) 02697-265213
>

subject: Fwd: Students' Active Participation in 6th Edition Smart Gujarat Hackathon
snippet: Dear students, A very nice learning and exploring opportunity. Please take advantage of it by selecting appropriate mentors for the same. Thank You ---------- Forwarded message --------- From:
content:
Dear students,

A very nice learning and exploring opportunity. Please take advantage of it
by selecting appropriate mentors for the same.

Thank You

---------- Forwarded message ---------
From: Principal DEPSTAR <principal.depstar@charusat.ac.in>
Date: Thu, Feb 27, 2025 at 9:44‚ÄØAM
Subject: Fwd: Students' Active Participation in 6th Edition Smart Gujarat
Hackathon
To: Depstar <depstar@charusat.ac.in>




---------- Forwarded message ---------
From: <info@gujgov.edu.in>
Date: Tue, Feb 25, 2025 at 7:44‚ÄØPM
Subject: Students' Active Participation in 6th Edition Smart Gujarat
Hackathon
To: <principal.depstar@charusat.ac.in>


Dear,

The Education Department, Gujarat has been doing persistent efforts to
institutionalize the Innovation & Startup Ecosystem in the State through
policy, platform, and processes. To augment the support system for
nurturing student Start-ups in the State, second edition of Student
Start-up and Innovation Policy (SSIP 2.0) was launched on 05 January 2022.

Under the Policy, various flagship initiatives have been envisaged through
which youth can get adequate opportunities to harness their creative
potential. We have pioneered various Open Innovation Programmes like
hackathon and executed them at a large-scale.

The 6th Edition of ‚ÄúSmart Gujarat Hackathon‚Äù with special focus on
Artificial Intelligence will be a step forward towards building smart and
sustainable solutions to complex challenges. In this edition of hackathon
around 15,000 students are expected to participate and work on problem
statements. Challenges from various departments of the State Government,
Public Sector Undertakings, Municipal Corporations, District Collectorate,
District Panchayats and industries will be broadcasted to students across
universities, institutes, and schools.

The program will feature problem statements from various sectors providing
students with ample opportunities to engage in Artificial Intelligence and
other emerging technology-based solution- oriented projects. Moreover,
winning teams will not only receive cash prizes but also invaluable
mentorship support from nodal officers of government departments and
benefits from education department of Government of Gujarat, further
encouraging their pursuit of innovation and excellence.

We request all students from your institute to actively participate in 6th
edition of ‚ÄúSmart Gujarat Hackathon‚Äù. This event presents a fantastic
opportunity for students to showcase their problem-solving skills and
innovative thinking. To get more details and further update regarding
registration process and list of sectors students can visit the following
link: https://ssipgujarat.in/hackathon. Teams must select a problem
statement online after registration and login in the portal.

Last date for Team registration is 10th March 2025 and synopsis Submission
is 14th March 2025.

Kindly share this with all your students and faculty members so that they
can participate in this event. For any query, please revert us at
ssipgujarat@gmail.com

Team Hackathon
Student Start-up and Innovation Policy
Education Department, Government of Gujarat
3rd Floor, Block No:2 ,Karmayogi Bhavan
Sector 10-A 382010

--

snippet: Dear CHARUSAT Students, Arthyantra, the Economics Club of CHARUSAT, is now accepting applications for new team members. This is an opportunity to gain experience in content creation, social media
content:
Dear CHARUSAT Students,

Arthyantra, the Economics Club of CHARUSAT, is now accepting applications
for new team members. This is an opportunity to gain experience in content
creation, social media management, finance, research, and event
coordination while contributing to the club‚Äôs initiatives.

<https://forms.gle/Aw6fUvSJvebp82tp8> by March 1st. Shortlisted candidates

subject: Don‚Äôt Miss Out: Join Us for the UniExplore 2.0 International Fair at Charusat University! üåç
snippet: Dear All, We're excited to announce the upcoming UniExplore 2.0 International Fair at Charusat University on February 28th ‚Äì a must-attend event for students aspiring to study abroad! ‚ú® Here's
content:
Dear All,

We‚Äôre excited to announce the upcoming *UniExplore 2.0 International Fair*
 at *Charusat University* on *February 28th* ‚Äì a must-attend event for
students aspiring to study abroad! ‚ú®

*Here‚Äôs what you can look forward to:*

   1.

   *On-the-Spot Counseling*
   Direct guidance from university representatives, answering all your
   study abroad questions.
   2.

   *Complete Guidance for Education Loans*
   Get a clear understanding of the documentation and loan process
   step-by-step.
   3.

   *Exclusive Scholarships*
   Discover scholarship opportunities for studying in top destinations like
   the *USA, UK, Canada, NZ, Australia*, and *Germany*.
   4.

   *One-to-One Profile Evaluation*
   After pre-counseling, meet university reps tailored to your profile for
   more personalized advice.

This event is a your *gateway to transforming their future* and gaining
clarity about your educational journey.

*üìå Don‚Äôt miss out!*
Mark your calendars for *February 28th*, and take your first step toward
international education.

*To register, click the link below*:
*Register Now* <https://arisoverseas.com/uniexplore/>
*Venue: Central Lawn, CHARUSAT*
*Time: 10.00 A.M to 03.00 P.M*
*Date: 28 FEB 2025*

We look forward to seeing you there and helping you take the next big step
in students academic journey!

*Thanks & Regards,**Career Development and Placement Cell (CDPC)*
*Charotar University of Science & Technology (CHARUSAT) *
AT: Changa, Ta:Petlad, Dist:Anand, Gujarat
(T) 02697-265213

--

subject: Fwd: Students' active participation in 6th Edition - Smart Gujarat Hackathon
snippet: Dear Students, We request all students to actively participate in 6th edition of ‚ÄúSmart Gujarat Hackathon‚Äù. This event presents a fantastic opportunity for students to showcase their problem-solving
content:
Dear Students,

We request all students to actively participate in 6th edition of ‚ÄúSmart
Gujarat Hackathon‚Äù. This event presents a fantastic opportunity for
students to showcase their problem-solving skills and innovative thinking.
To get more details and further update regarding registration process and
list of sectors students can visit the following link:
https://ssipgujarat.in/hackathon. Teams must select a problem statement
online after registration and login in the portal.

The last date for Team registration is *10th March 2025* and synopsis
Submission is *14th March 2025*.

-----------------
Regards,
Khushi Patel,
Assistant Professor & Training and Placement Representative,
Department of Computer Engineering,
Devang Patel Institute of Advance Technology and Research(DEPSTAR),
Faculty of Technology and Engineering (FTE),
Charotar University of Science & Technology (CHARUSAT), AT: Changa,
Ta:Petlad, Dist:Anand, Gujarat.


Dear,

The Education Department, Gujarat has been doing persistent efforts to
institutionalize the Innovation & Startup Ecosystem in the State through
policy, platform, and processes. To augment the support system for
nurturing student Start-ups in the State, second edition of Student
Start-up and Innovation Policy (SSIP 2.0) was launched on 05 January 2022.

Under the Policy, various flagship initiatives have been envisaged through
which youth can get adequate opportunities to harness their creative
potential. We have pioneered various Open Innovation Programmes like
hackathon and executed them at a large-scale.

The 6th Edition *of ‚ÄúSmart Gujarat Hackathon‚Äù with special focus on
Artificial Intelligence* will be a step forward towards building smart and
sustainable solutions to complex challenges. In this edition of hackathon
around 15,000 students are expected to participate and work on problem
statements. Challenges from various departments of the State Government,
Public Sector Undertakings, Municipal Corporations, District Collectorate,
District Panchayats and industries will be broadcasted to students across
universities, institutes, and schools.

The program will feature problem statements from various sectors providing
students with ample opportunities to engage in *Artificial Intelligence and
other emerging technology-based solution- oriented *projects. Moreover,
winning teams will not only receive cash prizes but also invaluable
mentorship support from nodal officers of government departments and
benefits from education department of Government of Gujarat, further
encouraging their pursuit of innovation and excellence.

We request all students from your institute to actively participate in 6th
edition of ‚ÄúSmart Gujarat Hackathon‚Äù. This event presents a fantastic
opportunity for students to showcase their problem-solving skills and
innovative thinking. To get more details and further update regarding
registration process and list of sectors students can visit the following
link: https://ssipgujarat.in/hackathon. Teams must select a problem
statement online after registration and login in the portal.

Last date for Team registration is *10th March 2025* and synopsis
Submission is *14th March 2025*.

Kindly share this with all your students and faculty members so that they
can participate in this event. For any query, please revert us at
ssipgujarat@gmail.com


*Team Hackathon*


Student Start-up and Innovation Policy

Education Department, Government of Gujarat

3rd Floor, Block No:2 ,Karmayogi Bhavan

Sector 10-A 382010

subject: Internship Slots !!
snippet: Dear CHARUSAT Student, Props! on being shortlisted for the Internship Program! As mentioned above, Launched Global, in collaboration with MNCs and Emerging Startup, is organizing a Two-Month Training
content:
Dear* CHARUSAT* Student, Props! on being shortlisted for the Internship
Program!

As mentioned above, *Launched Global*, in collaboration with MNCs and
Emerging Startup, is organizing a Two-Month Training and internship
program designed by MNC mentors.

*Interested students fill out the form, if you get shortlisted you will get
a call from our HR Team;*
MAKE SURE TO FILL THE GOOGLE FORM

*Application:* *https://forms.gle/ACgyZSmDwy8869GG8
<https://forms.gle/ACgyZSmDwy8869GG8>*

*Whatsapp: **https://chat.whatsapp.com/FoCH2ksmzC31ogZEhbaMTy
<https://chat.whatsapp.com/FoCH2ksmzC31ogZEhbaMTy>*


*Top Preferred Courses: *
‚úÖ



*Artificial Intelligence.‚úÖ Data Science.‚úÖ Machine Learning.‚úÖ Cloud
Computing.*
*‚úÖ Full Stack Web Development.*

*Here is an outline of the program's structure.*

*First month: *During the first month of the program, training will be
conducted in the form of live lectures, and you will have live mentorship
from industry professionals. You will have access to your own *LMS Portal*,
where you can interact with the trainers and fellow students. Login
credentials will be provided to registered students.

*Second month:* Internship with live mentorship for projects from
professionals. *The LIVE INDUSTRY PROJECT* will give students an experience
in solving real-world problems.
PolishAlt + H
*10+ Minor Project**: *The minor project is an individual project, where
students will work on projects related to each topic they are learning.

*Major Project (CAPSTONE): *The major project is a group project, and you
will work in a group of 3-4 interns, with specific responsibilities
assigned to each intern. The company will provide you with all the required
data and materials for the project.


*After Completion of the program, the student shall receive a :*
‚úÖ
*Program completion certificate issued by the Launched Global‚úÖ Co-Branded
Internship certificate verified by the WIPRO DICE ID.*
*‚úÖ Letter of Recommendation from Company.*
*‚úÖ Access to a growth community.*
*‚úÖ A certificate that is valid to show in Placement.*

content:
Dear CHARUSAT Students,

Arthyantra, the Economics Club of CHARUSAT, is now accepting applications
for new team members. This is an opportunity to gain experience in content
creation, social media management, finance, research, and event
coordination while contributing to the club‚Äôs initiatives.

Interested students are required to fill out the Google Form
<https://forms.gle/Aw6fUvSJvebp82tp8> by March 1st. Shortlisted candidates

subject: INFO_STUDENT NOTICE
snippet: Dear Student of ‚Äé‚ÄéCHARUSAT University, This is an exclusive opportunity to elevate your skills and jumpstart your career with the LaunchED 2-Month Training + Internship Program, in collaboration with
content:
Dear Student of  ‚Äé‚Äé*CHARUSAT University*,

This is an exclusive opportunity to elevate your skills and jumpstart your
career with the LaunchED 2-Month Training + Internship Program, in
collaboration with IIT Kharagpur Kshitij.
üöÄ  *Application Deadline: 12:00 PM [23-02-2025]*
------------------------------

*üìã Application Form : *  https://forms.gle/dGvdjim8GEmwHrSD8
*‚úÖReferral ID:*‚Äé*CHARUSAT**_DICE ID  (FOR*‚Äé *CHARUSAT* *STUDENTS ONLY)*
------------------------------

*What You‚Äôll Gain:*

   1.

   *Comprehensive Training & Mentorship*
   - *Month 1*: Interactive, live sessions with industry leaders through
      your personalized learning portal.
      - *Month 2*: Real-world internship projects, providing you with the
      guidance of industry experts.
   2.

   *Industry-Recognized Certifications*
   - *Completion Certificate* from IIT Kharagpur Kshitij.
      - *Internship Certificate* from top MNCs, verified by Wipro DICE ID.
   3.

   *Professional Skill Development*
   - Master cutting-edge technologies such as *Generative AI*, *Prompt
      Engineering*, and *Low/No-Code Applications*.
      - Attend exclusive guest lectures from leaders at *Microsoft* and
      *Meta*.
   4.

   *Exclusive Benefits*
   - *6-month access* to a comprehensive LMS portal with personalized
      learning options.
      - *Placement Assistance* through a dedicated growth community.
      - *24/7 personalized mentorship* and live doubt-clearing sessions to
      ensure you are on track.

This program is designed to provide you with an invaluable opportunity to
gain practical knowledge and industry credentials that will set you apart
in today‚Äôs competitive job market.
*Why You Should Apply Now:*

   - Gain unparalleled mentorship and guidance from top industry leaders.
   - Improve your employability with certifications that are globally
   recognized.
   - Access exclusive internship opportunities that can lead to exciting
   career prospects.

* Apply before the deadline to secure your place.*

For students who are already enrolled, please disregard this message.

Best regards,
*LaunchED Global*
IIT Kharagpur Kshitij

subject: Second Semester Sessional-1 Examination Schedule, Seating Arrangement & Guidelines
snippet: Dear Students, Greetings! Please find attached the second semester sessional-1 examination schedule and seating arrangement. You must adhere to the following guidelines for a smooth and fair
content:
Dear Students,

Greetings!

Please find attached the *second semester sessional-1 examination schedule
and seating arrangement*. You must adhere to the following guidelines for a
smooth and fair examination process:

   - The exam will be conducted in *Exam Hall 201 (First Floor) and Exam
   Hall 301 (Second Floor), Multi Utility Complex*.
   - *Report at least 15 minutes before the exam begins*.
   - The *entry gate will close at 10:15 AM*, and no student will be
   permitted inside after *10:20 AM*.
   - *Follow the seating arrangement* as per the attached document.
   - *Maintain silence and discipline* in the examination hall.
   - *Mobile phones, smartwatches, and other electronic devices are
   strictly prohibited*.
   - *Bags must be kept outside*, and wearing your *ID card is mandatory*.

Strict compliance with these guidelines is expected to ensure a smooth
examination process. Wishing you all the best!

*Thanks & Regards,*

*Urvashi Chaudhari*
*Assistant Professor,*
*Computer Engineering,*


*Devang Patel Institute of Advance Technology & ResearchCharotar University
of Science And Technology (CHARUSAT),Changa-388421, Gujarat, INDIA.*

--

subject: Expert session on "Web Application Security: Identifying and Mitigating Vulnerabilities" on 1st March 2025 (Saturday)
snippet: Dear All, Devang Patel Institute of Advance Technology and Research (DEPSTAR), FTE, CHARUSAT has organized a talk on "Web Application Security: Identifying and Mitigating Vulnerabilities"
content:
Dear All,

Devang Patel Institute of Advance Technology and Research (DEPSTAR), FTE,
CHARUSAT has organized a talk on *"Web Application Security: Identifying
and Mitigating Vulnerabilities"*  with an objective to equip students with
skills to secure web applications from various kinds of vulnerabilities.

The expert of the talk is* Mr. Gatin Shah, Application Security Specialist,
UBS, Pune.*

You may refer to his profile on: https://www.linkedin.com/in/gatinshah/

The session will be held online, and registered participants will receive a
joining link ahead of the scheduled talk.

*Event Details:*

    Day & Date: Saturday, March 01, 2025
    Time: 2:00 PM - 4:00 PM

To register, please click on the following link:
https://forms.gle/zuYfbpV8rEJF8z8r8

We encourage all domain interested participants to register and get ready
to dive into this rapidly evolving domain.

Registration is open till February 26,2025

For any queries, please feel free to contact:
1. Dr. Premal Patel: +919925198251 | premalpatel.dce@charusat.ac.in
2. Dr. Khushi Patel: +917698617608 | khushipatel.ce@charusat.ac.in

-- 
*Thanks & Regards,*
*Dr. Premal J. Patel,*
*Assistant Professor,*
*DEPSTAR (CE).*

www.charusat.ac.in

--

subject: Session on "Vision to Venture: Business Idea Generation & Skill Development"
snippet: Dear Students, Hereby is the opportunity for the students who have shown willingness in Entrepreneurship or Family Business. In this regard, to help build the essential skills and gain insights into
content:
Dear Students,

Hereby is the opportunity for the students who have shown willingness in
Entrepreneurship or Family Business. In this regard, to help build the
essential skills and gain insights into the world of startups, a
session on *"Vision
to Venture: Business Idea Generation & Skill Development" *is organized on
28th February 2025 from 12:10 PM - 2:10 PM. The speaker of the session
is Dr. Swati Joshi [Senior Executive Officer at Charusat Innovative
Ventures Foundation (CIVF), Charusat ]

Venue will be communicated to the registered participants only.

During this session, Dr. Joshi will share her expertise on how to generate
successful business ideas, manage startups, and navigate the real-world
applications of innovation and entrepreneurship. You will also gain
valuable skills that are essential for anyone looking to launch a business
or grow a family venture.

*Key Benefits of Attending:*

   - Learn how to generate and develop innovative business ideas
   - Enhance skills for entrepreneurship and startup management
   - Discover the real-world applications of startup programs and innovation
   - Gain insights from an experienced industry professional

We highly encourage you to attend and take full advantage of this unique
learning opportunity!

*Registration Link:* https://forms.gle/rqhz4n81GRfWsEeY9 | Last date of
registration is 25th February 2025

Thank You

*with Regards,*
*Binal S. Kaka*
*Assistant Professor cum Research Fellow*
*Department of Computer Engineering*
*Devang Patel Institute of Advance Technology and Research*

--

subject: Summer Internship Enrollment For CHARUSAT Students
snippet: Dear CHARUSAT Student, Props! on being shortlisted for the Internship Program! As mentioned above, Launched Global, in collaboration with MNCs and Emerging Startup, is organizing a Two-Month Training
content:
Dear  *CHARUSAT*  Student, Props! on being shortlisted for the Internship
Program!

As mentioned above, *Launched Global*, in collaboration with MNCs and
Emerging Startup, is organizing a Two-Month Training and internship
program designed by MNC mentors.

*Interested students fill out the form, if you get shortlisted you will get
a call from our HR Team;*
MAKE SURE TO FILL THE GOOGLE FORM

*Application:*
*https://forms.gle/S28cPpz7RYEzw5L79 <https://forms.gle/S28cPpz7RYEzw5L79>*
*Whatsapp: **https://chat.whatsapp.com/KO3e082trNW85gTYdSZKLe
<https://chat.whatsapp.com/KO3e082trNW85gTYdSZKLe>*


*Top Preferred Courses: *
‚úÖ



*Artificial Intelligence.‚úÖ Data Science.‚úÖ Machine Learning.‚úÖ Cloud
Computing.*
*‚úÖ Full Stack Web Development.*

*Here is an outline of the program's structure.*

*First month: *During the first month of the program, training will be
conducted in the form of live lectures, and you will have live mentorship
from industry professionals. You will have access to your own *LMS Portal*,
where you can interact with the trainers and fellow students. Login
credentials will be provided to registered students.

*Second month:* Internship with live mentorship for projects from
professionals. *The LIVE INDUSTRY PROJECT* will give students an experience
in solving real-world problems.

*10+ Minor Project**: *The minor project is an individual project, where
students will work on projects related to each topic they are learning.

*Major Project (CAPSTONE): *The major project is a group project, and you
will work in a group of 3-4 interns, with specific responsibilities
assigned to each intern. The company will provide you with all the required
data and materials for the project.


*After Completion of the program, the student shall receive a :*
‚úÖ
*Program completion certificate issued by the Launched Global‚úÖ Co-Branded
Internship certificate verified by the WIPRO DICE ID.*
*‚úÖ Letter of Recommendation from Company.*
*‚úÖ Access to a growth community.*
*‚úÖ A certificate that is valid to show in Placement.*

subject: LaunchED Global TRAINING & INTERNSHIP for CHARUSAT Students
snippet: DEAR CHARUSAT STUDENT [Internship program with LaunchED Global KSHITIJ IIT KHARAGPUR] [WIPRO DICE ID CERTIFICATION] LaunchED in Collaboration with KSHITIJ IIT KHARAGPUR is organizing a 2 Months
content:
DEAR* CHARUSAT *STUDENT


*[Internship program with LaunchED Global KSHITIJ IIT KHARAGPUR] [WIPRO
DICE ID CERTIFICATION]*


*LaunchED in Collaboration with KSHITIJ IIT KHARAGPUR is organizing a 2
Months Training + Internship program. We are enrolling only LIMITED
STUDENTS in the program*
*APPLICATION:-* *https://forms.gle/HdLDJbWdPSA7nRdQ9*
<https://forms.gle/HdLDJbWdPSA7nRdQ9>

*JOIN HERE:*-*https://chat.whatsapp.com/FoCH2ksmzC31ogZEhbaMTy*
<https://chat.whatsapp.com/FoCH2ksmzC31ogZEhbaMTy>


*FIND THE BELOW ATTACHMENTS FOR REFERENCE:*
*First month:* IIT training has been designed in the form of Live lectures
along with living mentorship from industry professionals. (Login
credentials will be provided to students after registration)

*Second month:* Internship with live mentorship for projects from
professionals. The LIVE INDUSTRY PROJECT will be giving students experience
in solving real-world problems.

*Project 1:- *10 individual projects assigned to each intern which they
have to complete with their mentor .

*Project 2:- * Capstone Project: It's a group project assigned to a group
of 15 interns. For each intern particular work will be assigned to them
they have to work on it.
(Essential data and materials required for the project will be provided by
the company side itself)

*Here are two types of Classes we are providing:*

*1. Blended Program/Recorded classes:* You will receive recorded sessions,
whatever doubts you have you can clear it in live doubt clearing sessions
which will be organized every weekend.

*2. Mentor-led/Live classes: *You will be having live Zoom classes at 6:30
PM  for 2 to 3 days a week. You will get your recorded sessions as well
LMS(Learning Management System) portal which you will have access to for 6
months.

After Completion of the program, the student shall receive a:

‚úÖProgram completion certificate issued by IIT KHARAGPUR.
‚úÖCo-Branded Internship certificate from Top MNCs.
‚úÖAccess to a growing community.

*The students must fill out the form to get this opportunity:*
*https://forms.gle/HdLDJbWdPSA7nRdQ9 <https://forms.gle/HdLDJbWdPSA7nRdQ9>*

subject: Fwd: CHARUSAT - Indian Knowledge System - Story Narrating Competition - Invitation for students to participate
snippet: Dear All, We are thrilled to invite all the students of CHARUSAT to participate in the upcoming Storytelling Competition, an event designed to celebrate the power of storytelling and creativity. This
content:
Dear All,

We are thrilled to invite all the students of CHARUSAT to participate in
the upcoming *Storytelling Competition*, an event designed to celebrate the
power of storytelling and creativity. This is their chance to bring stories
to life through compelling narration, expressive delivery, and engaging
presentation.

Whether they have a story to tell or wish to experience the magic of
storytelling, this competition is an excellent platform to showcase talent
and captivate the audience.

üìÖ *Date:* February 21, 2025 (Friday)

üìç *Venue:* Will be communicated to registered students

All the details regarding rules, judging criteria, and registration are
provided in the *attached brochure*. Kindly go through it, share it with
your students and inform the interested students to register by February
20, 2025.

Students should not miss this wonderful opportunity to refine their
storytelling skills and gain recognition for their talent.

We look forward to an exciting and inspiring event!

For any queries, feel free to reach out to *Dr. Kinjal Bhatia (+91
9033395935). *

Thanking you in anticipation of your positive response,

With regards,

Binit Patel
Bhaskar Pandya


-- 
*Regards:*
Mr. Pravin Jadav,
Assistant Professor,
Department of Computer Engineering,
Devang Patel Institute of Advance Technology and Research (DEPSTAR),
Charotar University of Science and Technology (CHARUSAT),
 AT: Changa, Ta:Petlad, Dist:Anand, Gujarat.

--

subject: CHARUSAT | FoH | Story Narrating Competition
snippet: Foundation Day 2025 Story Narrating Competition 2025 Jointly organized by Indukaka Ipcowala Institute of Management [IIIM] & Faculty of Humanities [FoH] "Unleash Your Imagination, Let Your
content:
[Foundation Day 2025]
[https://mailer.charusat.org.in/index.php/campaigns/ba137rl8rs736/track-url/ls409tohbwc79/20986db598676eb1ed549684c002d31f5728889c]


STORY NARRATING COMPETITION 2025

 Jointly organized by 

INDUKAKA IPCOWALA INSTITUTE OF MANAGEMENT [IIIM]
&
FACULTY OF HUMANITIES [FOH]

"Unleash Your Imagination, Let Your Story Shine!"

"Storytelling is an age-old art that captivates audiences, stimulates
imagination, and preserves cultural heritage. Join us in this exciting
event where stories come to life, imagination knows no bounds, and
voices create unforgettable experiences!" 

üåü ABOUT THE EVENT

STORY NARRATING COMPETITION 2025, organized under the theme
INDIAN KNOWLEDGE SYSTEM, is here to celebrate creativity, culture, and
storytelling!

üìÖ DATE & TIME: February 21, 2025 | 10:30 AM onwards 

üé≠ REGISTRATION DETAILS

 	* REGISTER BY: February 20, 2025
 	* STORY THEME: Folk Tales, Inspirational Stories, Mythological
Tales, or Fictional Narratives

Register Now
[https://mailer.charusat.org.in/index.php/campaigns/ba137rl8rs736/track-url/ls409tohbwc79/deffdbff2458022a5a6fc21a81761850f8a7161d]


üèÜ AWARDS & CERTIFICATIONS

 	* üèÖ WINNER & RUNNER-UP: Trophy
 	* üìú ALL PARTICIPANTS: Participation Certificate
 	* EVENT CONVENORS: Dr. Binit Patel | Dr. Bhaskar Pandya
 	* EVENT COORDINATOR: Dr. Kinjal Bhatia
 	* CONTACT INFORMATION: +91 9033395935
[https://mailer.charusat.org.in/index.php/campaigns/ba137rl8rs736/track-url/ls409tohbwc79/309b22b6c6cc4f64be972de0ba0d4daab6df6da8]

üì¢ GENERAL RULES

 	* The competition is open to all registered students. Participants
must confirm their registration before the event.
 	* The narration must be in English.
 	* Each participant will have a 3 to 5-minute time slot for their
narration. Exceeding the limit may result in a penalty.
 	* Minimal use of handheld props is allowed, but the focus should
remain on narration. Visual presentations are not permitted.
 	* The storytelling should be engaging, expressive, and creative.
Unique presentation styles are encouraged.
 	* Participants must narrate their stories from memory. Reading
directly from a script is not allowed.

üîπ JUDGING CRITERIA

 	* üìñ Content & Creativity
 	* üé§ Expression & Voice Modulation
 	* üíÉ Body Language & Presentation
 	* ‚è≥ Time Management
 	* üåü Overall Impact

üîπ ADDITIONAL GUILDELINES

 	* DRESS CODE: Participants should dress appropriately for their
narration. Costumes are optional but should not overpower the
storytelling.
 	* PUNCTUALITY: Participants must arrive at least 30 minutes before
their scheduled slot.

üé§ We can't wait to hear your stories! See you there! üé≠

-------------------------

With best Regards,
MR. KRUTEN PATEL
Executive Officer - Corporate Communications

subject: MSUD102-Reading Material, Assignment, and Practice Examples for Unit 2 & Unit 5
snippet: Dear Students, I have attached the reading material for Unit 2 and Unit 5, along with assignment questions and practice examples for both units. Once you complete Unit 1 and Unit 4, the assignment
content:
Dear Students,

I have attached the reading material for *Unit 2 and Unit 5*, along with
assignment questions and practice examples for both units.

Once you complete *Unit 1 and Unit 4*, the assignment evaluation will
begin. Therefore, please ensure that you write your assignments regularly.

If you have any queries or concerns, feel free to meet me in *Room 309,
CSPIT*, or communicate via email. I will be happy to assist you.

Best regards,
*Dr. Bina Patel*
*Assistant Professor*
*Department of Mathematical Sciences *
*PDPIAS, CHARUSAT, Changa-388421*
*Accredited Grade A+ by NAAC*

*Mob. No: **+91-9427777856  *

Dear students,

Kindly join the online lecture of MSUD102 (Engineering Mathematics II) from
10.00 am onwards on 15th February, Saturday through the following link.

https://teams.microsoft.com/l/meetup-join/19%3ameeting_ZjJmZGFmYmEtZjk0OS00NWVmLThjMGYtMmQyNjQ2NWNjYTBm%40thread.v2/0?context=%7b%22Tid%22%3a%228dbd2884-120c-413b-80b2-1117dd3469a4%22%2c%22Oid%22%3a%223ed35552-5e3c-4b13-916a-3622e7a12052%22%7d

subject: Fwd: Introducing Online Suggestion Box for Your Valuable Input
snippet: Dear students, Kindly go through the trailing email and feel free to give your inputs/suggestions (if any) Thank You ---------- Forwarded message --------- From: Head CE Depstar <hod.ceds@charusat.
content:
Dear students,

Kindly go through the trailing email and feel free to give your
inputs/suggestions (if any)

Thank You

---------- Forwarded message ---------
From: Head CE Depstar <hod.ceds@charusat.ac.in>
Date: Tue, Jan 23, 2024 at 1:44‚ÄØPM
Subject: Introducing Online Suggestion Box for Your Valuable Input
To: <20dce@charusat.edu.in>, <21dce@charusat.edu.in>, <22dce@charusat.edu.in>,
<23dce@charusat.edu.in>
Cc: kashyap patel <kashyappatel.dce@charusat.ac.in>, Kalpesh Patel <
kalpeshpatel.ec@charusat.ac.in>, Vivek Patel <vivekpatel.ce@charusat.ac.in>,
DEPSTAR_CE <depstar_ce@charusat.ac.in>, Atul Patel <
atulpatel.mca@charusat.ac.in>


Dear students,

As part of our ongoing efforts to enhance your academic experience and make
communication more accessible, Department of Computer Engineering; DEPSTAR;
FTE; CHARUSAT is excited to announce the *initiation of our Online
Suggestion Box*, a platform designed exclusively for you to share your
thoughts, ideas, and feedback conveniently.

*How It Works:*

We have implemented a user-friendly system that allows you to submit
suggestions effortlessly. *Simply scan the QR code *provided in this email
or posted around the department notice board (near staff-room 227-228), and
you will be directed to the Online Suggestion Box. Kindly enter the
suggestion in the parameter (preferably in English)

*Confidentiality Guaranteed:*

We understand the importance of privacy when sharing your thoughts. *Rest
assured that your suggestions are confidential, and no identifying
information will be visible to the reviewer of the suggestion box*. Your
feedback will be used solely for the purpose of improving our department
and enhancing the overall student experience.

*Why Your Input Matters:*

Your insights are invaluable in shaping the future of our department. *Whether
you have ideas for curriculum improvement, suggestions for extracurricular
activities, or feedback on any aspect of your academic journey, we
encourage you to share your thoughts*. Your input helps us identify areas
for enhancement and ensures that we continue to meet your expectations.

*Benefits of the Online Suggestion Box:*

   1. *Accessibility*: Submit suggestions from anywhere, at any time, using
   your smartphone or other electronic devices.
   2. *Timely Feedback*: Provide feedback promptly as ideas come to mind,
   fostering a more dynamic and responsive improvement process.
   3. *Anonymity*: Feel free to express your opinions candidly, knowing
   that your identity will remain confidential.

We believe that by actively participating in this initiative, you
contribute to the development of a more inclusive and student-centric
learning environment. *Monthly detailed report stating the suggestions
received along with action taken/action-to-take will be sent to all via
email.*

 Thank you in advance for your cooperation and for being an essential part
of our ongoing improvement efforts.

[image: QR code.png]




-- 
Regards:
Dr Dweepna Garg
Head Of Department & Assistant Professor
Department of Computer Engineering
Devang Patel Institute of Advance Technology and Research (DEPSTAR)
Charotar University of Science and Technology (CHARUSAT)
Contact No. : 02697-265321 (Intercom)

subject: Fwd: URGENT: Call for Participation - National Summit on Cyber Warfare & OSINT Hackathon 2025
snippet: Dear Students, AICTE is proud to partner with UPSIFS and Cybervidyapeeth Foundation for India's First Summit on Dimensions of Cyber Warfare, scheduled for March 16-21, 2025, in Lucknow. This
content:
Dear Students,

AICTE is proud to partner with UPSIFS and Cybervidyapeeth Foundation for
India's First Summit on Dimensions of Cyber Warfare, scheduled for March
16-21, 2025, in Lucknow. This initiative represents a critical step in
strengthening our nation's cyber defense capabilities.

The summit features two flagship events:

   1. *Call for Papers (March 17-18)*


   - Focus areas: Cognitive warfare, deepfake detection, OSINT,
   cryptocurrency investigation
   - Selected papers receive Ministry of Defense recognition
   - Publication opportunities in leading journals
   - Cash prizes up to INR 75,000 per category


   1. *OSINT Hackathon (March 16-18)*


   - 72-hour intensive development
   - Team size: 5 members
   - Focus on practical tool development
   - Cash prizes up to INR 125,000
   - Industry internship opportunities

This summit aligns with AICTE's commitment to fostering innovation in
cybersecurity education and research. The participation of your
institution's faculty and students is crucial for its success.

I strongly urge you to:

   - Share this information with all departments
   - Encourage faculty and student participation
   - Facilitate team formation for the hackathon
   - Support research paper submissions

Registration deadline: February 28, 2025 Full details at:
https://cybervedmanthan.in
<https://jan-sampark.nic.in/jansampark/click.jsp?tab=pmo&urlid=eb7cb23e04aaa5b60e42499adb30f309a09fd6bc&lat=2025&mid=f7360845f9716173bbbd62799f51fb5d532694e8>

Together, let's strengthen India's cyber warfare capabilities.

snippet: Thanks and regards, Ms. Neeta Chudasama Assistant Professor Department of Computer Engineering Devang Patel Institute of Advance Technology and Research (DEPSTAR) Charotar University of Science and
content:
Thanks and regards,

Assistant Professor

Department of Computer Engineering

Devang Patel Institute of Advance Technology and Research (DEPSTAR)

Charotar University of Science and Technology (CHARUSAT)

Contact No.: 9428972072


*Dear all,*

*In today‚Äôs world, personal safety and self-defense skills are essential
for everyone, especially for girls and women. *

*With rising concerns about safety and personal security, it is imperative
to equip young women with the skills and knowledge to protect themselves in
various situations.*

*CMPICA is organizing Interactive and hands-on self-defense training
session for female students and staff members of CHARUSAT, under EOC on 6th
March, 2025, 10:00AM to 12:00PM by **Sensei Chetan Fumakiya, Pratibha
Academy, Under the Project of Pratibha Self Defense Foundation.*

*All the interested female students and staff members are requested to
register using below link on or before 25/2/25:*
https://forms.gle/FHRA2WXU6t7zX2YZ6

*** The venue will be communicated soon.*

*****EOC Department Coordinators are requested to encourage students to
participate and please forward this mail to students of your department.*

Dr. Mittal Desai,
Assistant Professor, MCA Department, CMPICA.
Officer on Special Duty - Charusat Innovation Venture Fund (CIVF)
CHARUSAT Campus,
At. & Post:- Changa, Tal: Petlad, Dist: Anand
Gujarat-388 421, India

subject: Fwd: Certification course on ‚ÄúApplied AI: From Data Visualization to Generative Models‚Äù
snippet: ---------- Forwarded message --------- From: Dean FCA CHARUSAT <dean.fca@charusat.ac.in> Date: Mon, Feb 10, 2025 at 1:19 PM Subject: Certification course on ‚ÄúApplied AI: From Data Visualization
content:
---------- Forwarded message ---------
From: Dean FCA CHARUSAT <dean.fca@charusat.ac.in>
Date: Mon, Feb 10, 2025 at 1:19‚ÄØPM
Subject: Certification course on ‚ÄúApplied AI: From Data Visualization to
Generative Models‚Äù
To: Charusat Family <charusatfamily@charusat.ac.in>


Dear Family Members,

Greetings of the day!

Smt. Chandaben Mohanbhai Patel Institute of Computer Applications (CMPICA)
is pleased to announce a certification course on *‚ÄúApplied AI: From Data
Visualization to Generative Models.‚Äù*

This course covers both fundamental and advanced concepts of AI
applications, including AutoML, Power BI, Deep Learning, and a special
focus on Generative AI and its industry applications*.* It is designed
for *Undergraduate
and Postgraduate students, PhD Scholars, Faculty Members, and Working
Professionals* looking to explore this domain and build a career in AI.

The course commences on February 15, 2025 (Saturday), and will be conducted
in a hybrid mode with sessions every Saturday. A detailed syllabus is
available here: Course Details
<https://www.charusat.ac.in/cmpica/files/AI/AnnexureCC.pdf>.

The *brochure* is attached for your reference.

üîπ *Registration Link:* Click Here <https://forms.gle/8CckUMRfY2THhrPM9>
üîπ *Registration Fee:* ‚Çπ499/-
üîπ *Last Date to Register:* February 14, 2025

We kindly request you to share this information along with the brochure
with your students, faculty members, and colleagues and encourage them to
register.

Looking forward to your support.
Regards,


-- 
*Regards:*
Mr. Pravin Jadav,
Assistant Professor,
Department of Computer Engineering,
Devang Patel Institute of Advance Technology and Research (DEPSTAR),
Charotar University of Science and Technology (CHARUSAT),
 AT: Changa, Ta:Petlad, Dist:Anand, Gujarat.

subject: Fwd: Enroll Now: Free Self-Paced E-Course on Patent Practices in Research for CHARUSAT Members
snippet: Dear All, We are pleased to announce the launch of our free, self-paced e-course, "Patent Practices in Research," exclusively for CHARUSAT students (UG, PG, PhD), faculty, and other members.
content:
*Dear All,*

We are pleased to announce the launch of our *free, self-paced e-course,
"Patent Practices in Research,"* exclusively for CHARUSAT students (UG, PG,
PhD), faculty, and other members. This course is designed to provide a
comprehensive understanding of Intellectual Property Rights (IPR), focusing
on patents with a technical perspective to facilitate easier comprehension
for the research community.

*Course Highlights:*

   - Understand fundamental concepts of Intellectual Property and Patents
   - Learn to identify patentable ideas and non-patentable subject matters
   in India
   - Gain insights into the Indian patent system and processes
   - Hands-on experience in patent search using open-source and commercial
   databases

*How to Enroll:*

   1. *Register for the course (Mandatory):* Click Here
   <https://forms.gle/xrsRLVqjciVWaKSZ9>
   2. *Join the Google Classroom to access course content:* Click Here
   <https://classroom.google.com/c/MzA2NDc3MzE4NzU2?cjc=73dyeph>
   3. *Complete the assessment for certification:* Click Here
   <https://classroom.google.com/c/MzA2NDc3MzE4NzU2/a/MzA2NDgyODI3Mzgy/details>

*Course Enrollment:* Open throughout the year.

We encourage all CHARUSAT members to take advantage of this valuable
opportunity to enhance their knowledge and skills in the domain of patents
and intellectual property rights.

*Circulate this information to the students from your department / college
also.*

For any queries, please feel free to contact us.

Best Regards,
CHARUSAT IPR Cell
*Dean Research*

Accredited Grade ‚ÄúA+‚Äù by NAAC, GOI

Charotar University of Science and Technology (CHARUSAT)
Off. Nadiad - Petlad Highway, Changa, Gujarat, INDIA 388421
www.charusat.ac.in


-- 
*Regards:*
Mr. Pravin Jadav,
Assistant Professor,
Department of Computer Engineering,
Devang Patel Institute of Advance Technology and Research (DEPSTAR),
Charotar University of Science and Technology (CHARUSAT),
 AT: Changa, Ta:Petlad, Dist:Anand, Gujarat.

--

subject: Launched Global & KSHITIJ IIT-KGP TRAINING & INTERNSHIP NOW AVAILABLE for CHARUSAT UNIVERSITY Students
snippet: Dear CHARUSAT student, we warmly invite you to participate in the Launched Global Collaboration with the KSHITIJ IIT KHARAGPUR Industrial Learning and Certification Program. To learn more about you,
content:
Dear *CHARUSAT* student,
we warmly invite you to participate in the *Launched Global*
<https://launchedglobal.in/> Collaboration with the *KSHITIJ IIT KHARAGPUR*
<https://ktj.in/sponsors> *Industrial Learning and Certification Program.*

*To learn more about you, please fill out the application form.*

Click here to Submit <https://forms.gle/CoW2kzegN8K5gPih9>


*IMPORTANT ANNOUNCEMENT: Once You filled out the form kindly share the form
to your friends and make sure everyone fills out the form*

*Join Our Official WhatsApp Group For More Information;*

*https://chat.whatsapp.com/FoCH2ksmzC31ogZEhbaMTy
<https://chat.whatsapp.com/FoCH2ksmzC31ogZEhbaMTy>*



*Preferred Slots:- MARCH to JUNE*
*FIND THE BELOW ATTACHMENTS FOR REFERENCE:*

*First month: Industrial training has been designed in the form of Live
lectures along with living mentorship from industry professionals. (Login
credentials will be provided to students after registration)*

*Second month:* Internship with live mentorship for projects from
professionals. The LIVE INDUSTRY PROJECT will give students experience in
solving real-world problems.


*Project 1:- *10 individual projects are assigned to each intern, which
they must complete with their mentor.

*Project 2:-  Capstone Project: It's a group project assigned to 15
interns. For each intern particular work will be assigned to them, and they
have to work on it.*
(Essential data and materials required for the project will be provided by
the company side itself)

*Here are two types of Classes we are providing:*

*1. Blended Program/Recorded classes: *You will receive recorded sessions,
whatever doubts you have you can clear them in live doubt-clearing sessions
organized every weekend.

*2. Mentor-led/Live classes: *You will have live Zoom classes at 6:30 PM 2
to 3 days a week. You will get your recorded sessions as well
You will have access to the LMS(Learning Management System) portal for 6
months.

*Program Highlights:*

: India's First - offering programs with low-code and no-code tools, with a
promise of 100% outcome-driven results
: Certifications from *LaunchEd - KSHITIJ IIT KGP* verified through Wipro
Dice ID
: Learn from tech-giant mentors and industry leaders
: Cutting-edge curriculum including generative AI and prompt engineering
: Exclusive masterclasses with students, founders, and CXos from top global
companies
Personalized instructors for comprehensive guidance from start to finish

*Secure your spot now to pave the way for a successful career journey with
LaunchED Academy!*

*YOUR SUCCESS AWAITS! Don't miss the chance to supercharge your career with
our Upskilling Career Program. Limited slots are available, so act now to
secure your spot and gain a competitive edge in the dynamic job market.*

*üöÄ Embark on Your Journey to Success with LaunchED Academy. Your Future
starts here!*

subject: INFO_STUDENT
snippet: Dear Student of Charotar University of Science and Technology, We are excited to introduce a 2-Months Training + Internship Program in collaboration with IIT Kharagpur Kshitij, designed to boost your
content:
Dear Student of* Charotar University of Science and Technology,*

We are excited to introduce a 2-Months Training + Internship Program in
collaboration with *IIT Kharagpur Kshitij*, designed to boost your skills
and career prospects.

üîπ Training Overview

*Comprehensive Training & Mentorship*

   - Month 1: Live interactive sessions with industry experts.
   - Month 2: Hands-on internship projects with expert guidance.

*Industry-Recognized Certifications*

   - Certificate of Completion from IIT Kharagpur Kshitij.
   - Internship Certificate verified by Wipro DICE ID and top MNCs.

*Professional Skill Development*

   - Learn Generative AI, Prompt Engineering, and No-Code/Low-Code
   Applications.
   - Attend guest lectures from leaders at Microsoft & Meta.

*Exclusive Benefits*

   - 6-month access to a personalized LMS portal.
   - Placement Assistance through a dedicated career community.
   - 24/7 Mentorship & Doubt-Clearing to keep you on track.

Application Details




* - Application Form: https://forms.gle/7Egx785ngqPkMhXY9
<https://forms.gle/7Egx785ngqPkMhXY9>- Referral ID: CHST25 (For CHARUSAT
Students Only)- Application Deadline: 08:00 PM | 05th February 2025 *

*Note: *Today is the final day for registration, students registration
details will be sent to the Training and Placement Cell by EOD. So kindly
fill up the form before the deadline and complete your registration.



*For students already enrolled, please ignore this message.*

Best regards,
*Academic Head*
*LaunchEd Global | IIT Kharagpur Kshitij*

subject: EOC Activity by CSPIT[CE] CREATIVE PROJECT IDEAS FOR IMPROVING THE LIVES OF SPECIALLY ABLED PEOPLE.
snippet: Dear All, U & P U. Patel Department of Computer Engineering, CSPIT organizes the following Event in step towards helping people having disabilities or Physically Challenged. Title of the Event:
content:
Dear All,
U & P U. Patel Department of Computer Engineering, CSPIT organizes the
following Event in step towards helping people having disabilities or
Physically Challenged.

Title of the Event:* " CREATIVE PROJECT IDEAS FOR IMPROVING THE LIVES OF
SPECIALLY ABLED PEOPLE "*

*Guidelines:*
1.    Students may submit their creative working project ideas on a drawing
sheet of paper/PPT/PDF.
*Submission Link:* https://forms.gle/GUHRx6sLvhYPatmx7
These can be further modified on the day of presentation [15/02/2025].

2.    Last Extended Date of Entry Submission: 8th February, 2025 [Ideas
through online shared google form]. Each student has to make a separate
entry using the shared google form link.

3.    Students may use a pen, pencil, sketch pen or any other tools
[Computer Software/Hardware] to depict their ideas on the *day of
presentation [Date: 15/02/2025, Venue: MAC LAB (601), A7 Building*].
Participants must remain present in *MAC LAB (601) [A7 Building] from 09:15
am to 12:00 pm on 15/02/2025*, Saturday to present their project ideas.
Students may use presentations and poster to demonstrate their project
ideas.

4.    Students may show Project Implementation

5.    Students may submit their ideas in a group of a maximum 3 students.

6.    You need to submit your poster presentation in hard copy, it's size
should be A3.

7.    Best of the THREE Innovative Ideas will be awarded prize money &
certificate (First prize 1500 Rs/-, Second Prize 1000 Rs/-, Third Prize 500
Rs/-). Others will receive a certificate of participation.

*NOTE : *
Individual entries are also allowed .
For group entries you are free to form a group from any department and any
institute.
Make sure the maximum number of members of the group should not exceed 3 .

For any further query you may please contact student coordinators
( *23CE115 - Priya Pedhadiya (63549 14979)*   and   *23CE022 - Devam
Ghodasara (94264 31542)* ).

-- 
Thanks & Regards.
Priya B Pedhadiya.
@23ce115@charusat.edu.in

subject: "Internship_Career -UG Students of CHARUSAT UNIVERSITY "
snippet: Dear Student bearing Enrollment ID 24dce084 from CHARUSAT UNIVERSITY. Congratulations on being shortlisted for the internship program! [IMPORTANT] LaunchEd Global in Collaboration IIT KHARAGPUR (
content:
*Dear Student bearing Enrollment ID 24dce084** from CHARUSAT UNIVERSITY*.
*Congratulations on being shortlisted for the internship program!*
*[IMPORTANT]*

*LaunchEd Global* in Collaboration   *IIT KHARAGPUR (Kshitij) is* Organizing
a *2-month training & internship program with certifications from WIPRO
Dice ID, IBM, CISCO, META, and AICTE-approved.  *Gain *industry-leading
skills* and *real-world experience* to advance your career!

*Fill out the Google Form today to reserve your place in the program:*

*https://forms.gle/VWhzEk9Fp23BKQmV9 <https://forms.gle/VWhzEk9Fp23BKQmV9>*

*Join Our Official WhatsApp Group For More Information: *
*https://chat.whatsapp.com/HQlb0D2oAFl2Dfp4q9e3wR*
<https://chat.whatsapp.com/HQlb0D2oAFl2Dfp4q9e3wR>

*Here is an outline of the program's structure.*
*1. Training Outline*

   - *Live Mentoring with Industry Experts:* Evening classes (6:30 PM -
   8:00 PM) are conducted live on the Zoom platform to fit your schedule. Get
   guidance at every step.
- *From Basics to Advanced:* Perfect for beginners and those looking to
   refine advanced skills, starting from scratch.
- *AI-Powered Development Made Easy*: Build applications with minimal
   coding, create innovative solutions using Generative AI, and easily design
   effective AI prompts.
- *LMS Access for Flexibility: *Recorded live sessions will be uploaded to
   the Learning Management System (LMS) and available for 6 months from the
   batch start date. Login credentials will be shared after registration,
   ensuring uninterrupted learning at your own pace.

*2. Internship Conduct*

   - *10+ Minor Project**: *The minor project is an individual project,
   where students will work on projects related to each topic they are
   learning.
   - *Major Project (CAPSTONE):* The major project is a group project, and
   you will work in a group of 3-4 interns, with specific responsibilities
   assigned to each intern. The company will provide you with all the required
   data and materials for the project.
   - *Resume Building*: Get expert guidance to craft a standout resume that
   gets noticed.
   - *Mock Interviews*: Receive feedback from industry experts to sharpen
   your interview skills.
   - *Masterclasses*: Learn from top leaders in global companies through
   exclusive sessions.

*Certifications Provided*

   - *Course Certificate*: Receive a prestigious certificate from
   IIT-KHARAGPUR (Kshitij)
   - *Internship Certificate*: Earn a certificate from our partnered MNCs &
   StartUps.
   - *Verified by WIPRO Dice ID*: Both the Certificates will be verified by
   WIPRO Dice ID
   - *100% Placement Assistance: *Join Our Growth Community for Direct
   Placement Support with Top Companies.

*Subject:* Online SSIP Sensitization Session for Students - Session Details
for Charotar University of Science and Technology (Charusat)


Dear SSIP Grantee,

Thank you for providing your preferred dates for the online SSIP
Sensitization session. We appreciate your prompt response.

We are pleased to inform you that we have allocated a session based on your
preferences. Here are the session details:

- Session Name: Innovation, Startups & SSIP 2.0 for Students
- Date: 3rd February 2025
- Time: 02: 00 PM Onwards
-  Link to Join the Session:
https://teams.microsoft.com/l/meetup-join/19%3ameeting_NDZhZDBkYTctOGI2My00ZjExLTg3NjAtOTA3NjJjNzI1MzZi%40thread.v2/0?context=%7b%22Tid%22%3a%2205b5fe2e-db2c-48e5-bfd8-778b75cb0f8e%22%2c%22Oid%22%3a%225a944030-a39c-4aa6-ba4b-b718834fd228%22%7d


Meeting ID: 439 865 590 833

Passcode: ou9Vn9L5

Important Points to Note:

1. To facilitate a smooth session, students can be assembled in an
auditorium or classroom, and the online session will be projected for their
viewing.
2. Alternatively, links can be provided to students to join the session
directly.
3. Please note that this session is considered an "SSIP Sensitization
Session" event for your institution. Therefore, you are required to upload
event details, including pictures and attendance sheets, on the SSIP MIS
portal.
4. We encourage you to announce an IDEA competition immediately after the
session to encourage students to submit their innovative ideas. This will
enable us to fund a good number of Proof of Concepts (POCs) under this
policy.
5.  All the faculties are requested to join the session for better
understanding about the policy.

If you have any queries or concerns, please feel free to reach out to us.

Thank you again for your cooperation.

Regards,

SSIP -2.0, State PMU

subject: Fwd: Invitation to Workshop Series: Introduction to Quantum Computing: Fundamentals and Applications
snippet: Refer the trailing mail and interested can register. ---------- Forwarded message --------- From: Head CE Depstar <hod.ceds@charusat.ac.in> Date: Sat, Feb 1, 2025 at 3:59 PM Subject: Fwd:
content:
Refer the trailing mail and interested can register.

---------- Forwarded message ---------
From: Head CE Depstar <hod.ceds@charusat.ac.in>
Date: Sat, Feb 1, 2025 at 3:59‚ÄØPM
Subject: Fwd: Invitation to Workshop Series: Introduction to Quantum
Computing: Fundamentals and Applications
To: Pravin Jadav <pravinjadav.dce@charusat.ac.in>, kashyap patel <
kashyappatel.dce@charusat.ac.in>, Neeta Chudasama <
neetachudasama.dce@charusat.ac.in>
Cc: Dipak Ramoliya <dipakramoliya.ce@charusat.ac.in>

Dear Students,
>
> We are pleased to invite you to an exciting *workshop series on
> "Introduction to Quantum Computing: Fundamentals and Applications"* organized
> by the *Department of Computer Science & Engineering, **Devang Patel
> Institute of Advance Technology and Research (DEPSTAR), Charotar** University
> of Science and Technology (CHARUSAT).*
> *Workshop Details:*
>
> üìÖ *Date:* 7th February 2025
> ‚è∞ *Time:* 12:10 PM ‚Äì 02:00 PM
> üë®‚Äçüè´ *Speaker:* Dr. Nilesh Dubey, Assistant Professor, Department of
> Computer Science & Engineering, DEPSTAR, CHARUSAT
> *Objective:*
>
> This workshop aims to provide undergraduate students with a *comprehensive
> introduction to quantum computing*, covering its fundamental principles
> and real-world applications.
>
> üìå *Register now* and don‚Äôt miss out on this knowledge-packed session!
>
> https://forms.gle/nff8JdvX13CDkpLFA
> *Agenda:**Module 1: Introduction to Quantum Computing*
>
> üîπ What is Quantum Computing?
> üîπ History and Evolution
> üîπ Classical vs. Quantum Computing
> üîπ Importance and Impact
> *Module 2: Quantum Mechanics Basics*
>
> üîπ Wave-Particle Duality
> üîπ Superposition
> üîπ Entanglement
> üîπ Measurement and Observation
> *Module 3: Quantum Computing Concepts*
>
> üîπ Qubits and Quantum Gates
> üîπ Quantum Circuits and Algorithms
> *Module 4: Quantum Computing Applications*
>
> üîπ Cryptography and Security
> üîπ Optimization and Simulation
> üîπ Machine Learning and AI
>
> This is a great opportunity to *gain insights into the future of
> computing and explore potential research and career opportunities in this
> field.*
>
> Looking forward to your participation!
> [image: Endowment.png]
>
> --
> *Dipak Ramoliya** /Assistant Professor,*
> Department of Computer Science & Engineering, DEPSTAR,
> Charotar University of Science & Technology(CHARUSAT)- Changa,
> Email: dipakramoliya.ce@charusat.ac.in,

>

subject: Opportunity to Join Blockchain Discussion on Bharat Blockchain Network
snippet: Dear Students, I hope you are doing well. We are excited to invite you to participate in an engaging Blockchain Discussion hosted on the Bharat Blockchain Network Discord Community. This is a great
content:
Dear Students,

I hope you are doing well.

We are excited to invite you to participate in an engaging *Blockchain
Discussion* hosted on the *Bharat Blockchain Network Discord Community*.
This is a great opportunity for blockchain enthusiasts to expand their
knowledge, interact with like-minded individuals, and showcase their
expertise.
*Discussion Details:*

   - *Format:* A structured discussion (not a formal debate) on a relevant
   blockchain topic.
   - *Topic:* Will be shared upon confirmation of participation.
   - *Preparation Time:* 3 days after topic announcement.
   - *Team Requirement:* 2 teams of at least 4 members each.
   - *Prizes:* Exciting rewards for outstanding contributions!

*Why Participate?*

   - Gain insights into the latest blockchain trends.
   - Engage in meaningful discussions with industry professionals.
   - Enhance your knowledge and critical thinking skills in blockchain
   technology.
   - A chance to win prizes for demonstrating exceptional understanding and
   ideas.

*How to Confirm Your Participation?*

To confirm your participation, please *reply to this email* with your team
details, including:

   - *Team Member Names*
   - *ID Numbers*
   - *Contact Numbers*

We look forward to your participation and an insightful discussion!

Best Regards,

*Shrey Lakhtaria**Dhairya Kanabar*
*Campus Ambassador, IDS/BBN*

-- 


Shrey Lakhtaria

Computer Science Engineering, CSPIT.

<https://github.com/shreylakhtaria>
<https://www.linkedin.com/in/shrey-lakhataria/>
<https://www.instagram.com/shrey7120/>

subject: Industrial Training & Academic Internship Internship Program Organized For CHARUSAT University Students
snippet: Dear Students of CHARUSAT ( 1st yr ) [ IMPORTANT] Salutations! We are in collaboration with IITs and are organizing a 2 Months Training + Internship program with certifications from CISCO, META[
content:
*Dear Students of CHARUSAT*
*( 1st yr )*
*[ IMPORTANT]*

*Salutations!*

We are in collaboration with *IITs  *and are organizing a 2 Months Training
+ Internship program with certifications from *CISCO, META[FACEBOOK], IBM* &
various other MNCs' s in technical and non-technical domains. We are
enrolling *SHORTLISTED STUDENTS *in the program for Charusat

*Note: If any of your batchmates are missed or haven't received
the notification, recipients are allowed to send this mail to them.*
*Registrations closing in 12 Hours.*

*https://forms.gle/og9XrYBWH4VBmFnXA* <https://forms.gle/og9XrYBWH4VBmFnXA>

*Students must submit their application. After getting shortlisted, you
will be getting a response from our HR Team:*




*FIND THE BELOW ATTACHMENTS FOR REFERENCE:*
*First month:* IIT training has been designed in the form of Live lectures
along with live mentorship from industry professionals. (Login credentials
will be provided to students after registration)

*Second month:* Internship with live mentorship for projects from
professionals. The LIVE INDUSTRY PROJECT will give students experience in
solving real-world problems.

*Project 1:-* 10 individual projects assigned to each intern which they
have to complete with their mentor.

*Project 2:-*  Capstone Project: It's a group project assigned to a group
of 15 interns. For each intern particular work will be assigned to them
they have to work on it.
(Essential data and materials required for the project will be provided by
the company side itself)

*Two types of Classes, we are providing:*

*1. Blended Program:* You will receive recorded sessions, whatever doubts
you have you can clear it in live doubt-clearing sessions which will be
organized every weekend.

*2. Mentor-led:* You will be having live Zoom classes at 6:30 PM  for 2 to
3 days a week. You will receive your recorded sessions as well
LMS(Learning Management System) portal which you will have admittance to
for 6 months.


*After Completion of the program, the student shall receive a:*
‚úÖ *Program completion certificate* issued by IITs.
‚úÖ *Certificates verified* through *Wipro* Dice ID.
‚úÖ Co-Branded *Internship certificate from Top MNCs.*
‚úÖ *100 percent Placement Assistance.*
‚úÖ Admittance to a *growing community*.
‚úÖ Program Offering with *Low-Code and No-Code Tools. *
‚úÖ *100 percent Outcome Driven Result.*
‚úÖ The curriculum includes *Generative AI and Prompt Engineering.*
‚úÖ *Exclusive Masterclasses* with *Founders and CXOs of Top Global
Companies.*
‚úÖ *Personalized Instructors* for proper guidance.

*[THIS NOTIFICATION FOR THE ENROLLMENT OF  FEB-MARCH, MARCH-APRIL &
APRIL-MAY BATCHES FOR STUDENTS WHO HAVEN'T BEEN ABLE TO ACCEPT THE
SCHOLARSHIP SLOT FOR THE SAME.]*

subject: Fwd: Regarding first year result - KYA
snippet: Dear Students, The results have been declared. If you are not satisfied with your grades in any subject, you can apply for Know Your Answer Sheet (KYA) within 3 working days, with the last date to
content:
Dear Students,

The results have been declared. If you are not satisfied with your grades
in any subject, you can apply for *Know Your Answer Sheet (KYA) *within 3
working days, with the last date to apply being *February 3.*

Please note that KYA is only applicable for the Theory University Exam and
not for internal or practical exams.

You can apply for KYA through e-Governance, either on campus or from
outside the campus. *The fee for KYA is ‚Çπ500 per subject*. After applying
for KYA, you will receive a call as well as an email from the exam section
to inform you of the date on which you need to visit with your parents to
review your answer sheet.

Students who wish to apply for KYA and have a backlog must meet me by
tomorrow. Additionally, *Supplementary Exam 1* will be conducted 15 days
after the result declaration.

--
