subject: Fwd: Invitation | Raisina Hackathon | 19 February 2025 | Vadodara
snippet: Dear Students, Please refer to the email below. If you are interested, kindly contact me by 05/02/2024. ---------- Forwarded message --------- From: Anusha Kesarkar Gavankar <anusha.gavankar@
content:
Dear Students,

Please refer to the email below. If you are interested, kindly contact me
by 05/02/2024.

---------- Forwarded message ---------
From: Anusha Kesarkar Gavankar <anusha.gavankar@orfonline.org>
Date: Wed, Jan 29, 2025 at 10:46‚ÄØAM
Subject: Invitation | Raisina Hackathon | 19 February 2025 | Vadodara
To: <principal.depstar@charusat.ac.in>
Cc: Tanya Aggarwal <tanya.aggarwal@orfonline.org>, Dharmil Doshi <
dharmil.doshi@orfonline.org>


Dear Dr. Bankim Patel,

Greetings from the Observer Research Foundation (ORF)!

ORF is delighted to invite your students to contribute to and attend
the *Raisina
Hackathon* in Vadodara on *Wednesday,** 19 February 2025* being held in
partnership with Sigma University, Vadodara.

As the *Raisina Dialogue
<https://www.orfonline.org/forums/raisina-dialogue>*, India's flagship
international convening on global governance hosted by ORF in partnership
with the *Ministry of External Affairs*, enters a new decade, this
*Hackathon* aims to amplify the voice of India‚Äôs youth by showcasing their
aspirations and vision. It encourages young minds to lead critical
conversations, shape future agendas, and drive innovation as India plays a
central role in shaping a better world.

The three *session themes* at the Raisina Hackathon are:

1.     Foreign Policy and Security

2.     Climate Change and Sustainability

3.     Digital Futures


The details are as follows:

*Date*: Wednesday, 19 February, 2025

*Time*: 9.30 am to 2.00 pm

*Venue*: Pandit Deendayal Upadhyay Nagar Gruh, Vadodara (Maps:
https://g.co/kgs/NBG14gN)



*I. CALL FOR NOMINATIONS TO CONTRIBUTE*

We request you to nominate students to contribute their ideas spread across
the three themes outlined in the *attached concept *note, while ensuring
gender parity in the nominations.

All contributing students shall receive a *Certificate* acknowledging their
contribution.

Each nominated student will have *two minutes* to share their ideas. Due to
time constraints, we will not be able to accommodate any formal
presentations.

Please send in your *theme-wise student nomination*s for Contributions at
the earliest, using the *Excel format* below:



No.

Theme chosen (from attached concept note)

Title

Name of student

Department

College/ University

Year of Study

Email

Phone (WhatsApp)





Ms./Mr./Dr.

















*II. TO OBSERVE AND PARTICIPATE*

In addition to receiving the nominations as mentioned above, we are
delighted to invite your *faculty and students* to* observe and
attend* the Raisina
Hackathon.

*Registration is mandatory* for all interested in attending the Hackathon.
Please have your faculty and students register their interest via the
following link:https://forms.gle/2bYDTeJsBZ6AiyTA9. A confirmation email
will be sent to them shortly.

Needless to say, all conference meals shall be provided.



**Please note that students being nominated for contributing their
ideas need not register at the given attendance registration link.*



*A detailed concept note is attached for your reference*.

We look forward to hosting your faculty and students at the Raisina
Hackathon in Vadodara on Wednesday, 19 February, 2025.

Please feel free to reach out to me for any further information.

Thank you very much for your support.

Warm regards,
Anusha
-- 
[image: ORF | ORF]
Dr. Anusha Kesarkar-Gavankar
<https://www.orfonline.org/people-expert/anusha-kesarkar-gavankar/>
Senior Fellow | Centre for Economy and Growth
Observer Research Foundation <http://www.orfonline.org>
+91 98208 38561
anusha.gavankar@orfonline.org


-- 
Regards:
Dr Dweepna Garg
Head Of Department & Assistant Professor
Department of Computer Engineering
Devang Patel Institute of Advance Technology and Research (DEPSTAR)
Charotar University of Science and Technology (CHARUSAT)
Contact No. : 02697-265321 (Intercom)


-- 
*Regards:*
Mr. Pravin Jadav,
Assistant Professor,
Department of Computer Engineering,
Devang Patel Institute of Advance Technology and Research (DEPSTAR),
Charotar University of Science and Technology (CHARUSAT),
 AT: Changa, Ta:Petlad, Dist:Anand, Gujarat.

--

subject: Fwd: Invite for Inspirational Talk by Dr Gnanvatsal Swami on 3rd February
snippet: Dear all, Greetings from Maker Fest Vadodara 2025 Team. Yuvalay Charitable Trust and Vadodara Innovation Council (VIC) warmly invite you to a thought-provoking and transformative session as part of the
content:
Dear all,

Greetings from Maker Fest Vadodara 2025 Team.

Yuvalay Charitable Trust and Vadodara Innovation Council (VIC) warmly
invite you to a thought-provoking and transformative session as part of the
pre-event for the *7th edition of Maker Fest Vadodara*.

*Event Details:*

   - *Topic:* Thinking Differently and Making the Difference
   (‡™Ö‡™®‡´ã‡™ñ‡™æ ‡™µ‡™ø‡™ö‡™æ‡™∞, ‡™Ö‡™®‡´ã‡™ñ‡´Å‡™Ç ‡™ú‡´Ä‡™µ‡™®)
   - *Speaker:* Dr Gnanvatsal Swami
   (Renowned Life Coach and Eminent Speaker, BAPS Swaminarayan Sanstha)
   - *Date:* Monday, 3rd February 2025
   - *Time:* 4:00 PM to 6:00 PM
   - *Venue:* Sir Sayaji Rao Nagar Gruh, Vadodara
   - *Registration:* www.makerfestvadodara.com

For over a decade, Yuvalay has been a pillar of youth development,
fostering creativity and empowering young minds through its initiatives. VIC,
founded in 2011 as the first city-based Innovation Council in India, has
been committed to enhancing the culture of innovation in Vadodara by
providing a platform for innovators from all walks of life. Together,
Yuvalay and VIC are dedicated to inspiring individuals and creating
opportunities for meaningful change.

*Why Attend?*
In a world driven by rapid change, thinking differently has become a
cornerstone. This session by Dr Gnanvatsal Swami will provide valuable
insights on ‚ÄúLife Enhancement‚Äù, and make a significant impact on personal
and professional lives.

We request you to join this enlightening event and take the first step
towards transformative thinking.
We look forward to your presence at this inspiring session.

Regards,
H T Patel
Yuvalay Charitable Trust
Ashish Bhavsar
Vadodara Innovation Council
www.makerfestvadodara.com


Thanks and regards,



Ms. Neeta Chudasama

Assistant Professor

Department of Computer Engineering

Devang Patel Institute of Advance Technology and Research (DEPSTAR)

Charotar University of Science and Technology (CHARUSAT)

Contact No.: 9428972072

subject: Fwd: Your action is needed here | Opportunity for your students
snippet: Dear All, Refer the trailing mail and interested student can register, its a good opportunity. ---------- Forwarded message --------- From: IIT Guwahati Online <iitg.daksh.gurukul@masaischool.com
content:
Dear All,

Refer the trailing mail and interested student can register, its a good
opportunity.

---------- Forwarded message ---------
From: IIT Guwahati Online <iitg.daksh.gurukul@masaischool.com>
Date: Tue, Jan 28, 2025 at 6:39‚ÄØAM
Subject: Your action is needed here | Opportunity for your students
To: <provost@charusat.ac.in>


*Dear Educator,*

Greetings from the *IIT Guwahati, Daksh Gurukul *team.

We are thrilled to inform you that the first phase of the Entrance Test for
the* Credit-Linked program in Artificial Intelligence & Machine Learning *has
started. We seek your continued support in informing your students about
this significant opportunity. *This test is open to students regardless of
their degree (tech or non-tech) or year of study.*

*Selection Process:*

   - *Top-performing students* will be offered enrollment into the program.
   - A *waiting list* will be maintained for qualified candidates, who will
   be notified if seats become available.

*Test Details:*

   - *Date:* 2nd February 2025 (Sunday)
   - *Mode:* Online
   - *Registration Deadline:* 30th January 2025
   - *Registration Link: * *https://bit.ly/IITGuwahatiFirstAI
   <https://xbjt7q5k.r.us-east-1.awstrack.me/L0/https:%2F%2Fbit.ly%2FIITGuwahatiFirstAI/1/01000194aa74f12d-0d488bf3-bce1-48d5-b714-a06037606af4-000000/QN1H9jBTd0P3EuBxCHb2hlcnhl8=410>*

 *Click here to register
<https://xbjt7q5k.r.us-east-1.awstrack.me/L0/https:%2F%2Fbit.ly%2FIITGuwahatiFirstAI/2/01000194aa74f12d-0d488bf3-bce1-48d5-b714-a06037606af4-000000/UVu5p1u-LD8ltLUWEOwVoFQEUF8=410>*

*Why the Entrance Test is Important:*
The entrance test assesses fundamental knowledge and *Logical Reasoning*,
providing a fair evaluation for students from all backgrounds. It serves as
an essential step for gaining admission to this highly competitive program,
which includes *hands-on learning*, real-world projects, and personalized
mentorship from *IIT Guwahati *professors and industry experts.

*Curriculum Overview:*
The program provides a comprehensive curriculum that covers all the
essential concepts of *AI and ML with an industry-aligned curriculum.*.

*Key Benefits of the Program:*

   - Earn a prestigious *Certificate from IIT Guwahati *
   - Access to *exclusive career opportunities* and mentorship for tech
   career
   - Build an impressive *portfolio* that demonstrates practical skills

We kindly ask for your support in encouraging your students to register for
the entrance test and take the first step toward a successful career. You
can easily share this information by forwarding this email to your students
or* click here to share on Whatsapp
<https://xbjt7q5k.r.us-east-1.awstrack.me/L0/https:%2F%2Fapi.whatsapp.com%2Fsend%2F%3Ftext=New%2BOpportunity%2BFrom%2BIIT%253A%250A%250AFirst%2BPan-India%2BEntrance%2BTest%2Bfor%2BIIT%2BGuwahati%2527s%2BCredit-Linked%2BAI%2B%2528Artificial%2BIntelligence%2529%2B%2526%2BML%2B%2528Machine%2BLearning%2529%2BProgram.%2B%250A%250AThe%2Btest%2Bis%2Bscheduled%2Bfor%2B%252A2nd%2BFeb%2B2025%2B%2528Sunday%2529%252A%2Band%2Bwill%2Bbe%2Bconducted%2B%252Aonline%252A.%2B%250A%250A%252A%252ARegistration%2Bcloses%2Btoday%253A%252A%2Bhttps%253A%252F%252Fbit.ly%252FIITGuwahatiFirstAI%2B%250A%250AThe%2Btest%2Bevaluates%2B%252Abasic%2Bfoundation%252C%2Breasoning%252C%2Band%2Blogical%2Bskills%252C%2Bmaking%2Bit%2Baccessible%2Bto%2Bstudents%2Bfrom%2B%252A%252Aany%2Bdegree%2Bor%2Bacademic%2Byear%252A%252A.%2BTop%2Bperformers%2Bwill%2Bsecure%2Badmission%2Bto%2Bthe%2Bprogram%252C%2Bwith%2Ba%2B%252A%252Awaiting%2Blist%252A%2Bfor%2Bqualified%2Bcandidates.%250A%250ADon%25E2%2580%2599t%2Bmiss%2Bthis%2Bopportunity%2Bthat%2Bequips%2Bstudents%2Bwith%2B%252Acutting-edge%2Bskills%2Bin%2BAI%252A%25E2%2580%2594register%2Bnow%2521%26type=custom_url%26app_absent=0/1/01000194aa74f12d-0d488bf3-bce1-48d5-b714-a06037606af4-000000/1wWJd7ydJ4jtW4kAq8iHTEVCkFc=410>*


*Thanks,  Team AI & ML  - Daksh Gurukul, IIT Guwahati*

subject: Fwd: EOC Activity by CSPIT[CE] CREATIVE PROJECT IDEAS FOR IMPROVING THE LIVES OF SPECIALLY ABLED PEOPLE
snippet: Thanks and regards, Ms. Neeta Chudasama Assistant Professor Department of Computer Engineering Devang Patel Institute of Advance Technology and Research (DEPSTAR) Charotar University of Science and
content:
Thanks and regards,



Ms. Neeta Chudasama

Assistant Professor

Department of Computer Engineering

Devang Patel Institute of Advance Technology and Research (DEPSTAR)

Charotar University of Science and Technology (CHARUSAT)


Dear All,



U & P U. Patel Department of Computer Engineering, CSPIT organizes the
following Event in step towards helping people having disabilities or
Physically Challenged.



*Title of the Event:* " CREATIVE PROJECT IDEAS FOR IMPROVING THE LIVES OF
SPECIALLY ABLED PEOPLE "



Guidelines:



1.    Students may submit their creative working project ideas on
a drawing sheet of paper/PPT/PDF.


Submission Link: https://forms.gle/GUHRx6sLvhYPatmx7


These can be further modified on the day of presentation [*15/02/2025*].

2.    Last *Extended Date* of Entry Submission: *8th** February, 2025* [Ideas
through online shared google form]. Each student has to make a separate
entry using the shared google form link.

3.    Students may use a pen, pencil, sketch pen or any other tools
[Computer Software/Hardware] to depict their ideas on the day of
presentation [Date: 15/02/2025, Venue: MAC LAB (601), A7 Building].
Participants must remain present in MAC LAB (601) [A7 Building] from 09:15
am to 12:00 pm on 15/02/2025, Saturday to present their project ideas.
Students may use presentations and poster to demonstrate
their project ideas.

4.    Students may show Project Implementation

5.    Students may submit their ideas in a group of a maximum 3 students.

6.    Best of the THREE Innovative Ideas will be awarded prize money &
certificate *(First prize 1500 Rs/-, Second Prize 1000 Rs/-, Third Prize
500 Rs/-)*. Others will receive a certificate of participation.




*For any further query you may please contact student coordinators (**23CE022
- Devam Bhaveshbhai Ghodasara *and *23CE115 - Priya Babubhai Pedhadiya* *).*
Dhaval Bhoi
Assistant Professor,
U & P U. Patel Department of Computer Engineering,
Chandubhai S Patel Institute of Technology,
CHARUSAT, Changa.
Ta-Petlad Dist.Anand
PIN-388421 GUJARAT, INDIA

--

subject: Fwd: VImp - AICTE Request to nominate a mentor from your institute for AMRUT 2.0 scheme - reg
snippet: Dear students, Refer the following and interested students kindly meet me before 28/01/2025. It's a good opportunity. Greetings from AICTE‚Ä¶ We are happy to share that AICTE along with the Ministry
content:
Dear students,


Refer the following and interested students kindly meet me before
28/01/2025. It's a good opportunity.

Greetings from AICTE‚Ä¶

We are happy to share that AICTE along with the Ministry of Housing and
Urban Affairs (MoHUA) is going to offer internship opportunities with
stipend to students through National Internship Portal. Students and Mentor
will be engaged in AMRUT 2.0 scheme.

AMRUT 2.0 aims to contribute to the vision of a self-reliant and
water-secure urban India by enhancing the infrastructure and services in
cities and towns. Through joint collaboration Amrutham a comprehensive web
portal and Mobile Application has been developed for paperless monitoring
of tap water connections and sewage projects' progress and funding.

In this scheme, it is proposed that students from various institutes will
verify the water connections using the Amrutham application and
subsequently a mentor from the same institute will vet the work done by
particular student. Compensation and appreciation letter will be provided
to the mentor for monitoring and supervising student interns.

In this regard, it is requested to nominate a mentor from your institute
and provide his/her details in the below given Google Form Link:

https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSeEq0jisPsxwilEPZLuTtsBETyjt2Mkken31oG8VL65zQMuaQ/viewform

We are also glad to inform you that the Amrutham Application extends its
coverage from 500 cities, as covered under AMRUT, to include all 4700
cities and towns across the country. The mission aims to provide 2.68 crore
urban household tap connections during its implementation. The portal
intends to promote the gig economy and onboard youth and women, creating
opportunities for them to participate in the project.

For any other clarifications, feel free to contact at
*internship@aicte-india.org
<internship@aicte-india.org>*



With Best regards,

Dr. Buddha Chandrasekhar,

Chief Coordinating Officer,

AICTE HQs, New Delhi

011-29581423

9773795439


-- 
*Regards:*
Mr. Pravin Jadav,
Assistant Professor,
Department of Computer Engineering,
Devang Patel Institute of Advance Technology and Research (DEPSTAR),
Charotar University of Science and Technology (CHARUSAT),
 AT: Changa, Ta:Petlad, Dist:Anand, Gujarat.

--

subject: Fwd: Online Application for AICTE SSPCA Scheme 2025-26-regarding
snippet: Greetings from AICTE New Delhi. We are happy to inform you that SSPCA scheme of AICTE (Support to Students for Participating Competition Abroad) provides travel assistance to a student or a team of
content:
Greetings from AICTE New Delhi.

We are happy to inform you *that **SSPCA scheme of AICTE* (Support to
Students for Participating Competition Abroad) provides travel assistance
to a student or a team of students for attending competition at an
international level in order to encourage engineering students to improve
their knowledge in technical education. The SSPCA portal is now open for
applications.

AICTE-approved institutions may now apply for AICTE SSPCA Scheme by
visiting SSPCA portal.

Following link can be clicked for manual for institutions:

*How to fill the application Manual for Institute: *
https://sspca.aicte.gov.in/assets/sample_files/user_manual.pdf

*SSPCA portal link:* https://sspca.aicte.gov.in/

The detailed SSPCA Scheme guidelines are available on AICTE website and
same may be accessed.

*For guidelines:*
https://www.aicte-india.org/sites/default/files/SSPCA_Guidelines.pdf

PFA:
https://drive.google.com/file/d/1hVrSfZhwB93JXbptDZyANwmMNdZGUC4j/view?usp=sharing


PFA:
https://drive.google.com/file/d/1omk6iRsyLOvb6Tl7U99MiANnVxB03w04/view?usp=sharing


*Thanks and Regards*


*Dr.N.H.SiddalingaswamyAdvisor-II (SAG Bureau)All India Council for
Technical Education (AICTE)*
*Nelson Mandela Marg, Vasant Kunj*
*Ministry of Education, Government of India*
*New Delhi-110070*

subject: [IMPORTANT] IIT CERTIFICATIONS & Industrial Internships For First Year CHARUSAT Students
snippet: DEAR STUDENTS OF CHAROTAR UNIVERSITY OF SCIENCE & TECHNOLOGY Phase - II Warm Greetings! We are pleased to share an incredible opportunity in partnership with INDIAN INSTITUTE OF TECHNOLOGY (IIT) a
content:
*DEAR STUDENTS*


*OF*

*CHAROTAR UNIVERSITY OF SCIENCE & TECHNOLOGYPhase - IIWarm Greetings!*

We are pleased to share an incredible opportunity in partnership with *INDIAN
INSTITUTE OF TECHNOLOGY (IIT)* a *2-Month Training and Internship
Program* featuring
certifications from prestigious leading multinational organizations across
various fields.

*Who Can Apply?*
We invite applications from shortlisted students in all departments. If any
of your classmates haven't received this information, please feel free to
forward this email to them.

*It is Important for Interested Students to submit their application, if
shortlisted you will receive a response from our HR Team:*

Submit your Application <https://forms.gle/Xrob2CDaSfzZ74XAA>




*STUDENTS ENROLLED UNDER SCHOLARSHIP FOR PHASE - I:*
NAME YEAR DOMAIN COLLEGE
Priyanshi Pujara 1ST YEAR ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE Charotar University of
Science and Technology
Khanjan Shah  1ST YEAR DIGITAL MARKETING Charotar University of Science and
Technology
Nitya Khashakiya 2ND YEAR VLSI (VERY LARGE SCALE INTEGRATION) Charotar
University of Science and Technology
Daksh Delawala  1 st Year VLSI (VERY LARGE SCALE INTEGRATION) Charotar
University of Science and Technology
Milind Vinayak Patil  2 st Year ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE Charotar University
of Science and Technology
Roht Eknath Wagh  1 st Year CYBER SECURITY (CISCO VERIFIED
CERTIFICATE) Charotar
University of Science and Technology
Sharvari Pankaj Jadhav  1 st Year GRAPHIC S DESIGN Charotar University of
Science and Technology
Tanishqa Chopade 1 st Year DATA SCIENCE Charotar University of Science and
Technology
*Program Overview:*

*First Month: Training*

   - Participate in live lectures and receive guidance from industry
   professionals.
   - You will receive login details after the Registration Process.

*Second Month: Internship*

   - Engage in real-world projects with professional mentorship.
   - *Project Details:*
      - *Individual Assignments:* Complete 10 unique projects with your
      mentor.
      - *Group Capstone Project:* Collaborate in teams on a capstone
      project, with specific roles assigned to each intern. All necessary
      resources will be provided by the company.

*Class Formats:*

   1. *Blended Learning:*
      - Access recorded sessions and join live doubt-clearing sessions
      every weekend.
   2. *Live Mentor-led Classes:*
      - Attend live Zoom sessions 2-3 times per week after 6:30 PM, with
      recorded sessions available for later review. You will also have
access to
      our Learning Management System (LMS) for six months.

*Certificates and Benefits:*

Upon completion, students will receive:

   - A *Certificate of Completion* in alliance with Kshitij IIT KHARAGPUR
   - Verified certificates through *Wipro Dice ID*.
   - A *Co-branded Internship Certificate* from leading MNCs.
   - *100% Placement Assistance* and entry to a growing professional
   network.
   - Training on *Low-Code and No-Code Tools*.
   - Curriculum focused on *Generative AI and Prompt Engineering*.
   - Exclusive *Masterclasses* with industry leaders.
   - Personalized mentorship for tailored guidance.



*Don‚Äôt miss out on this valuable opportunity!*
*Interested students should submit their applications to be part of this
transformative experience.*


Submit your Application
<https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLScvYrnZebeH9i8L6E_AYZP0Ppa7izhxfQZ06E4oDR4SdhTgFQ/viewform?usp=sf_link>



*Best regards,*

*AKASH KAPOOR*
*Senior Academic **Counselor*

subject: Join India‚Äôs Biggest Study Abroad Expo ‚Äì Register Now!
snippet: Dear Students We are excited to invite you to India's Biggest Study Abroad Expo, an exclusive opportunity for aspiring international students to interact directly with university representatives
content:
Dear Students

We are excited to invite you to *India‚Äôs Biggest Study Abroad Expo*, an
exclusive opportunity for aspiring international students to interact
directly with university representatives from *Australia* and *Canada*.

*Event Details:*
üìÖ *Date:* Monday, 20th January
‚è∞ *Time:* 11:00 AM ‚Äì 4:00 PM
üìç *Venue:* Grand Mercure, Vadodara

*Why You Should Attend:*

   - *Direct Access to World-Class Institutions*: Meet representatives
from *130+
   universities* to explore your academic options and scholarships.
   - *Scholarship Opportunities*: Learn how 11,000+ students secured
   scholarships last year and how *you* could be next.
   - *On-the-Spot IELTS Booking*: Book your IELTS test and receive access
   to free preparation materials.
   - *Education Loan Assistance*: Get guidance on securing education loans
   up to ‚Çπ3 crore and save up to ‚Çπ1 lakh.

We understand you may have commitments to sports or cultural events, so we
kindly request that you register only if you can ensure your confirmed
participation.

*How to Register:*
Scan the QR code on the poster or click here
<https://forms.gle/8qRf6dHQNqLTBfe39> to secure your spot. Spaces are
limited, and registrations open till 4:00 PM today.)
[image: adobe-express-qr-code (7).png]

We look forward to helping you take the first step toward your global
education journey. Please feel free to reach out to us at +91 9998380041 if
you have any questions.

Warm regards,

*Kruten Patel*
*Executive Officer (Corporate Communications)*

snippet: Dear all, Please refer the trailing mail. take a part in this Hackathon. ---------- Forwarded message --------- From: hackathon cse <hackathon.cse@indusuni.ac.in> Date: Fri, Jan 10, 2025 at 11:56

From: hackathon cse <hackathon.cse@indusuni.ac.in>

To: Hirenkumar Mer <hirenmer.ce@indusuni.ac.in>

Dear Sir/Madam,

Greetings from the* Department of Computer Science and Engineering (CSE) at
Indus Institute of Technology & Engineering (IITE), Indus University*,
Ahmedabad, Gujarat.

We are excited to announce the *Indus Hackathon 2025*, an exhilarating
one-day event organized by the *CSE Department of Indus University*. This
dynamic event will take place in person on *January 31, 2025*, and promises
to be a platform for innovation, collaboration, and cutting-edge technology.

The Indus Hackathon is designed to bring together bright minds from across
the country, allowing you to solve real-world problems, network with
industry leaders, and showcase your skills. Whether you're an experienced
developer, a creative designer/developer, or an aspiring entrepreneur, this
hackathon offers you the perfect opportunity to turn your ideas into
reality, while collaborating with talented individuals.

benefit from a grant of up to ‚Çπ2.5 Lakhs for their startup, provided by the
ICSII Cell.(T&C Apply) *

*You are invited to be part of this thrilling event and grab the chance to
win these amazing prizes, while learning from experts and challenging
yourself to build impactful solutions.*

subject: LaunchED AVENUES IIT BOMBAY CERTIFICATIONS & Industrial Internships For First Year CHARUSAT Students
snippet: Dear CHARUSAT Students, I trust this message finds you in good health and spirits. It is with great pleasure that we announce a remarkable opportunity brought to you in partnership with IIT
content:
*Dear CHARUSAT  Students,*

I trust this message finds you in good health and spirits.

It is with great pleasure that we announce a remarkable opportunity brought
to you in partnership with *IIT Bombay's Avenues*: a *two-month Training
and Internship Program*. This distinguished program will grant certificates
from reputable multinational organizations in a variety of fields, further
enhancing your academic and professional credentials.



Submit your Application <https://forms.gle/Xrob2CDaSfzZ74XAA>


*Eligibility and Application:*

We extend an invitation to *shortlisted students* from all departments to
apply for this esteemed program. Should any of your fellow students not
have received this communication, we kindly ask that you forward it to them.

Those who wish to participate are required to submit their applications at
the earliest convenience. Should you be shortlisted, a member of our
esteemed HR team will reach out to you directly.

*Submit Your Application*
*Program Details:**Month 1: Training*

   - Participate in live, expert-led sessions and lectures.
   - Login details shall be provided subsequent to your registration.

*Month 2: Internship*

   - Embark upon a hands-on internship, where you shall work on live
   projects under the tutelage of seasoned professionals.
   - *Project Breakdown:*
      - *Individual Assignments:* Complete ten distinct assignments under
      the guidance of your mentor.
      - *Capstone Group Project:* Collaborate with fellow interns on a
      capstone project, with each member assuming a specific role. All required
      resources shall be furnished by the organization.

*Learning Structure:*

   - *Blended Learning:* You will have access to recorded sessions and the
   opportunity to attend live sessions for doubt resolution every weekend.
   - *Live Mentor-Led Sessions:* Engage in live Zoom classes, held two to
   three times a week after 6:30 PM. These sessions will be recorded for
   future reference. Furthermore, you shall have access to our *Learning
   Management System (LMS)* for a period of six months.

*Certificates and Benefits:*

Upon successful completion of the program, students will be awarded:

   - A *Certificate of Completion*, in association with *Avenues IIT Bombay*
   .
   - *Verified Certificates* via Wipro Dice ID.
   - A *Co-branded Internship Certificate* from renowned multinational
   companies.
   - *100% Placement Assistance* and access to a growing professional
   network.
   - Specialized training in *Low-Code and No-Code Tools*.
   - A curriculum centered on *Generative AI* and *Prompt Engineering*.
   - Exclusive *Masterclasses* with distinguished industry leaders.
   - *Personalized Mentorship*, designed to guide and support you
   throughout your career journey.

*A Notable Opportunity Awaits:*

This is indeed an exceptional opportunity for those who wish to broaden
their knowledge and enhance their professional expertise. We encourage all
interested students to submit their applications promptly to secure a
position in this distinguished program.


Submit your Application <https://forms.gle/Xrob2CDaSfzZ74XAA>



*Program Overview:*


With warm regards and best wishes for your continued success,
*Akash Kapoor*
Senior Academic Counselor
*LaunchED Avenues IIT Bombay*

subject: Fwd: Calling All Student Innovators including incubated start-ups! Apply Now for 2nd edition of the IDE Bootcamp- 2025 (Phase II)
snippet: ---------- Forwarded message --------- From: Principal DEPSTAR <principal.depstar@charusat.ac.in> Date: Thu, 9 Jan 2025, 9:14 am Subject: Fwd: Calling All Student Innovators including incubated
content:
---------- Forwarded message ---------
From: Principal DEPSTAR <principal.depstar@charusat.ac.in>
Date: Thu, 9 Jan 2025, 9:14‚ÄØam
Subject: Fwd: Calling All Student Innovators including incubated start-ups!
Apply Now for 2nd edition of the IDE Bootcamp- 2025 (Phase II)
To: Depstar <depstar@charusat.ac.in>


Dear All
Good Morning.

Please identify potential students. If required, we can provide them
exclusive training. Please be connected to your HoD in this matter.

Have a wonderful time and best wishes

Bankim Patel

---------- Forwarded message ---------
From: AICTE <no-reply@sampark.gov.in>
Date: Thu, Jan 9, 2025 at 4:13‚ÄØAM
Subject: Calling All Student Innovators including incubated start-ups!
Apply Now for 2nd edition of the IDE Bootcamp- 2025 (Phase II)
To: <principal.depstar@charusat.ac.in>


Having trouble reading this email? View it in your mobile/ web browser
<https://jan-sampark.nic.in/campaigns/2025/06-Jan/AICTE/index.html>
------------------------------

Dear Sir/Madam,

The All India Council for Technical Education (AICTE) and the Ministry of
Education's Innovation Cell (MIC) successfully organized the first edition
of the ‚ÄúInnovation, Design, and Entrepreneurship (IDE) Bootcamps.‚Äù This
initiative, envisioned by Prime Minister Shri Narendra Modi, aims to
nurture the innovation, design, and entrepreneurial skills of student
innovators and innovation ambassadors from higher education institutions We
encourage all higher education institutions to motivate their students to
participate in the IDE Bootcamp and to spread this information within the
student community.

*For glimpses about last year Edition 1 (Phase-I, Phase-II & Phase III) and
Edition 2 Phase I bootcamps, please go through the link below: -*
*https://bootcamp.mic.gov.in/*
<https://jan-sampark.nic.in/jansampark/click.jsp?tab=pmo&urlid=65f9710bae894ca33b84c7d8c1ad43208425ce0c&lat=2025&mid=1003c30487183e55992ec656f24cb2a36e87a15d>

Now, in the Second Edition of IDE Bootcamp Phase II, AICTE and MIC are
going to be organize 11 Bootcamps at following locations during the period
of *17th February 2025 to 21st February 2025 (**Tentative)*.

*12 cities* are shortlisted *(Tentative)* for conducting the bootcamps as
follows: -

*Sr. No.*

*IDE Bootcamp Phase II Tentative Location*

*1*

Jalandhar (Punjab)

*2*

Jammu and Kashmir

*3*

Agra/Mathura (Uttar Pradesh

*4*

Rajkot/Junagarh/Surat (Gujarat)

*5*

Jabalpur (Madhya Pradesh)

*6*

Patna (Bihar)

*7*

Udaipur (Rajashthan)

*8*

Tezpur/Jorhat (Assam)

*9*

Ranchi/Jamshedpur (Jharkhand)

*10*

Amravati/Guntur (Andhra Pradesh)

*11*

Dindigul (Tamil Nadu)

*12*

Ernakulam (Kerala)



 students and early-stage incubated startups with ground breaking project
ideas to gain the skills and support needed to bring their innovations to
life.

*Who Should **Apply**?*

   - *Students:* If you have an innovative project idea and are enrolled in
   an undergraduate or postgraduate program at a recognized institution, this
   bootcamp is for you.
   - *Incubated Start-ups in academic Institutions:* Applications are
   welcome from early-stage companies that have a distinct innovation emphasis
   and have been nurtured at a local incubation facility. Preferably, a
   prototype or Minimum Viable Product (MVP) is being developed.

*The bootcamp is a 5-day residential training program where student teams
from higher education institutions and startup teams will undergo intensive
experiential learning on design aspects of startups, design thinking,
business modeling, financial planning, and enterprise planning, followed by
mentoring and pitching rounds. Accommodation and meals will be provided to
participants during the IDE Bootcamps.*

*Application** Process:*
Please submit your application through the following link:
https://bootcamp.mic.gov.in/
<https://jan-sampark.nic.in/jansampark/click.jsp?tab=pmo&urlid=65f9710bae894ca33b84c7d8c1ad43208425ce0c&lat=2025&mid=1003c30487183e55992ec656f24cb2a36e87a15d>

*Last Date to **Apply**:*
15th January 2025, up to 2:30 PM

*For any queries, feel free to **contact** us:*

   - *Email:* idebootcamp@aicte-india.org
   <https://jan-sampark.nic.in/jansampark/click.jsp?tab=pmo&urlid=6612d06dda6b87b34b3808f1d0ded995a50e51ba&lat=2025&mid=1003c30487183e55992ec656f24cb2a36e87a15d>
   , ankush.sharma@aicte-india.org
   <https://jan-sampark.nic.in/jansampark/click.jsp?tab=pmo&urlid=3206e9783dfe33edfe1486dd5fc86b4cbf7ba509&lat=2025&mid=1003c30487183e55992ec656f24cb2a36e87a15d>
   , rc3.mic@aicte-india.org
   <https://jan-sampark.nic.in/jansampark/click.jsp?tab=pmo&urlid=4473ebaf2e1e9270a23584458fba4d36a7d417e1&lat=2025&mid=1003c30487183e55992ec656f24cb2a36e87a15d>
   , aid_mic@aicte-india.org
   <https://jan-sampark.nic.in/jansampark/click.jsp?tab=pmo&urlid=d893611400a5b15acb6249d5c0167c8dea820c46&lat=2025&mid=1003c30487183e55992ec656f24cb2a36e87a15d>
   - *Landline:* 011-29581222, 011-29581223, 011-29581240

Don‚Äôt miss this chance to take your innovation journey to the next level!

*Note: Prospective participants can give 2 location preferences for the
bootcamp. But allocation of the nodal center to the participants (if

subject: LaunchED AVENUES IIT BOMBAY CERTIFICATIONS & Industrial Internships For First Year CHARUSAT Students
snippet: Dear CHARUSAT Students, I trust this message finds you in good health and spirits. It is with great pleasure that we announce a remarkable opportunity brought to you in partnership with IIT
content:
*Dear CHARUSAT Students,*

I trust this message finds you in good health and spirits.

It is with great pleasure that we announce a remarkable opportunity brought
to you in partnership with *IIT Bombay's Avenues*: a *two-month Training
and Internship Program*. This distinguished program will grant certificates
from reputable multinational organizations in a variety of fields, further
enhancing your academic and professional credentials.



Submit your Application <https://forms.gle/Xrob2CDaSfzZ74XAA>


*Eligibility and Application:*

We extend an invitation to *shortlisted students* from all departments to
apply for this esteemed program. Should any of your fellow students not
have received this communication, we kindly ask that you forward it to them.

Those who wish to participate are required to submit their applications at
the earliest convenience. Should you be shortlisted, a member of our
esteemed HR team will reach out to you directly.

*Submit Your Application*
*Program Details:**Month 1: Training*

   - Participate in live, expert-led sessions and lectures.
   - Login details shall be provided subsequent to your registration.

*Month 2: Internship*

   - Embark upon a hands-on internship, where you shall work on live
   projects under the tutelage of seasoned professionals.
   - *Project Breakdown:*
      - *Individual Assignments:* Complete ten distinct assignments under
      the guidance of your mentor.
      - *Capstone Group Project:* Collaborate with fellow interns on a
      capstone project, with each member assuming a specific role. All required
      resources shall be furnished by the organization.

*Learning Structure:*

   - *Blended Learning:* You will have access to recorded sessions and the
   opportunity to attend live sessions for doubt resolution every weekend.
   - *Live Mentor-Led Sessions:* Engage in live Zoom classes, held two to
   three times a week after 6:30 PM. These sessions will be recorded for
   future reference. Furthermore, you shall have access to our *Learning
   Management System (LMS)* for a period of six months.

*Certificates and Benefits:*

Upon successful completion of the program, students will be awarded:

   - A *Certificate of Completion*, in association with *Avenues IIT Bombay*
   .
   - *Verified Certificates* via Wipro Dice ID.
   - A *Co-branded Internship Certificate* from renowned multinational
   companies.
   - *100% Placement Assistance* and access to a growing professional
   network.
   - Specialized training in *Low-Code and No-Code Tools*.
   - A curriculum centered on *Generative AI* and *Prompt Engineering*.
   - Exclusive *Masterclasses* with distinguished industry leaders.
   - *Personalized Mentorship*, designed to guide and support you
   throughout your career journey.

*A Notable Opportunity Awaits:*

This is indeed an exceptional opportunity for those who wish to broaden
their knowledge and enhance their professional expertise. We encourage all
interested students to submit their applications promptly to secure a
position in this distinguished program.


Submit your Application <https://forms.gle/Xrob2CDaSfzZ74XAA>



*Program Overview:*


With warm regards and best wishes for your continued success,
*Akash Kapoor*
Senior Academic Counselor
*LaunchED Avenues IIT Bombay*

subject: Appreciation to Lesson Planning Portal Developer - Dhairya Shah (23DCS118) & Priyanshu Valiya (23DCS141)
snippet: Dear Students, We are delighted to share the contributions of our students (Dhairya Shah - 23DCS118 and Priyanshu Valiya - 23DCS141) for the successful completion of Phase -1 of the Lesson Planning (LP
content:
Dear Students,

We are delighted to share the contributions of our students *(Dhairya Shah
- 23DCS118 and Priyanshu Valiya - 23DCS141) *for the successful completion
of Phase -1 of the Lesson Planning (LP) Portal (Web Application) and making
it live for teachers. This platform is designed to streamline academic
processes and objectives, save valuable time, and enable teachers to
efficiently manage lesson planning for their subjects.

The key contributors of this project are as follows:

   - Dhairya Shah (23DCS118) ‚Äì Lead Developer & System Architect
   - Priyanshu Valiya (23DCS141) ‚Äì Next.js Developer
   - Dr. Parth Goel (Coordinator, Teaching Learning Committee) ‚Äì Mentor and
   Testing of a portal

It is worth noting that this significant task was *completed within just
three weeks*, resulting in Phase 1 (Version 1.0) of the portal. Their
efforts have culminated in a user-friendly and efficient platform that will
benefit the entire institution. This accomplishment is a testament to the
hard work and dedication of our students.

*Let us all take a moment to applaud Dhairya and Priyanshu for their
outstanding accomplishment and be inspired by their dedication.*

We would like to acknowledge and express our gratitude to Dr. Amit Nayak
sir (Process Owner - Teaching Learning Committee) and Dr. Bankim Patel sir
(Principal-DEPSTAR) for their continuous support and valuable suggestions
during the portal's implementation.

Thank you for your continuous enthusiasm and support in making such
initiatives successful.

-- 
Regards,
Dr. Parth Goel
Assistant Professor,
Computer Science & Engineering,
Devang Patel Institute of Advance Technology and Research(DEPSTAR)
Charotar University of Science and Technology (CHARUSAT)
[*ACCREDITED WITH "A+" GRADE BY NAAC, GOI*],
At. & Post Changa-388421, Ta: Petlad, Dist:Anand, (Gujarat) India.
Ph. No: 02697-265060, Ext. No. : 5297
https://parthgoelblog.wordpress.com/

--

subject: The Quill: CHARUSAT Chronicles | Volume 10 - Issue 1
snippet: Welcome to Quill The Quill: CHARUSAT Chronicles Greetings from CHARUSAT! In the ever-evolving journey of academic excellence and innovation, we are delighted to introduce Quill ‚Äî the official
content:
[Welcome to Quill]
[https://mailer.charusat.org.in/index.php/campaigns/wx675d1tcad9c/track-url/ls409tohbwc79/a31db465432dd089f9e892e8753dafb6c5467911]


THE QUILL: CHARUSAT CHRONICLES

Greetings from CHARUSAT!

In the ever-evolving journey of academic excellence and innovation, we
are delighted to introduce QUILL ‚Äî the official newsletter of
CHARUSAT. True to its name, Quill embodies the spirit of creativity,
intellect, and expression that defines our vibrant community.

WHAT‚ÄôS INSIDE QUILL?

 	* ACCOLADES: CHARUSAT'S EXCELLENCE ‚Äì Celebrating extraordinary
accomplishments of our students, faculty, and alumni.
 	* RESEARCH PUBLICATIONS: THE EDGE OF EXPLORATION ‚Äì Showcasing
groundbreaking discoveries.
 	* EMINENT SPEAKERS: UNVEILING NEW PERCEPTIONS ‚Äì Dive into engaging
conversations and transformative ideas.
 	* CAMPUS BUZZ: CELEBRATING CAMPUS LIFE ‚Äì Experience the energy and
excitement of campus life.
 	* FACULTY SPOTLIGHT: ACADEMIC EXCELLENCE ‚Äì Highlighting the
brilliance of our faculty.
 	* STUDENT SPOTLIGHT: RISING STARS ‚Äì Inspiring stories of our
student community.

Quill is more than just a newsletter; it is a chronicle of our shared
vision, growth, and success. Join us in celebrating the milestones and
moments that make CHARUSAT a hub of inspiration and innovation.

[Quill Cover Page]
[https://mailer.charusat.org.in/index.php/campaigns/wx675d1tcad9c/track-url/ls409tohbwc79/acc0b593868118ea4029db7c89d967632bd3964b]

Warm regards,
THE EDITORIAL TEAM
CHARUSAT

snippet: Convocation 2025 Dear All, We are happy to inform you that the 14th Convocation Ceremony of CHARUSAT will be live-streamed on YouTube. This year's convocation is a special milestone as we celebrate
content:
[Convocation 2025]

DEAR ALL,

We are happy to inform you that the 14TH CONVOCATION CEREMONY OF
CHARUSAT will be live-streamed on YouTube. This year's convocation is
a special milestone as we celebrate 25 GLORIOUS YEARS OF ACADEMIC
EXCELLENCE.

Click here to Watch the Ceremony Live

DATE: January 4, 2025 | TIME: 5 pm onwards
We invite you to join us virtually and participate in this momentous
occasion. The ceremony will feature the conferment of degrees, awards,
and recognition of our students' outstandingvements.

Please feel free to share the link with your family and friends who
may be interested in watching the ceremony.

We look forward to your virtual presence!

subject: Re: CCNA Academy - Introduction to Basics of Networking Technology @ DEPSTAR in AY:2024-25
snippet: Dear Students, Greetings for the day!!! We are excited to announce an orientation session for the CCNA (Cisco Certified Network Associate) program, which will take place this Friday (03/01/2025) at 11:
content:
Dear Students,

Greetings for the day!!!

We are excited to announce an orientation session for the *CCNA* (Cisco
Certified Network Associate) program, which will take place *this Friday
(03/01/2025) at 11:45 AM* in *Room 329 (SH)*.

This session is open to all students interested in learning more about the
CCNA certification, course details, and how it can benefit your future
career in networking and IT.

*Details:*

   - *Date:* 03/01/2025
   - *Time:* 11:45 AM
   - *Location:* Room 329
   - *Resource Person:* Dr. Amit Nayak (HOD DIT)

We encourage you to attend if you are considering pursuing CCNA
certification or simply want to learn more and get a better understanding
of the CCNA program.

We look forward to seeing you there!
--
Thanks & Regards,
Kashyap Patel
Assistant Professor,
Department of Computer Engineering,
Devang Patel Institute of Advance Technology and Research (DEPSTAR)
Charotar University of Science and Technology (CHARUSAT)
Jay Swaminarayan


On Thu, Dec 26, 2024 at 12:31‚ÄØPM kashyap patel <
kashyappatel.dce@charusat.ac.in> wrote:

> *Dear Students,*
>
> Greetings for the day!!!
>
> We are excited to announce that Devang Patel Institute of Advance
> Technology and Research (DEPSTAR) is offering specialized networking
> knowledge through the *CCNA Academy*, along with the opportunity to earn
> the CCNA certification.
>
> The Cisco Networking Academy Program provides students with valuable
> internet technology skills through certifications like *CCNA* and *CCNP*.
> The goal of this program is to train and equip students to design, build,
> and maintain complex computer networks, addressing the demands of the
> digital economy and providing access to cutting-edge IT and
> telecommunications technologies.
> *Objectives:*
>
>    - To provide students at DEPSTAR with highly employable IT skills in
>    internet networking.
>    - To help meet the growing demand for skilled networking
>    professionals, reducing the need for foreign talent in the industry.
>
> *Methodology:*
>
> Cisco Systems will supply the curriculum, training materials, and program
> support needed to establish and maintain the academy. Students will have
> access to comprehensive online study materials, including interactive labs,
> helping them develop confidence and hands-on experience in networking. The
> Cisco curriculum ensures the development of practical computer networking
> knowledge and skills.
> *Scope of the Certification Course:*
>
> In today‚Äôs competitive job market, many organizations prefer professionals
> with not only a degree but also relevant certifications. The Cisco
> Certified Network Associate (CCNA) certification is one of the most
> recognized credentials in the industry. By completing the CCNA program,
> students will gain a deep understanding of networking principles and
> concepts.
>
> *CCNA Networking Competencies Include:*
>
>    - Understanding computer hardware, software, electricity, networking
>    terminology, and protocols.
>    - LANs and WANs, OSI model, Ethernet, and IP addressing.
>    - Designing and documenting basic network infrastructure and
>    structured cabling.
>    - Network-to-network communication.
>
> *Course Fees:*
>
>    - 2000 INR
>
> The CCNA Academy classes will be held on the *1st and 3rd Saturdays of
> each semester*.
>
> Interested students can register by filling out the Google form:
> https://forms.gle/y7JpPyz95GzxKLqb6
>
> For more details about the course, please visit the official Cisco
> Networking Academy site:
> https://www.netacad.com/
>
> Course content:
> https://www.netacad.com/courses/networking
> *Tutor:*
>
> Dr. Amit Nayak (Ph.D., Head of the Department - Information Technology)
> *CCNA Academy Statistics at DEPSTAR:*
>
>    - *AY 2017-18:* 42 students
>    - *AY 2018-19:* 32 students
>    - *AY 2019-20:* 32 students
>    - *AY 2020-21:* 33 students
>    - *AY 2021-22:* 16 students
>
> For any queries, feel free to reach out to *Ritika Jani* or *Dr. Amit
> Nayak*.
> --
> Thanks & Regards,
> Kashyap Patel
> Assistant Professor,
> Department of Computer Engineering,
> Devang Patel Institute of Advance Technology and Research (DEPSTAR)
> Charotar University of Science and Technology (CHARUSAT)
> Jay Swaminarayan
>

All interested students are hereby informed that the registration and
selection trials for the CHARUSAT Cricket Team for participation in the AIU
West Zone Inter-University Cricket Tournament will be conducted as per the
following schedule:

Venue: CHARUSAT Sports Complex (Cricket ground)

channels.

Assistant Director, Physical Education & Sports
CHARUSAT University

subject: CCNA Academy - Introduction to Basics of Networking Technology @ DEPSTAR in AY:2024-25
snippet: Dear Students, Greetings for the day!!! We are excited to announce that Devang Patel Institute of Advance Technology and Research (DEPSTAR) is offering specialized networking knowledge through the CCNA
content:
*Dear Students,*

Greetings for the day!!!

We are excited to announce that Devang Patel Institute of Advance
Technology and Research (DEPSTAR) is offering specialized networking
knowledge through the *CCNA Academy*, along with the opportunity to earn
the CCNA certification.

The Cisco Networking Academy Program provides students with valuable
internet technology skills through certifications like *CCNA* and *CCNP*.
The goal of this program is to train and equip students to design, build,
and maintain complex computer networks, addressing the demands of the
digital economy and providing access to cutting-edge IT and
telecommunications technologies.
*Objectives:*

   - To provide students at DEPSTAR with highly employable IT skills in
   internet networking.
   - To help meet the growing demand for skilled networking professionals,
   reducing the need for foreign talent in the industry.

*Methodology:*

Cisco Systems will supply the curriculum, training materials, and program
support needed to establish and maintain the academy. Students will have
access to comprehensive online study materials, including interactive labs,
helping them develop confidence and hands-on experience in networking. The
Cisco curriculum ensures the development of practical computer networking
knowledge and skills.
*Scope of the Certification Course:*

In today‚Äôs competitive job market, many organizations prefer professionals
with not only a degree but also relevant certifications. The Cisco
Certified Network Associate (CCNA) certification is one of the most
recognized credentials in the industry. By completing the CCNA program,
students will gain a deep understanding of networking principles and
concepts.

*CCNA Networking Competencies Include:*

   - Understanding computer hardware, software, electricity, networking
   terminology, and protocols.
   - LANs and WANs, OSI model, Ethernet, and IP addressing.
   - Designing and documenting basic network infrastructure and structured
   cabling.
   - Network-to-network communication.

*Course Fees:*

   - 2000 INR

The CCNA Academy classes will be held on the *1st and 3rd Saturdays of each
semester*.

Interested students can register by filling out the Google form:
https://forms.gle/y7JpPyz95GzxKLqb6

For more details about the course, please visit the official Cisco
Networking Academy site:
https://www.netacad.com/

Course content:
https://www.netacad.com/courses/networking
*Tutor:*

Dr. Amit Nayak (Ph.D., Head of the Department - Information Technology)
*CCNA Academy Statistics at DEPSTAR:*

   - *AY 2017-18:* 42 students
   - *AY 2018-19:* 32 students
   - *AY 2019-20:* 32 students
   - *AY 2020-21:* 33 students
   - *AY 2021-22:* 16 students

For any queries, feel free to reach out to *Ritika Jani* or *Dr. Amit Nayak*
.
--
Thanks & Regards,
Kashyap Patel
Assistant Professor,
Department of Computer Engineering,
Devang Patel Institute of Advance Technology and Research (DEPSTAR)
Charotar University of Science and Technology (CHARUSAT)
Jay Swaminarayan

-- 


DISCLAIMER: The information transmitted is intended only for the person
or entity to which it is addressed and may contain confidential and/or

subject: Revolutionizing the Future: The Role of Embedded Systems and IoT in Smart Technologies an IEEE STEP Talk!
snippet: We are excited to invite you to an engaging STEP TALK session, organized by IEEE CSPIT SB in collaboration with the IEEE Gujarat Section. Join us to explore the transformative potential of Embedded
content:
We are excited to invite you to an engaging STEP TALK session,
organized by *IEEE
CSPIT SB* in collaboration with the *IEEE Gujarat Section*. Join us to
explore the transformative potential of Embedded Systems and IoT in driving
smart technologies.


*Event Details:*

‚Ä¢ *Topic:* Revolutionizing the Future: The Role of Embedded Systems and IoT
in Smart Technologies

‚Ä¢ *Speaker:* Dr. Rutu Parekh, Associate Professor at DA-IICT

‚Ä¢ *Date:* Friday, 27 December

‚Ä¢ *Time:* 12:10 PM - 2:10 PM

‚Ä¢ *Venue:* A6 EC/EE Building, Seminar Hall (2nd Floor)


*Session Highlights:*

‚Ä¢ Introduction to Embedded Systems and IoT: Definitions, key concepts, and
evolution.

‚Ä¢ Key Components: Microcontrollers, sensors, actuators, and IoT platforms.

‚Ä¢ Emerging Applications: Smart homes, IIoT, healthcare, and environmental
monitoring.

‚Ä¢ Design Challenges: Low-power designs, real-time performance, security,
and scalability.

‚Ä¢ Role of AI: Enhancing IoT functionalities through AI and case studies.

‚Ä¢ Future Trends: 5G, edge computing, and sustainable IoT technologies.



*About the Speaker:*

*Dr. Rutu Parekh* has extensive expertise in Micro/Nanoelectronics,
Embedded Systems, and IoT. With academic achievements from Concordia
University, Universit√© de Sherbrooke, and IIT Bombay, she has contributed
significantly to military and space application research. She is a
published author, a technical advisor, and the founder and chair of the
IEEE NTC Chapter.


We encourage you to attend this insightful session and engage with a leader
in the field.


*Fill out the google form to book your seat :*

https://forms.gle/k47fR279xJtD2vtn9


Looking forward to your presence!

IEEE CSPIT Student Branch
[image: newlogoieee.png]

subject: Offer for the CHARUSAT Girl Students to watch 31st (2024) Gujarati Movie for free
snippet: Dear CHARUSAT Family Members, Recently a Gujarati movie entitled '31st (2024)" has been released in theatres. The movie is based on a real life incident, which happened to a girl in Ahmedabad.
content:
Dear CHARUSAT Family Members,



Recently a Gujarati movie entitled '*31st (2024)*" has been released in
theatres. The movie is based on a real life incident, which happened to a
girl in Ahmedabad. You can get more information about the film from online
sources.



The producer of the movie has extended the Free Movie Review for *CHARUSAT
Girl Students*. The girl students currently pursuing their studies at
CHARUSAT will get a *free entry in the theatres* after showing her student
I-Card, issued by CHARUSAT, at the ticket counter of the theatre.



Girl students and Lady Faculty members can avail the offer at *Shaan Cinema
‚Äì Anand* and *Lux Cinema - Petlad* till December 28, 2024. The offer is
limited to the scheduled shows of the film. The entry is subject to the
availability of seats. One ticket will be issued for one I-card. The offer
is limited for the film viewing only, other facilities are not the part of
this scheme.



We wish the maximum number of students to avail this offer.



Thank you.




PS: The right of the entry is reserved by the cinema owner.


With regards,
Regards,
Convener/ Co-convener,
ULSC-CHARUSAT.

--

subject: Canada Day by IDP ‚Äì A Unique Study Abroad Opportunity
snippet: Dear Students, We are delighted to inform you about an exciting opportunity to gain valuable insights into studying in Canada through the upcoming "Canada Day by IDP" event, exclusively
content:
Dear Students,



We are delighted to inform you about an exciting opportunity to gain
valuable insights into studying in Canada through the upcoming *"Canada Day
by IDP"* event, exclusively hosted for you at CHARUSAT University in
collaboration with IDP Education.



This event is designed to provide you with a comprehensive understanding of
the opportunities that await in Canada and address common misconceptions
about studying there. Highlights of the event include:



¬∑  *Expert Talk:* "Breaking the Myths about the Present Scenario of
Studying in Canada and Fact-Checking the Enormous Opportunities Awaiting in
Canada."



¬∑  *One-on-One Counseling:* Get personalized guidance and profile
assessments from IDP's Canada team experts.



¬∑  *On-the-Spot Solutions:* Address your queries directly with experienced
counselors.



*Event Details:*

¬∑  *Date:* Tuesday, December 31, 2024

¬∑  *Time:* 11:00 AM ‚Äì 4:00 PM

¬∑  *Venue:* IIIM Auditorium, CHARUSAT University Campus

¬∑  *Registration Link:* Register Here
<https://forms.gle/sNBS7gZavGohxxtG8> (Please
use your CHARUSAT email ID to register.)



This is a remarkable opportunity to explore the possibilities of studying
in Canada and receive tailored advice for the academic journey. We
encourage you to register and make the most of this exclusive event.



Seats are limited, so please register as soon as you can to secure your
participation.



If you have any questions, please get in touch with Dr. Vijay Makwana at
+91 99983 80041.




Thanks & Regards,

*Executive Officer (Corporate Communications)*

subject: Successful Blood Donation Camp ‚Äì A Heartfelt Thank You to the CHARUSAT Family
snippet: Successful Blood Donation Camp ‚Äì A Heartfelt Thank You to the CHARUSAT Family Dear CHARUSAT Family, We are pleased to share the remarkable success of the Blood Donation Camp held on December 20th, 2024
content:
* Successful Blood Donation Camp ‚Äì A Heartfelt Thank You to the CHARUSAT
Family*

Dear CHARUSAT Family,

We are pleased to share the remarkable success of the Blood Donation Camp
held on December 20th, 2024. This event was made possible thanks to the
unwavering dedication of our entire CHARUSAT Family.

A special mention goes to *the student team*, whose active participation
and enthusiasm played a pivotal role in making this life-saving initiative
a reality. Their commitment to service and compassion truly reflects the
core values of our university.

For your reference, we have attached *the list of student participants *along
with *some glimpses of the event*.

Such events are a testament to the strong spirit of collaboration at
CHARUSAT. Your encouragement and involvement are key to inspiring us to
organize more impactful activities in the future.

We are grateful for your continued support and look forward to your
participation in future endeavors.

Together, let‚Äôs continue to make a meaningful difference in society and
strengthen our commitment to community service.


---Thanks & Regards---
Mr. Kishan Patel
Program Coordinator
CHARUSAT NSS Unit
CHARUSAT, Changa 388421

--

subject: AICTE Internship Opportunities to Kick Start Your Journey with IBM and Microsoft
snippet: Dear CHARUSAT, Student Applause for being shortlisted for the internship program! As mentioned above, Teachnook in collaboration with MNC & IIT ROORKEE (Cognizance) is organizing a 2-month training
content:
Dear *CHARUSAT*,  Student
*Applause for being shortlisted for the internship program!*

As mentioned above, *Teachnook in collaboration with MNC & IIT ROORKEE
(Cognizance)* is organizing a  2-month training + Internship program
designed by the Mentors of MNCs.

*Interested students can Apply If you're selected for the shortlist, our HR
team will contact you;*

*Apply Here *  *https://forms.gle/WsnTxKdcRwpD8ZXw6*
<https://forms.gle/WsnTxKdcRwpD8ZXw6>

*Join Our Official WhatsApp Group For More Information;*

 https://chat.whatsapp.com/HDoVBEbC4yfApd4QdQY6HB








*Top Preferred Courses:‚úÖ Artificial Intelligence.‚úÖ Data Science.‚úÖ Machine
Learning.‚úÖ Cloud Computing.‚úÖ Full Stack Web Development.Below is an
overview of the program's structure.*

*First month:* During the first month of the program, training will be
conducted in the mode of live lectures, and you will have live mentorship
from industry professionals. You will be provided admittance to your
personal *LMS portal* where you can interact with the trainers and fellow
students. Login credentials will be provided to registered students.

*Second month:* Internship with live mentorship for projects from
professionals. *The LIVE INDUSTRY PROJECT* will give students an experience
in solving real-world problems.

*10+ Minor Project: *The minor project is an individual project, Where
students will be doing projects on each topic they will be learning.

*Major Project (CAPSTONE):* The major project is a group project, and you
will work in a group of 3-4 interns, with specific responsibilities
assigned to each intern. The company will provide you with the required
data and materials for the project.

*Third month:* Based on your enactment during the first two months of the
program, we will conduct a technical interview in the same company during
the third month. You will be offered a stipend-based Internship if you
perform well in the interview.





*After Completion of the program, the student shall receive a :‚úÖ Program
completion certificate issued by IIT-ROORKEE Cognizance.‚úÖ The WIPRO Dice ID
verified the co-branded internship certificate.‚úÖ Letter of Recommendation
from the Company.‚úÖ Admittance to a growth community.*



  Bipin Shah
Key Account Manager,Teachnook
9364102817
| teachnook.com
| bipin@teachnook.com

location.

205.

subject: [IMPORTANT]IIT CERTIFICATIONS & AICTE Approved Industrial Internships For First Year CHARUSAT Students
snippet: DEAR STUDENTS OF CHAROTAR UNIVERSITY (GUJRAT) Warm Greetings! We are pleased to share an incredible opportunity in partnership with IIT Roorkee's Cognizance: a 2-Month Training and Internship
content:
*DEAR STUDENTS*


*OF*

*CHAROTAR UNIVERSITY(GUJRAT)Warm Greetings!*

We are pleased to share an incredible opportunity in partnership with *IIT
Roorkee's Cognizance*: a *2-Month Training and Internship Program* featuring
certifications from prestigious companies including *Cisco, Meta
(Facebook), IBM*, and other leading multinational organizations across
various fields.

*Who Can Apply?*
We invite applications from shortlisted students in all departments. If any
of your classmates haven't received this information, please feel free to
forward this email to them.

*It is Important for Interested Students to submit their application, if
you get shortlisted you will be getting a response from our HR Team:*

Submit your Application
<https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLScvYrnZebeH9i8L6E_AYZP0Ppa7izhxfQZ06E4oDR4SdhTgFQ/viewform?usp=sf_link>




*STUDENTS ENROLLED UNDER SCHOLARSHIP :*
NAME YEAR DOMAIN COLLEGE
Jahnavi rajput  1 st Year GRAPHICS DESIGN CHARUSAT
Maitra shah  1 st Year FINANCE CHARUSAT
Goyani Tisha Vinubhai  2 nd Year WEB DEVELOPMENT CHARUSAT

Daksh Delawala  1 st Year VLSI CHARUSAT
Milind Vinayak Patil  2 st Year ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE CHARUSAT
Roht Eknath Wagh  1 st Year CYBER SECURITY (CISCO VERIFIED CERTIFICATE)
CHARUSAT
OM VILAS MAHALLE  1 st Year APP DEVELOPMENT CHARUSAT
Sanket Kailas Garudkar 1 st Year AUTOCAD CHARUSAT
Patel Sarthak Rajeshkumar  1 st Year VLSI CHARUSAT
Maheshwari Saumil Dineshkumar 1 st Year VLSI CHARUSAT
Bhatt xama dharmendra Kumar  1 st Year IOT + ROBOTICS (HARDWARE KIT)
CHARUSAT
Patel Rudra Yatin  1 st Year VLSI CHARUSAT
Taksh 1 st Year WEB DEVELOPMENT CHARUSAT
Gohel Rohan Sandipbhai 3 rd Year VLSI CHARUSAT
JAIVIN TRIVEDI  1 st Year HYBRID ELECTRIC VECHILES CHARUSAT
Tushar Makhnan 1 st Year DIGITAL MARKETING CHARUSAT
Ritik Kumar  1 st Year ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE CHARUSAT
Harsh Singh  1 st Year ROBOTICS CHARUSAT
Sravan Kumar 1 st Year CYBER SECURITY (CISCO VERIFIED CERTIFICATE) CHARUSAT
Dhruv Pawar 1 st Year VLSI CHARUSAT
Utsav Dave 1 st Year EMBEDDED SYSTEM CHARUSAT
Suhanee Yadav 1 st Year AUTOCAD CHARUSAT
Patel Kashish Rakeshkumar  1 st Year AUTOCAD CHARUSAT
Rudra Panchal  1 st Year CYBER SECURITY (CISCO VERIFIED CERTIFICATE)
CHARUSAT
Sutariya Shreyansh Vikaskumar 1 st Year VLSI CHARUSAT
Preya Dhangar  2 nd Year WEB DEVELOPMENT CHARUSAT
Tolat Mahek Rajeshbhai 3 rd Year Android App Development CHARUSAT
* Program Overview:*

*First Month: Training*

   - Participate in live lectures and receive guidance from industry
   professionals.
   - You will receive login details after registering.

*Second Month: Internship*

   - Engage in real-world projects with professional mentorship.
   - *Project Details:*
      - *Individual Assignments:* Complete 10 unique projects with your
      mentor.
      - *Group Capstone Project:* Collaborate in teams on a capstone
      project, with specific roles assigned to each intern. All necessary
      resources will be provided by the company.

*Class Formats:*

   1. *Blended Learning:*
      - Access recorded sessions and join live doubt-clearing sessions
      every weekend.
   2. *Live Mentor-led Classes:*
      - Attend live Zoom sessions 2-3 times per week at 6:30 PM, with
      recorded sessions available for later review. You will also have
access to
      our Learning Management System (LMS) for six months.

*Certificates and Benefits:*

Upon completion, students will receive:

   - A *Certificate of Completion* from Cognizance IIT Roorkee.
   - Verified certificates through *Wipro Dice ID*.
   - A *Co-branded Internship Certificate* from leading MNCs.
   - *100% Placement Assistance* and entry to a growing professional
   network.
   - Training on *Low-Code and No-Code Tools*.
   - Curriculum focused on *Generative AI and Prompt Engineering*.
   - Exclusive *Masterclasses* with industry leaders.
   - Personalized mentorship for tailored guidance.



*Don‚Äôt miss out on this valuable opportunity!*
*Interested students should submit their applications to be part of this
transformative experience.*


Submit your Application
<https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLScvYrnZebeH9i8L6E_AYZP0Ppa7izhxfQZ06E4oDR4SdhTgFQ/viewform?usp=sf_link>



*Best regards,*

*AKASH KAPOOR*
*Senior Academic **Counselor*
*HR MANAGER'S TNK*

---------- Forwarded message ---------
From: Kishan Patel <coordinator.nss@charusat.ac.in>
Date: Wed, 18 Dec 2024, 12:12 pm
Subject: Request for Donors ‚Äì 10th Blood Donation Camp in Memory of Mangal
Baa (‡™Æ‡™Ç‡™ó‡™≤ ‡™¨‡™æ ‡™®‡´Ä ‡™™‡´Å‡™£‡´ç‡™Ø‡™§‡™ø‡™•‡™ø ‡™®‡™ø‡™Æ‡™ø‡™§‡´á)
To: <family@charusat.edu.in>, Charusat Family <charusatfamily@charusat.ac.in>,
CHARUSAT NSS Unit <charusat.nss@charusat.ac.in>
Cc: Registrar CHARUSAT <registrar@charusat.ac.in>, Principal <
principal@charusat.ac.in>, HOD Group <hod@charusat.ac.in>, Convener ULSC <
convener.ecc@charusat.ac.in>, Pritesh Patel <
priteshpatel.sports@charusat.ac.in>, Dean FOH <dean.foh@charusat.ac.in>,
Dean CHARUSAT <dean@charusat.ac.in>


*Dear CHARUSAT Family Members,*

Greetings

We are pleased to announce that the *10th Blood Donation Camp in Memory of
Mangla Baa (*‡™Æ‡™Ç‡™ó‡™≤‡™æ ‡™¨‡™æ ‡™®‡´Ä ‡™™‡´Å‡™£‡´ç‡™Ø‡™§‡™ø‡™•‡™ø ‡™®‡™ø‡™Æ‡™ø‡™§‡´á) is scheduled to be held on *20th
December 2024*, from *08:00 AM to 04:00 PM* at *"AASTHA," Indukaka Marg,
Vallabh Vidyanagar*.

To ensure the success of this noble cause, we humbly request All Faculty
Members, Staff Members and Students For kind support in Blood Donation.
Kindly *fill out the attached Registration form* to confirm participation.
We are expecting a Participation of at least * Minimum 10 Members per
department/Institute* to make this event a success.

Registration Link:
https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSeK3xjEBzWG-Op23zkYgo6d8fNl-Mv9AC7FCApND6Ble1-AuQ/viewform?usp=sf_link

For more details, please refer to the *attached brochure*.

   - Reporting Time at Central Lawn on 20/12/2024 : 09:10 AM on Sharp


   - Transportation Will Provided by CHARUSAT.
   - Refreshment will Provided by the Organizer.

Your small act of kindness can make a big difference in saving lives. Let‚Äôs
unite and *be heroes* by promoting the spirit of donation and service.

subject: Dear 24dce084: A Professional learning Experience From IIT ROORKEE COGNIZANCE FOR DEPSTAR STUDENTS | AICTE APPROVED ! REGISTRATION DRIVE
snippet: [ LAST CHANCE TO ENROLL & GET PLACEMENT READY ] Dear 24dce084 of DEPSTAR, IIT ROORKEE COGNIZANCE is excited to offer a unique internship opportunity for talented students like you. This internship
content:
*[ LAST CHANCE TO ENROLL & GET PLACEMENT READY ]*

*Dear 24dce084 of DEPSTAR,*
*IIT ROORKEE COGNIZANCE *is excited to offer a unique internship
opportunity for talented students like you. This internship will provide
you with *Hands-on Experience **in Real World Experience,* working
alongside experienced professionals.

*As mentioned above, The Training and Internship is in collaboration with
cognizance, IIT-Roorkee & Top MNCs is organizing a 2 Month Training +
Internship program designed by Industrial Mentors From Top Experienced
Professionals.*


   - *Certifications/Internships Reports can be submitted in the
   departments for the Academic Credit Points.*
   - *Academic point Is Mandatory For Semester.*


*Application Form:- **https://forms.gle/qrqxCBHqKxPwWdvJ6
<https://forms.gle/qrqxCBHqKxPwWdvJ6>*

*Last Date to Registration : - 18th Dec 8.30pm*

*Program Highlights:*

*1.Training Sessions: *
Provides a comprehensive and immersive learning experience by *FAANG
companies professionals having 10+ years* of work experience In Industries.
with over 80+ hours of content spread across 25-30 modules*.*

*2.Internship: *
You'll be deployed in the particular MNCs that we are in collaboration with
for the respective Company In Your Dream Domain. There you'll be working as
an intern with that company on 10+ live projects,With Mentor
Guidance.*Essential
data and materials required for the project will be provided by the company
side itself. *


*After Completion of the program the student will receive:*

   - *Course Completion Certificate in collaboration with cognizance,
   IIT-Roorkee.*
   - *Internship Completion Certificate from Top MNCs Collaboration With
   Teachnook.*
   - *Letter of Recommendation(LoR) Based On Performance.*
   - *Certificates Are Approved For AICTE.*
   - *Wipro Company(MNC) DICE ID Certifications.*
   - *Placement Opportunities with Placements Assistance.*
   - *Growth Community Access for further Opportunities.*

*Benefits After Successful Internship *


   - *Launch your career with real-world experience.  *
   - *  Gain hands-on experience and build your professional network.*
   - *  Sharpen your skills and learn new techniques. *
   - *  Apply your classroom knowledge to real-world challenges.    *


*We look forward to your active participation in the Training and
Internship Program. This is an excellent chance for you to broaden your
horizons and take a step towards a successful career. For any inquiries or
assistance, feel free to contact us.*

*Students Kindly Go Through All The Information Which Is Mentioned In the
Description Of the  Google Form, Before Filling The Google Form:*


*HARSH*
*KEY ACCOUNT MANAGER*

subject: Request for Donors ‚Äì 10th Blood Donation Camp in Memory of Mangal Baa (‡™Æ‡™Ç‡™ó‡™≤ ‡™¨‡™æ ‡™®‡´Ä ‡™™‡´Å‡™£‡´ç‡™Ø‡™§‡™ø‡™•‡™ø ‡™®‡™ø‡™Æ‡™ø‡™§‡´á)
snippet: Dear CHARUSAT Family Members, Greetings We are pleased to announce that the 10th Blood Donation Camp in Memory of Mangla Baa (‡™Æ‡™Ç‡™ó‡™≤‡™æ ‡™¨‡™æ ‡™®‡´Ä ‡™™‡´Å‡™£‡´ç‡™Ø‡™§‡™ø‡™•‡™ø ‡™®‡™ø‡™Æ‡™ø‡™§‡´á) is scheduled to be held on 20th December 2024
content:
*Dear CHARUSAT Family Members,*

Greetings

We are pleased to announce that the *10th Blood Donation Camp in Memory of
Mangla Baa (*‡™Æ‡™Ç‡™ó‡™≤‡™æ ‡™¨‡™æ ‡™®‡´Ä ‡™™‡´Å‡™£‡´ç‡™Ø‡™§‡™ø‡™•‡™ø ‡™®‡™ø‡™Æ‡™ø‡™§‡´á) is scheduled to be held on *20th
December 2024*, from *08:00 AM to 04:00 PM* at *"AASTHA," Indukaka Marg,
Vallabh Vidyanagar*.

To ensure the success of this noble cause, we humbly request All Faculty
Members, Staff Members and Students For kind support in Blood Donation.
Kindly *fill out the attached Registration form* to confirm participation.
We are expecting a Participation of at least * Minimum 10 Members per
department/Institute* to make this event a success.

Registration Link:
https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSeK3xjEBzWG-Op23zkYgo6d8fNl-Mv9AC7FCApND6Ble1-AuQ/viewform?usp=sf_link

For more details, please refer to the *attached brochure*.

   - Reporting Time at Central Lawn on 20/12/2024 : 09:10 AM on Sharp


   - Transportation Will Provided by CHARUSAT.
   - Refreshment will Provided by the Organizer.

Your small act of kindness can make a big difference in saving lives. Let‚Äôs
unite and *be heroes* by promoting the spirit of donation and service.

*P.S.: @Counselors Please Pass this Information to Students Via **WhatsApp*
*Group.*

Thank you for your cooperation and support!

--

Warm Regards,
Kishan Patel
Program Coordinator
CHARUSAT NSS Unit.

--

subject: Fwd: Announcement of Maker Fest Vadodara 2025
snippet: Dear Students, They are thrilled to announce the 7th edition of Maker Fest Vadodara! The event is scheduled for February 1st and 2nd (Sat-Sun), 2025. Innovation is the key to shaping the future, and
content:
Dear Students,

They are thrilled to announce the 7th edition of *Maker Fest Vadodara!* The
event is scheduled for *February 1st and 2nd (Sat-Sun), 2025.*

Innovation is the key to shaping the future, and *Maker Fest Vadodara* is
the ultimate platform for students to showcase their groundbreaking ideas.
Whether they‚Äôre solving real-world problems or creating something entirely
new, this is their chance to be at the forefront of change.

In the past six editions, we‚Äôve seen incredible participation - over 1500
registrations, 360 Maker Teams exhibited, prize amount of Rs10.75 lakhs
distributed and welcomed over 47,000 visitors.

*They invite students to be a part of this movement* ‚Äì as *Makers*. If
they‚Äôre working on something original and useful, this is their moment to
shine, network with industry leaders, and gain valuable exposure.

*Event Details:*

   - *Dates:* February 1st & 2nd, 2025 (Saturday-Sunday)
   - *Venue:* Grounds of Faculty of Technology, MSU

Registrations will open soon at: www.makerfestvadodara.com.


-- 
*Regards:*
Mr. Pravin Jadav,
Assistant Professor,
Department of Computer Engineering,
Devang Patel Institute of Advance Technology and Research (DEPSTAR),
Charotar University of Science and Technology (CHARUSAT),
 AT: Changa, Ta:Petlad, Dist:Anand, Gujarat.

--

subject: Fwd: Energy Conservation Cell: Poster making Competition for Students & Staff of CHARUSAT
snippet: ---------- Forwarded message --------- From: Head CE Depstar <hod.ceds@charusat.ac.in> Date: Fri, Dec 13, 2024 at 3:47 PM Subject: Fwd: Energy Conservation Cell: Poster making Competition for
content:
---------- Forwarded message ---------
From: Head CE Depstar <hod.ceds@charusat.ac.in>
Date: Fri, Dec 13, 2024 at 3:47‚ÄØPM
Subject: Fwd: Energy Conservation Cell: Poster making Competition for
Students & Staff of CHARUSAT
To: DEPSTAR_CE <depstar_ce@charusat.ac.in>

Dear All,
Energy Conservation Cell-CHARUSAT has organized a hand-drawn poster-making
competition for students and staff of CHARUSAT on the occasion of "National
Energy Conservation Day-14th December 2024."

The theme of the poster is "Innovations in Energy Saving."  The participant
has to submit an *A3 size hand-drawn pencil sketch poster *to the Head,
Electrical Engineering Department, CSPIT (Room No. 136, A6 Building,
CAPIT) before 6 January 2025, 04.30 pm.

First Three winners will be awarded prize money.
No Entry Fee.
For more details, contact: Head, Electrical Engineering Dept., CSPIT.

Regards,
____
--
Dr. Nilaykumar A. Patel
Associate professor & Head,
Electrical Engineering Dept.
Chandubhai S. Patel Institute of Technology,
CHARUSAT,
Changa. 388421
Ta: Petlad.
Phone:02697 265041

My Web Page: https://sites.google.com/charusat.ac.in/nilaypatel/home

--

"DEPSTAR_CE" group.

email to depstar_ce+unsubscribe@charusat.ac.in.

snippet: Dear Friend, CII India We Want series started as an academic activity within the framework of contests to cultivate students' creative skills. The activity was enthusiastically accepted by teachers
content:
*Dear **Friend**,*



CII India We Want series started as an academic activity within the
framework of contests to cultivate students‚Äô creative skills. The activity
was enthusiastically accepted by teachers and students. This was evident in
the nationwide participation from schools and colleges.



This year CII is organizing its *‚Äò‚Äò**5**th Edition Debate Competition‚Äô‚Äô *to
bring together sharpest young minds from the Academia from different cities
who will compete on thought provoking topics.



More details are appended in the emailer below.



*Please circulate in your Institution and among your students, and friends
to participate and win exciting prizes! *

*https://shorturl.at/AVltz <https://shorturl.at/AVltz>*



* <https://shorturl.at/AVltz>*

subject: IIT-MNC CERTIFICATIONS & AICTE Approved Industrial Internships for CHARUSAT UNIVERSITY students!
snippet: Dear Student of CHARUSAT UNIVERSITY (DEPT's 1st Year), We are in collaboration with IIT ROORKEE COGNIZANCE & WIPRO DICE ID, and are organizing a 2 Months of Training + Internship program with
content:
Dear Student of CHARUSAT UNIVERSITY
(DEPT's 1st Year),

We are in collaboration with *IIT ROORKEE COGNIZANCE* & *WIPRO DICE ID*,
and are organizing a 2 Months of Training + Internship program with
certifications from *CISCO, META|FACEBOOK, IBM* & various other MNCs in
technical and nontechnical domains. We are enrolling only *SHORTLISTED
STUDENTS* in the program for *CHARUSAT UNIVERSITY*.

*Note: If any of your batchmates are missed or haven't received the
notification, recipients are allowed to send this mail to them.*


*
                               Registration closing in :*
* 01d 7h 30m 29s*

<https://forms.gle/UoK4iL7ehBM4VgPS7>Submit Your Application
<https://forms.gle/UoK4iL7ehBM4VgPS7>Program Details:

*First Month:* Expert training designed with live lectures and mentorship
from industry professionals(10 yr experience). (Login credentials will be
provided to students after registration)

*Second Month:* Internship with live mentorship for projects from
professionals. The LIVE INDUSTRY PROJECT will give students experience in
solving real-world problems.

   - *Project 1:* 10 individual projects assigned to each intern, to be
   completed with their mentor.
   - *Project 2:* Capstone Project: A group project assigned to a group of
   15 interns, with particular work assigned to each intern. (Essential data
   and materials required for the project will be provided by the company.)

Class Formats:

*Blended Program:* Access to recorded classes and live doubt clearing
sessions every weekend.

*Mentor-led/Live Classes:* Live Zoom classes at 6:30 PM for 2 to 3 days a
week, with recorded sessions available.

*LMS Portal:* Access for 6 months.
Certification:

After completion of the program, students will receive:

   - Program completion certificate issued by IIT ROORKEE (COGNIZANCE).
   - Co-branded internship certificate from top MNCs.
   - 100% placement assistance.
   - Access to a thriving professional community.
   - WIPRO DICE Certification.

Submit Your Application <https://forms.gle/UoK4iL7ehBM4VgPS7>

*Congratulations to students who have already been selected for our
programs:*

subject: Scientific calculator in the exam of MSUD101
snippet: Dear Students PLs, note that you are allowed to carry a scientific calculator in the external exam of MSUD101. But make sure that the scientific calculator does not store any formulas or data;
content:

external exam of MSUD101.

or data; otherwise, it will be considered in the UFM category. *

content:

Internship Program!*

As mentioned above, *TechED Solutions* in collaboration with *Top notch
MNCs *is organizing an *AICTE  *approved*  Training + Internship Program*.

while gaining real-world experience!

*Personality Development: Industrial Guidance to develop your personality. *
