subject: BTECH- 1st Semester Seating Arrangement
snippet: Dear students, Kindly go through the following guidelines for the upcoming university theory examination. Students are required to adhere to the seating arrangement outlined in the email attachment.
content:
Dear students,

Kindly go through the following guidelines for the upcoming university
theory examination.

 Students are required to adhere to the seating arrangement outlined in the
email attachment.


   - Students are required to uphold decorum in the examination hall. *Mobile
   phones*, *smartwatches*, or any other* electronic devices* are strictly
   prohibited within the exam hall.
   - Bags must be left outside, and it is mandatory to* wear an ID card*.
   Students have to take their seats in the exam hall at least 15 minutes
   before the exam time.
   - ¬∑The exam will take place in* Exam Hall 201 and Exam Hall 301 of the
   Multi Utility Building*. The multi-utility building is located behind
   the MBA building. *Exam Hall 201 is situated on the first floor, and
   Exam Hall 301 is on the second floor of this building*.
   - All students are required to enter the campus through the* Karoli
Gate* and
   follow the *signboards to reach *the Multi-Utility Building.



*Thanks & Regards,*

*Urvashi Chaudhari*
*Assistant Professor,*
*Computer Engineering,*


*Devang Patel Institute of Advance Technology & ResearchCharotar University
of Science And Technology (CHARUSAT),Changa-388421, Gujarat, INDIA.*

--

subject: Fwd: Documentary film making Competition
snippet: ---------- Forwarded message --------- From: Head CE Depstar <hod.ceds@charusat.ac.in> Date: Wed, 4 Dec, 2024, 4:22 pm Subject: Fwd: Documentary film making Competition To: DEPSTAR_CE <
content:
---------- Forwarded message ---------
From: Head CE Depstar <hod.ceds@charusat.ac.in>
Date: Wed, 4 Dec, 2024, 4:22‚ÄØpm
Subject: Fwd: Documentary film making Competition
To: DEPSTAR_CE <depstar_ce@charusat.ac.in>


Kindly circulate to our students.

---------- Forwarded message ---------
From: Ritika Jani <ritikajani.dit@charusat.ac.in>
Date: Wed, 4 Dec, 2024, 4:02‚ÄØpm
Subject: Fwd: Documentary film making Competition
To: <21dit@charusat.edu.in>, <22dit@charusat.edu.in>, <23dit@charusat.edu.in>,
<24dit@charusat.edu.in>, Sachi Joshi <sachijoshi.dce@charusat.ac.in>,
Bansari Patel <bansaripatel.dcs@charusat.ac.in>, HOD Depstar <
hodds@charusat.ac.in>


Dear Students,

Greetings for the day!!!

Showcase your talent in documentary film making competition specially
highlighting women empowerment. More details are given in trailing mail.


---------- Forwarded message ---------
From: Convener Women Development Cell CHARUSAT <convener.wdc@charusat.ac.in>
Date: Tue, Dec 3, 2024 at 10:32‚ÄØAM
Subject: Documentary film making Competition
To: Womencell CHARUSAT <womencellmembers.charusat@charusat.ac.in>


Dear All!!

I hope this message finds you well. As part of our celebrations for Women's
Day, we are excited to announce a documentary film competition that aims to
highlight the incredible stories of women and their contributions to
society.

This is a fantastic opportunity to showcase your work and creativity while
making a statement about the importance of women‚Äôs representation in media.

**Key Details**

√ò  The film should follow the theme of the competition:

*Women‚Äôs empowerment, achievements, safety and hygiene*

√ò Duration: Documentaries should be between 15 minutes.

√ò Awards: Prizes will be awarded in cash for the top three submissions,
with an opportunity to screen your film at our Women‚Äôs Day event.

√ò The short film must be original and no watermark of any kind should be on
the film.

√ò The film must be of the highest quality possible.

√ò Last date for submission of online entry form along with the film link is
28th February 2025.

√ò No submission will be considered after *28th February 2025*.

√ò Films will be judged entirely on the concept, technical aspects.

√ò The decision of the jury members is final.

√ò Each applicant may submit only one film.

√ò The film should be with a massage.



There is no registration fee for this competition. Registration open
till *16th December
2024*:

*https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSeKrNSJkOom9HV3WEk4B_bCExFIFXtADCeGUq_ErOApTI3p7Q/viewform?usp=sf_link
<https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSeKrNSJkOom9HV3WEk4B_bCExFIFXtADCeGUq_ErOApTI3p7Q/viewform?usp=sf_link>*



Looking forward to seeing your amazing films!

*Regards,*
*WDC Convener*



-- 
*Thanks and Regards,*
*RITIKA JANI.*
*Assistant Professor.*
*Department of Information Technology,*

*Devang Patel Institute of Advance Technology And Research (DEPSTAR)*
*CHARUSAT, Changa.*

*"The More you Sweat in Practice the Less you Bleed in Battle"*

--

"DEPSTAR_CE" group.

subject: University Practical Examination - November 2024
snippet: Dear Students, Greetings!! Please find the attached documents for the university practical examination (November 2024). Further instructions/ guidelines will be communicated to you in due course.
content:
Dear Students,

Greetings!!

Please find the attached documents for the university practical examination
(November 2024).

Further instructions/ guidelines will be communicated to you in due course.

Thanks and regards,



Ms. Neeta Chudasama

CEUC101: COMPUTER CONCEPTS & PROGRAMMING(2024-2025) 1CE1 & 1CE2  
<https://accounts.google.com/AccountChooser?continue=https://classroom.google.com/c/NzAxMTY5MDk4NDA5&Email=24dce084@charusat.edu.in>
New announcement

Dear students,

Greetings!!!!

As per the schedule time of Internal practical exam for the subject CEUC  
101 Computer Concepts and Programming will be 1:10pm on 03/12/2024.


All the students are requested to report at 1:15 pm at the mentioned  
location.
1CE1- A & B - CC1 (Dr.Khushi Patel)
1CE1- C-CC2 (Mr. Pravin Patel)
1CE2- A- CC2 (Mr. Pravin Patel)
1CE2 -B&C- 314 (Ms. Neeta Chudasama)
Please note the following points:

1. You must carry Practical file in softcopy and Hard Copy certificate.
2. Assignment notebook.
3. Must submit Mini Project in Evaluation Classroom.
4. You have to appear for practical exam through official id only.
5. You can bring your own laptop for Practical exam.



ALL THE BEST üëç DO WELL !! STAY CONFIDENT

subject: Fwd: Schedule for Engineering Physics - 1 Quiz + Foundation Course Quiz
snippet: Dear Students, Kindly go through the trailing email. Thank you. ---------- Forwarded message --------- From: Sanni <sannikapatel.phys@charusat.ac.in> Date: Sat, Nov 30, 2024 at 1:58 PM Subject:
content:
Dear Students,

Kindly go through the trailing email.

Thank you.

---------- Forwarded message ---------
From: Sanni <sannikapatel.phys@charusat.ac.in>
Date: Sat, Nov 30, 2024 at 1:58‚ÄØPM
Subject: Schedule for Engineering Physics - 1 Quiz + Foundation Course Quiz
To: <24cspitstudents@charusat.edu.in>, <24depstarstudents@charusat.edu.in>,
<24dcs@charusat.edu.in>, <24dce@charusat.edu.in>, <24dit@charusat.edu.in>
Cc: Pratik Pataniya <pratikpataniya.phys@charusat.ac.in>, Dr. Manan N. Shah
<mananshah.phys@charusat.ac.in>, Sachin Patel <
sachinpatel.phys@charusat.ac.in>, Dr. Shweta Dabhi <
shwetadabhi.phys@charusat.ac.in>, Tapobroto Bhanja <
tapobroto.icc@charusat.ac.in>, Dr. Rajesh V. Savalia <
rajeshsavalia.maths@charusat.ac.in>


Dear Students,

We hope you're doing well. Please note the schedule for the upcoming
Engineering Physics - 1 Quiz + Foundation Course Quiz as part of your
evaluation process:

Quiz 1: Foundation Course (External Exam Quiz)
Date: 07/12/2024
Time: 3:00 to 3:30 PM
Format: Online (25 Marks)


Quiz 2: Engineering Physics - 1 (2nd Internal Quiz)
Date:   07/12/2024
Time:   3:30 to 4:00 PM
Format: Online (20 Marks)

Both quizzes are mandatory and the Google form link will be shared closer
to the date.


Best regards,
Sanni

--

hodecestaffaffairs@stjosephstechnology.ac.in>



Greetings,

I hope this mail finds you well.

We are excited to announce the *CMR HACKFEST 2.0 (**36 Hours* *National
Level Hackathon)* after the overwhelming success of our first
national-level hackathon *CMR HACKFEST 1.0* held on *1st *and* 2nd March
2024*. In our inaugural event attracted nearly 1500 registrations out of
which 120 teams were invited to participate in the offline hackathon,
resulting in around 450 participants from 16 different states across India.

*CMR College of Engineering & Technology *(UGC Autonomous
Institution), Hyderabad,
Telangana is organizing the second edition‚Äî*CMR HACKFEST 2.0 (**36
Hours* *National
Level Hackathon)*, which is set to take place on *31st January and 1st
February, 2025*.

Education, Research and Innovation go hand-in-hand and with the
intersection of disciplines, new ideas emerge and impulse innovation.
CMRCET is known as the top-notch Institution for
its internationally renowned quality in Multidisciplinary Innovation.

*CMR HACKFEST 2.0 *is an exhilarating and innovative Hackathon that aims to
bring together bright minds and creative thinkers from various institutions
to collaborate, ideate and innovate in the realm of technology and beyond.
It is an excellent opportunity for students to showcase their skills,
network with peers and gain valuable experience in problem-solving.





Problem Statements given by Industries under below mentioned themes
(Problem Statements are attached herewith this mail)



*THEMES*

¬∑         *Gen AI*

¬∑         *FinTech*

¬∑         *Robotics*

¬∑         *IOT*

¬∑         *Agriculture*

¬∑         *Waste Management*

¬∑         *Health Care *

¬∑         *Transportation & Logistics*

¬∑         *CLEAN & Renewable Energy*

¬∑         *Smart Education*

¬∑         *Industry InnovAtion*

¬∑         *Open Innovation *



The best Hackathon Projects will receive a Prize pool money upto
*Rs.1,50,000* and also few Surprise Gifts. Apart from awards, innovative
projects have the opportunity to get incubation support, mentorship,
industry networking, resources and training. Details of the Cash Prize is
as given below

   - The Winner- Rs. 75,000/-
   - I Runner- Rs. 40,000/-
   - II Runner- Rs. 20,000/-
   - Three Consolation Prizes- Each Rs. 5000/-

(One Consolation Prize Exclusively for Girls Team)

Registration Link for Hackathon: https://forms.gle/NbNGRGB1JKkiJcvz6

*Shortlisted teams need to pay registration fee: 400/- per person (Includes
Accommodation with minimum facilities and food during the event).*

*Team Size: 3-6 Members*

*Important Deadlines:*

*Event Dates*

31st January and 01st February, 2025

*Deadline for Registration*

15th December, 2024

*Acceptance Notification*

23rd December, 2024

¬∑  *Shortlisted Teams would be informed through mail*

¬∑ *Participation Certificate would be given to all the participants*



Participation in this *CMR HACKFEST 2.0* gives *real time exposure to
students to work with Industry experts* on these specific problems for
which these industries are looking for ‚Äúout of box thinking‚Äù or innovative
ideas from the students.



  We believe that participation from your college would greatly enrich the
collaborative spirit of this hackathon. Your students' innovative ideas and
passion for technology would be an invaluable contribution to this event.


Thank you for considering our invitation, and we eagerly anticipate your
institution's involvement in making *CMR HACKFEST 2.0* a resounding success.



With best Regards,

Organizing Committee - *CMR HACKFEST 2.0*

Mobile: +91-9701227088, 8985193337, 9398754485.

E-Mail: cmrhackfest@cmrcet.ac.in

Website: www.cmrcet.ac.in
-- 
Assistant Professor
CEER Exams Coordinator,
CMR College of Engineering & Technology.
Mobile: 8686765766



-- 
Regards:
Dr Dweepna Garg
Head Of Department & Assistant Professor
Department of Computer Engineering
Devang Patel Institute of Advance Technology and Research (DEPSTAR)
Charotar University of Science and Technology (CHARUSAT)
Contact No. : 02697-265321 (Intercom)

subject: Calling All Young Leaders: Join the Viksit Bharat Young Leaders Dialogue 2025!
snippet: Dear Students, Are you ready to shape the future of India? The Viksit Bharat Young Leaders Dialogue (VBYLD) 2025 is here to empower youth like you to lead the charge toward a Viksit Bharat! This
content:
Dear Students,

Are you ready to shape the future of India? The *Viksit Bharat Young
Leaders Dialogue (VBYLD) 2025* is here to empower youth like you to lead
the charge toward a *Viksit Bharat*!

This exciting initiative, part of the *National Youth Festival (NYF) 2025*,
offers a platform to showcase your talent, share your vision, and connect
with decision-makers and global icons.
Why Should You Participate?

   - *Showcase Your Ideas:* Take part in engaging activities like quizzes,
   essays, and pitch presentations.
   - *Make an Impact:* Present your vision directly to the *Hon‚Äôble Prime
   Minister* and other eminent leaders.
   - *Gain Recognition:* Earn appreciation letters, certificates, and a
   chance to represent your state and nation.
   - *Learn and Explore:* Dive into exhibitions, cultural events, and
   interactive sessions designed to celebrate India‚Äôs heritage and progress.

How to Get Started

   1. *Step 1:* *Register for the Viksit Bharat Quiz* (November
   25th‚ÄìDecember 5th, 2024) on the *My Bharat Portal*.
   <https://mybharat.gov.in/>
   2. *Step 2:* Advance to the *Essay/Blog Competition* (December
   8th‚ÄìDecember 12th, 2024).
   3. *Step 3:* Compete in the *State and National Vision Deck
   Championships* during NYF 2025.

Themes to Explore

   - *Empowering Youth for Viksit Bharat*
   - *Making India the Global Manufacturing Powerhouse*
   - *Enhancing Productivity in Agriculture*
   - *Building Infrastructure for the Future*
   - And many more!

This is your moment to shine, inspire change, and contribute to India‚Äôs
future. We‚Äôre looking for passionate, innovative, and visionary young
minds‚Äîjust like you!

Ready to take the challenge? *Register now and be part of the movement!*

For any questions or more information, please contact me at
*jaypatel.dce@charusat.ac.in
<jaypatel.dce@charusat.ac.in>* or *(M): +91 94281 53390.*

Let‚Äôs create a brighter future together.
*Best regards,*
*Mr. Jay Patel,*
*Assistant Professor,*
*University-Level Central Students Council**,*
*Department of Computer Engineering,*
*Devang Patel Institute of Advance Technology and Research (DEPSTAR)*
*Charotar University of Science and Technology (CHARUSAT)*
*(M) +919428153390*
*LinkedIn: *www.linkedin.com/in/jrbpatel

*Stay healthy and fit.*
  *Please don't print this e-mail unless you really need to.*

--

subject: Schedule for Engineering Physics - 1 Quiz + Foundation Course Quiz
snippet: Dear Students, We hope you're doing well. Please note the schedule for the upcoming Engineering Physics - 1 Quiz + Foundation Course Quiz as part of your evaluation process: Quiz 1: Foundation
content:
Dear Students,

We hope you're doing well. Please note the schedule for the upcoming
Engineering Physics - 1 Quiz + Foundation Course Quiz as part of your
evaluation process:

Quiz 1: Foundation Course (External Exam Quiz)
Date: 07/12/2024
Time: 3:00 to 3:30 PM
Format: Online (25 Marks)


Quiz 2: Engineering Physics - 1 (2nd Internal Quiz)
Date:   07/12/2024
Time:   3:30 to 4:00 PM
Format: Online (20 Marks)

Both quizzes are mandatory and the Google form link will be shared closer
to the date.


Best regards,
Sanni

-- 
*Thanks,*

subject: AICTE Approved Internship to Get Certified by CISCO, META, IBM to Kick Start your Journey.
snippet: Dear Student, Applause for the opportunity to participate in the Training and Internship Program! As mentioned above, Teachnook in collaboration with IIT Roorkee (Cognizance) is organizing a WIPRO
content:
Dear Student,* Applause for the opportunity to participate in the Training
and Internship Program!*

As mentioned above, *Teachnook* in collaboration with *IIT Roorkee
(Cognizance)* is organizing a *WIPRO Verified 2-Month Training + Internship
Program*. This is your chance to master Low Code, No Code, and Prompt
Engineering while gaining real-world experience!
*CLICK TO ONBOARD: https://forms.gle/WsnTxKdcRwpD8ZXw6
<https://forms.gle/WsnTxKdcRwpD8ZXw6>*

*Join Our Official WhatsApp Group For More Information;*

  https://chat.whatsapp.com/K43ThNxKpaXAfLfHio5hRq
<https://chat.whatsapp.com/K43ThNxKpaXAfLfHio5hRq>

*Explore the details below to see what awaits you:*
*1. Training *

   - *Professional Mentors*: Learn from industry experts who will guide you
   through every step.
   - *From Scratch*: Master fundamentals and advanced skills, flawless for
   any skill level.
   - *Low Code/No Code*: Build powerful applications with minimal coding
   knowledge.
   - *Generative AI*: Develop and fine-tune AI models for cutting-edge
   applications.
   - *Prompt Engineering*: Learn to design and optimize AI prompts for
   enhanced recital.

*2. Internship *

   - *10+ Live Projects*: Apply your knowledge in real-world projects and
   gain invaluable experience.
   - *Capstone Project*: Collaborate with partnered companies on impactful
   projects.
   - *Resume Building*: Obtain expert guidance to craft a standout resume
   that gets noticed.
   - *Mock Interviews*: Receive feedback from industry experts to sharpen
   your interview skills.
   - *Masterclasses*: Learn from top leaders in global companies through
   exclusive sessions.

*3. Certification *

   - *Course Certificate*: Receive a prestigious certificate from IIT
   Roorkee Cognizance.
   - *Internship Certificate*: Receive a certificate from our partnered
   companies to bolster your resume.
   - *Verified by WIPRO Dice ID*: Gain credible and valuable credentials
   recognized in the industry.



  Bipin Shah
Key Account Manager,Teachnook
9364102817
| teachnook.com
| bipin@teachnook.com
592, 3rd Block, Koramangala 1A Block, Koramangala 3 Block, Koramangala,

subject: Mandatory Safety Reminder for CHARUSAT family: Helmet & Seat Belt Compliance ‚Äì NSS Initiative
snippet: Dear Charusat Family Members, Greetings From Charusat NSS Unit We would like to inform you that it is now mandatory for all Students,Staff and faculty Members to: Wear helmets while riding two-wheelers
content:
Dear  Charusat Family Members,

Greetings From Charusat NSS Unit

We would like to inform you that it is now *mandatory* for all
Students,Staff and faculty Members to:

   - *Wear helmets* while riding two-wheelers.
   - *Fasten seat belts* when driving or traveling in a car.

To ensure adherence, *NSS Volunteers* *will be stationed at both university
gates to monitor compliance and raise awareness.* We kindly ask everyone to
be *polite and cooperative* with them, as they are working to safeguard
your safety.

This initiative is *compulsory* and has been implemented to maintain a safe
environment for all members of the CHARUSAT community.

Your cooperation is crucial to the success of this initiative. Let‚Äôs work
together to make our campus safer.

Thank you for your Valuable support and understanding .


--
Regards,
Kishan Patel
NSS Program Coordinator
CHARUSAT NSS UNIT

--

subject: MANDATORY INTERNSHIP FOR |||| WIPRO DICE ID CERTIFICATON
snippet: Dear [ IMPORTANT] Salutations! We are in collaboration with IIT ROORKEE COGNIZANCE & WIPRO DICE ID , and are organizing a 2 Months of Training + Internship program with certifications in technical
content:
*Dear *
*[ IMPORTANT] *

*Salutations!*

We are in collaboration with   *IIT ROORKEE COGNIZANCE & WIPRO DICE ID* *, *and
are organizing a 2 Months of Training + Internship program  with
certifications  in technical and non-technical domains. We are
enrolling *SHORTLISTED
STUDENTS *in the program
*Note: If any of your batchmates are missed or haven't received
the notification, recipients are allowed to send this mail to them.*


*Registrations closing 27th NOVEMBER *


*Students must submit their application. After getting shortlisted, you
will be getting a response from our HR Team:*

Submit your Application <https://forms.gle/4z2WDUbMULoeAWMG9>




*[THIS NOTIFICATION FOR THE ENROLLMENT OF NOV-DEC, DEC-JAN & JAN-FEB
BATCHES FOR STUDENTS WHO HAVEN'T BEEN ABLE TO ACCEPT THE SCHOLARSHIP SLOT
FOR THE SAME.]*
Program Details

*First Month:* Expert training with live lectures and mentorship from
industry professionals (10+ years of experience). Login credentials will be
provided to students after registration.

*Second Month:* Internship with live mentorship for projects from
professionals, The LIVE INDUSTRY PROJECT will give students experience in
solving real-world problems.
Project Details

*Phase 1:* 10 individual projects assigned to each intern, to be completed
with their mentor.

*Phase 2:* *Capstone Project:* It's a group project assigned to a group of
15 interns. For each intern particular work will be assigned to them they
have to work on it.
(Essential data and materials required for the project will be provided by
the company side itself)
Class Format

*Blended Program:* You will receive recorded sessions, whatever doubts you
have you can clear it in live doubt-clearing sessions which will be
organized every weekend.

*Mentor-led/Live Classes:*You will be having live Zoom classes at 6:30 PM
for 2 to 3 days a week. You will receive your recorded sessions as well
LMS(Learning Management System) portal which you will have admittance to
for 6 months.

*LMS Portal:* Access for 6 months.
After completion of the program, students will be receiving:

   -  *Program completion certificate* issued by *COGNIZANCE IIT ROORKEE*.
   - *Certificates verified* through *Wipro* Dice ID
   - Co-Branded *Internship certificate *
   - *100 percent Placement Assistance.*
   -
*Admittance to a growing community *
   -
*Program Offering with Low-Code and No-Code Tools. *
   - *100 percent Outcome Driven Result.*
   - *The curriculum includes Generative AI and Prompt Engineering. *
   - *Personalized Instructors* for proper guidance.

content:
Dear Students,

This is a reminder regarding submitting your *Journal* and *Lab Manual* for
the subject *Engineering Physics-I*. Please note the following details:

   - *Submission Deadline:* on/before 30th November 2024
   - *Where to Submit:* Respective lab-in-charge
   - *Requirements:* Ensure all experiments are completed, signed, and
   properly documented in the journal and lab manual. Moreover, Journals must
   be certified. *(Signed on certificate/first page)*

Timely submission is mandatory, No submissions will be accepted after the
above-mentioned deadline.

Best regards,
Sanni

subject: Announcement: SPOURAL'25 - A Celebration of Sports and Cultural!
snippet: Greetings from the University Level Central Student Council! We are thrilled to announce that *SPOURAL'25*, our much-anticipated annual sports and cultural extravaganza, will take place from *6th
content:
Greetings from the University Level Central Student Council!



We are thrilled to announce that *SPOURAL'25*, our much-anticipated annual
sports and cultural extravaganza, will take place from **6th January to
31st January 2025*.* Mark your calendars for a month of energy, enthusiasm,
and excellence!



Event Schedule:



**Sports Competitions: 6th January to 28th January,2025**



**Cultural Events: 29th January to 31st January,2025**



This year, we are excited to expand our sports categories with the
*addition of Handball and Ultimate Frisbee* for students and Chess and
Table Tennis for Faculty, bringing fresh opportunities for athletes to
shine. With these new additions, *SPOURAL'25 promises to be bigger and
better than ever!*



**Important Note:**



This is a general announcement for all Institutes/Departments. We encourage
you to start your team selection and gear up for the exciting competitions
ahead. Let‚Äôs showcase our collective talent, teamwork, and enthusiasm!



Stay tuned for further details regarding registrations, event line-ups, and
schedules. Together, let‚Äôs make SPOURAL'25 an unforgettable celebration of
sportsmanship and culture.





Warm regards,


*Convener,*


*University Level Central Students Council (ULSC).*

*CHARUSAT.*

--

subject: Invitation to Session on "Insights from Alumni: Excelling in Competitive Programming and Achieving Career Success
snippet: Dear Students, It gives me immense pleasure to announce that the Department of Computer Engineering of Devang Patel Institute of Advance Technology and Research (DEPSTAR) in Association with DEPSTAR-
content:
Dear Students,


It gives me immense pleasure to announce that the Department of Computer
Engineering of Devang Patel Institute of Advance Technology and Research
(DEPSTAR) in Association with DEPSTAR-CAA is going to organizes
Session on "Insights
from Alumni: Excelling in Competitive Programming and Achieving Career
Success".

Mr. Shaktisinh Jhala (17DCE017) is our stellar Computer Engineering alumni,
who graduated in year 2021, armed with exceptional skills and secured an
enviable position as senior software engineer at crest infosystems Pvt.
Ltd.  Ahmedabad with an impressive package. His success serves as a
testament to the rigorous training and cutting-edge education he received
here. Through his dedication and hard work, he has not only secured
lucrative placements but is also making impactful contributions to the tech
industry. His journey from our institution to top-tier position is a source
of pride and inspiration for current students, showcasing the potential and
opportunities available in the field of computer engineering."

Connect with Our Esteemed Alumni Mr. Shaktisinh Jhala: Join Us for an
Exclusive Interaction Session!

we've scheduled tomorrow‚Äôs Session between 1:00pm to 02:00pm at 229.

Looking forward to connecting with you then!



Thanks and regards,



Ms. Neeta Chudasama

Assistant Professor

Department of Computer Engineering

Devang Patel Institute of Advance Technology and Research (DEPSTAR)

Charotar University of Science and Technology (CHARUSAT)

Contact No.: 9428972072

--

subject: Fwd: Internship Opportunity with Agnirva Space - ISRO Registered Space Tutor
snippet: ---------- Forwarded message --------- From: Principal DEPSTAR <principal.depstar@charusat.ac.in> Date: Fri, Nov 22, 2024 at 11:33 AM Subject: Fwd: Internship Opportunity with Agnirva Space -
content:
---------- Forwarded message ---------
From: Principal DEPSTAR <principal.depstar@charusat.ac.in>
Date: Fri, Nov 22, 2024 at 11:33‚ÄØAM
Subject: Fwd: Internship Opportunity with Agnirva Space - ISRO Registered
Space Tutor
To: Depstar <depstar@charusat.ac.in>



---------- Forwarded message ---------
From: Agnirva Internship <internship@agnirva.com>
Date: Fri, 22 Nov, 2024, 11:26‚ÄØam
Subject: Internship Opportunity with Agnirva Space - ISRO Registered Space
Tutor
To: <space@agnirva.com>


Dear Sir/Madam,

We hope this message finds you well. We are reaching out to formally extend
an exclusive opportunity for your students to participate in a *Free Online
Space Internship Program
<https://www.agnirva.com/challenge-page/the-agnirva-space-internship-program>*
offered by *Agnirva.com <https://agnirva.com>* - an ISRO Registered Space
Tutor, inaugurated by IN-SPACe.

This internship spans 8 weeks with 440 steps and approximately 80 hours of
learning. Students will receive an *internship certificate* upon successful
completion. This internship is applicable to students from all disciplines
- management, arts, engineering, medical, commerce - because future
advancements in the space sector will impact all professions.

Please encourage your students to leverage this opportunity. More than
30,000+ students from esteemed institutions like *BITS Pilani, IIM
Bangalore, ISB Hyderabad, IIT Kharagpur, IIT Delhi, IIT Bhu, Delhi
University, LPU, VIT Vellore* and *500+* other institutions have already
enrolled. We believe this program can significantly benefit your students
as well.

Learn more about us ‚û°Ô∏è Agnirva.com <https://agnirva.com>

[image: Free Online Space Internship Opportunity]

*If you have already forwarded this message to your students, please ignore
this reminder.*

Regards,
Team Agnirva

--

subject: Reminder MSUD101 Quiz II(22/11/2024 at 11:15)
snippet: Dear Students Good Morning Please note that the MSUD101 online quiz II will be conducted on Google Forms on 22/11/2024 between 11:15 and 11:25. The link will be shared on your institute mail ID. Make
content:
Dear Students
Good Morning
Please note that the MSUD101 online quiz II will be conducted on Google
Forms on 22/11/2024 between 11:15 and 11:25.
The link will be shared on your institute mail ID.
*Make sure you have your institute email ID (________@charusat.edu.in
<https://mail.google.com/mail/?view=cm&fs=1&to=________%40charusat.edu.in&authuser=0>)
and Password of account otherwise, you will not be able to take the exam.*

*Syllabus of the exam : *
Unit 2
Infinite Series*(Only infinite series and complex number is not included)*
Tests of convergence of series viz., comparison test, ratio test, root
test, Leibnitz test

Unit 4 Partial differentiation
Partial derivative and geometrical interpretation, Euler‚Äôs theorem with
corollaries and their
applications, Chain rule, Implicit functions, Total differentials

Unit 5 Applications of Partial Differentiations*(Half of the Unit)*
Maclaurin‚Äôs and Taylor‚Äôs series expansion in two variables, Tangent plane
and normal line to a surface, Maxima and Minima of the function of two
variables
During the quiz, if you face any problem, then consult me in room no 309,
2nd floor, Ec Ee building CSPIT.
Re-quiz will not be taken in case you remain absent.


*Rajesh V. Savalia *
*PhD, MPhil*
*Assistant Professor*
*Department of Mathematical Sciences*
*P. D. Patel Institute of Applied **Sciences*
*Charotar University of Science and Technology*
*Accredited Grade 'A+' by NAAC *
*Website: https://www.charusat.ac.in/ <https://www.charusat.ac.in/>*
*M. No. 94292 22899*

subject: Reg. Teacher (Guru)- A Margdarshak Award in e-governance
snippet: Dear Students, CHARUSAT wishes to appreciate the teaching-learning-mentoring activities on campus by recognizing and rewarding teachers who are passionately and effectively involved with their students
content:
Dear Students,

CHARUSAT wishes to appreciate the *teaching-learning-mentoring* activities
on campus by recognizing and rewarding teachers who are passionately and
effectively involved with their students. The award recognizes and honours
teachers who have significantly impacted students' learning experiences and
personal development.

The awards will be determined based on student nominations, utilizing an
e-Governance system for data normalization and analysis to ensure fairness
and objectivity.

The nominations and regular feedback will be sought at the end of the odd
and even semesters. Students can nominate teachers by visiting the *"Teacher
Award Nomination" module*. A student can nominate a maximum of 25% of the
teachers who taught him/her.

I request all of you please participate in this.

If you have any queries, kindly contact me via email.

Thank you.
-- 
*Bhavika N. Patel*
*Assistant Professor,*
*Department of Computer Engineering*
*Devang Patel Institute of Advance Technology & Research (DEPSTAR),*
*Charotar University of Science & Technology.*

--

snippet: Dear Students, Greetings for the day!!! Please note that you all are supposed to give feedback to the faculties who conducted lab/lecture sessions in the ODD Semester of AY:2024-25. You are supposed to
content:
Dear Students,

Greetings for the day!!!

Please note that you all are supposed to give *feedback to the faculties
who conducted lab/lecture sessions in the ODD Semester of AY:2024-25. *

You are supposed to give feedback from your respective login
of e-governance.

Link: *https://charusat.edu.in:912/eGovernance/*
<https://charusat.edu.in:912/eGovernance/>

Complete the task on or before *29/11/2024.*

*Steps to give feedback :*

1. Login to e-governance.

2. Click on e-governance as shown in the picture below.
[image: image.png]

3. Click on the Faculty Feedback option available in the menu.

[image: image (1).png]

*Kindly give unbiased feedback.*

*Thank you*

--
*Bhavika N. Patel*
*Assistant Professor,*
*Department of Computer Engineering*
*Devang Patel Institute of Advance Technology & Research (DEPSTAR),*
*Charotar University of Science & Technology.*

subject: Fwd: PPIs and a prize pool of INR 8 lakhs with Novartis NEST | Open for your students
snippet: Hi Team, Your students are eligible to take part in Novartis NEST, a challenge where they can land PPIs and claim a prize pool of INR 8,00000 from the leading innovative medicine brand. More in store
content:
Hi Team,

Your students are eligible to take part in *Novartis NEST*
<https://mstats.dare2compete.com/CL0/https:%2F%2Fsendy.dare2compete.com%2Fl%2FgEDtb5dK0MNeD7Bno1PWAw%2FIQZfqijE0Gt5XySVYpIYgw%2F6H892325v6zOk9KhDIiUspnQ/1/010901934804bf69-ba3d00a4-08f5-4633-aaa0-d74ad28e9455-000000/hmFq_yFVJU4Kko9suIrxDRRTy2RALZ6AHH89MIjOAQY=182>,
a challenge where they can land *PPIs* and claim a prize pool of *INR
8,00,000* from the leading innovative medicine brand.

*More in store for your students:*

   - Winners of *each* of the *four* use cases will receive a cash prize of
   INR 1,25,000/-
   - The first runners-up of *each* of the *four* use cases will receive a
   cash prize of INR 75,000/-
   - All the *National Finalists* stand a chance to land *PPIs* from
   Novartis
   - Selected candidates stand a chance to collaborate with Novartis on
   co-creating a solution

*Eligibility*: All students, start-ups, and incubators can participate.

*Application link*: https://bit.ly/novartis-nest
<https://mstats.dare2compete.com/CL0/https:%2F%2Fsendy.dare2compete.com%2Fl%2FgEDtb5dK0MNeD7Bno1PWAw%2Fay763QeyyXDjKn5bJp0Cqrtg%2F6H892325v6zOk9KhDIiUspnQ/1/010901934804bf69-ba3d00a4-08f5-4633-aaa0-d74ad28e9455-000000/fyBv_HTAkRFFf-laWpnQ7qMDxAloCJOd2z-KK7uUv3g=182>

Share this opportunity with your students and help them nurture their
skills with the global brand.

Regards,
Team Unstop

Unsubscribe here
<https://mstats.dare2compete.com/CL0/https:%2F%2Fsendy.dare2compete.com%2Funsubscribe%2FtEk0SVHvDvKyKXF763oywQGRamnUjmC9E5CAJfE4JYc5slQB8xdXemWN70j79vskOi%2FSYQ3P6O1g2jnppbBvqPSzg%2F6H892325v6zOk9KhDIiUspnQ/1/010901934804bf69-ba3d00a4-08f5-4633-aaa0-d74ad28e9455-000000/kjbdutbMLcD5lYE3gnGIRlLjq_bFZBUmLujbxee-PTQ=182>

subject: Congratulations on Being Selected for the University Cultural Team!
snippet: Dear Participants, We are excited to inform you that you have been selected to be a part of the University Cultural Team! Your talent and enthusiasm stood out, and we are thrilled to have you on board.
content:
Dear Participants,

We are excited to inform you that you have been selected to be a part of
the University Cultural Team!  Your talent and enthusiasm stood out, and we
are thrilled to have you on board.



*To stay updated on upcoming meetings, rehearsals, and team activities,
please join our official WhatsApp group using the link
below:https://chat.whatsapp.com/Io5Ydo7IFxk8yV6OJQI16S
<https://chat.whatsapp.com/Io5Ydo7IFxk8yV6OJQI16S>*

We look forward to working together. If you have any questions or need
further information, feel free to reach out.

Once again, congratulations, and welcome to the team!

Best regards,
Student coordinator

subject: INFO_STUDENT NOTICE
snippet: Dear Students of Charotar University of Science and Technology FINAL CALL FOR DECEMBER AND JANUARY BATCH Teachnook, in collaboration with Cognizance IIT Roorkee, is offering a 2-month Training +
content:
Dear Students of

*Charotar University of Science and TechnologyFINAL CALL FOR DECEMBER AND
JANUARY BATCH*

Teachnook, in collaboration with Cognizance *IIT Roorkee*, is offering a
2-month Training + Internship program. This opportunity is available for
every department with fixed slots. We invite you to complete the
application form to secure your spot.

Congratulations to all who have successfully enrolled in the Industrial
Training & Internship Program. We hope you found the* Induction Session*
 valuable.

*Application Deadline: 12:00 PM [19-11-2024]*

*  Application Form  *


*https://forms.gle/GZsgfg9ggp8wnMpk9 <https://forms.gle/GZsgfg9ggp8wnMpk9>*
*REFERRAL ID: DICE CSAT *(For CHARUSAT College Students only)



*PROGRAM DETAILS*
*- First Month: Training includes live lectures and mentorship from
industry professionals. Login credentials will be provided upon
registration.*

*- Second Month: Internship with live mentorship on projects from
professionals. Experience real-world problems through:*

  *- Project 1:* 10 individual projects to be completed with your mentor.
  *- Project 2:* Capstone Group Project with specific tasks assigned to
each intern.

*Benefits:*

- Program Completion Certificate from IIT Roorkee Cognizance.
- Internship Certificate from Top MNCs with Wipro Dice ID verification.
- 6-month LMS portal access.
- Growth Community pass with placement assistance.
- 24/7 personalized mentorship.
- Complimentary sessions on Gen AI & Prompt Engineering.
- Guidance on Low Code & No Code applications.
- Live & doubt-clearing sessions conducted by industrial experts.
- Guest lectures from Microsoft & Meta.

To enroll in this program, please complete the application form at your
earliest convenience.




*STUDENTS WHO ARE ALREADY ENROLLED, IGNORE THIS MAIL.*
Warm regards,
*Teachnook*
*Cognizance IIT Roorkee*

subject: INFO_STUDENTS of 1st Year to Attend the AICTE Approved Training and Internship Program
snippet: Dear CHARUSAT Student, Applause for the opportunity to participate in the Training and Internship Program! As mentioned above, Teachnook in collaboration with IIT Roorkee (Cognizance) is organizing a
content:
Dear *CHARUSAT* Student,* Applause for the opportunity to participate in
the Training and Internship Program!*

As mentioned above, *Teachnook* in collaboration with *IIT Roorkee
(Cognizance)* is organizing a *WIPRO Verified 2-Month Training + Internship
Program*. This is your chance to master Low Code, No Code, and Prompt
Engineering while gaining real-world experience!
*CLICK TO ONBOARD: https://forms.gle/WsnTxKdcRwpD8ZXw6
<https://forms.gle/WsnTxKdcRwpD8ZXw6>*

*Join Our Official WhatsApp Group For More Information;*

  https://chat.whatsapp.com/K43ThNxKpaXAfLfHio5hRq
<https://chat.whatsapp.com/K43ThNxKpaXAfLfHio5hRq>

*Explore the details below to see what awaits you:*
*1. Training üéì*

   - *Professional Mentors*: Learn from industry experts who will guide you
   through every step.
   - *From Scratch*: Master fundamentals and advanced skills, flawless for
   any skill level.
   - *Low Code/No Code*: Build powerful applications with minimal coding
   knowledge.
   - *Generative AI*: Develop and fine-tune AI models for cutting-edge
   applications.
   - *Prompt Engineering*: Learn to design and optimize AI prompts for
   enhanced recital.

*2. Internship üë©‚Äçüíª*

   - *10+ Live Projects*: Apply your knowledge in real-world projects and
   gain invaluable experience.
   - *Capstone Project*: Collaborate with partnered companies on impactful
   projects.
   - *Resume Building*: Obtain expert guidance to craft a standout resume
   that gets noticed.
   - *Mock Interviews*: Receive feedback from industry experts to sharpen
   your interview skills.
   - *Masterclasses*: Learn from top leaders in global companies through
   exclusive sessions.

*Certification üéñÔ∏è*

   - *Course Certificate*: Receive a prestigious certificate from IIT
   Roorkee Cognizance.
   - *Internship Certificate*: Receive a certificate from our partnered
   companies to bolster your resume.
   - *Verified by WIPRO Dice ID*: Gain credible and valuable credentials
   recognized in the industry.




  Bipin Shah
Key Account Manager,Teachnook
9364102817
| teachnook.com
| bipin@teachnook.com
592, 3rd Block, Koramangala 1A Block, Koramangala 3 Block, Koramangala,

Dear Students
Pls note that the institute will conduct an exam of MSUD101 on 18/11/2024
for the late admitted students and for those students who remain absent in
the Midterm exam conducted in the month of September. The paper style and
Syllabus of the exam is as follows:
Paper Style
05 MCQ +15 Marks Discreptive questions
Syllabus:
Unit 1 : Higher order derivative
Unit 2 : Infinite series *( Infinite series * *only* *and Complex number is
not included in the exam)*
Unit 3 : Matrix
Unit 4: Partial differentiation
BEST OF LUCK ....

If you have any queries, then consult me in the staff room 309, 2nd floor,
Ec Ee building.

*Thanks and regards,*
*Rajesh V. Savalia *

*Assistant Professor*
*Department of Mathematical Sciences*

*Accredited Grade 'A+' by NAAC *
*Website: https://www.charusat.ac.in/ <https://www.charusat.ac.in/>*
*M. No. 94292 22899*

snippet: ---------- Forwarded message --------- From: Dr. Rajesh Savalia <rajeshsavalia.maths@charusat.ac.in> Date: Thu, Nov 7, 2024 at 11:11 AM Subject: Quiz - II of MSUD101 on 22/11/2024(Rewised date)
content:
---------- Forwarded message ---------
From: Dr. Rajesh Savalia <rajeshsavalia.maths@charusat.ac.in>
Date: Thu, Nov 7, 2024 at 11:11‚ÄØAM
Subject: Quiz - II of MSUD101 on 22/11/2024(Rewised date)
To: <24dcse@charusat.edu.in>, <24dce@charusat.edu.in>, <
24dit@charusat.edu.in>, <24dcs@charusat.edu.in>


Dear Students
Good Morning
Please note that the MSUD101 online quiz II will be conducted on Google
Forms on 22/11/2024 between 11:15 and 11:25. *Earlier it was scheduled for
18/11/202. I**t has been rescheduled for 22/11/2024** due to the Midterm
Exam for late-admitted students.*
The link will be shared on your institute mail ID.
*Make sure you have your institute email ID (________@charusat.edu.in
<https://mail.google.com/mail/?view=cm&fs=1&to=________%40charusat.edu.in&authuser=0>)
and Password of account otherwise, you will not be able to take the exam.*

*Syllabus of the exam : *
Unit 2
Infinite Series*(Only infinite series and complex number is not included)*
Tests of convergence of series viz., comparison test, ratio test, root
test, Leibnitz test

Unit 4 Partial differentiation
Partial derivative and geometrical interpretation, Euler‚Äôs theorem with
corollaries and their
applications, Chain rule, Implicit functions, Total differentials

Unit 5 Applications of Partial Differentiations*(Half of the Unit)*
Maclaurin‚Äôs and Taylor‚Äôs series expansion in two variables, Tangent plane
and normal line to a surface, Maxima and Minima of the function of two
variables
*Thanks and regards,*
*Rajesh V. Savalia *

Dear Students
Good Morning
Please note that the MSUD101 online quiz II will be conducted on Google
Forms on 21/11/2024 between 11:15 and 11:25. *Earlier it was scheduled for
18/11/202. I**t has been rescheduled for 22/11/2024** due to the Midterm
Exam for late-admitted students.*
The link will be shared on your institute mail ID.
*Make sure you have your institute email ID (________@charusat.edu.in
<https://mail.google.com/mail/?view=cm&fs=1&to=________%40charusat.edu.in&authuser=0>)
and Password of account otherwise, you will not be able to take the exam.*

*Syllabus of the exam : *
Unit 2
Infinite Series*(Only infinite series and complex number is not included)*
Tests of convergence of series viz., comparison test, ratio test, root
test, Leibnitz test

Unit 4 Partial differentiation
Partial derivative and geometrical interpretation, Euler‚Äôs theorem with
corollaries and their
applications, Chain rule, Implicit functions, Total differentials

Unit 5 Applications of Partial Differentiations*(Half of the Unit)*
Maclaurin‚Äôs and Taylor‚Äôs series expansion in two variables, Tangent plane
and normal line to a surface, Maxima and Minima of the function of two
variables
*Thanks and regards,*
*Rajesh V. Savalia *
*PhD, MPhil*
*Assistant Professor*
*Department of Mathematical Sciences*
*P. D. Patel Institute of Applied **Sciences*
*Charotar University of Science and Technology*
*Accredited Grade 'A+' by NAAC *
*Website: https://www.charusat.ac.in/ <https://www.charusat.ac.in/>*
*M. No. 94292 22899*

subject: [IMPORTANT]IIT CERTIFICATIONS & AICTE Approved Industrial Internships For First Year CHARUSAT Students
snippet: DEAR STUDENTS OF CHAROTAR UNIVERSITY OF SCIENCE & TECHNOLOGY ANAND, GUJRAT Warm Greetings! We are pleased to share an incredible opportunity in partnership with IIT Roorkee's Cognizance: a 2-
content:
*DEAR STUDENTSOFCHAROTAR UNIVERSITY OF SCIENCE & TECHNOLOGYANAND, GUJRAT*

*Warm Greetings!*

We are pleased to share an incredible opportunity in partnership with *IIT
Roorkee's Cognizance*: a *2-Month Training and Internship Program* featuring
certifications from prestigious companies including *Cisco, Meta
(Facebook), IBM*, and other leading multinational organizations across
various fields.

*Who Can Apply?*
We invite applications from shortlisted students in all departments. If any
of your classmates haven't received this information, please feel free to
forward this email to them.

*It is Important for Interested Students to submit their application, if
you get shortlisted you will be getting a response from our HR Team:*

Submit your Application
<https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLScvYrnZebeH9i8L6E_AYZP0Ppa7izhxfQZ06E4oDR4SdhTgFQ/viewform?usp=sf_link>


* Program Overview:*

*First Month: Training*

   - Participate in live lectures and receive guidance from industry
   professionals.
   - You will receive login details after registering.

*Second Month: Internship*

   - Engage in real-world projects with professional mentorship.
   - *Project Details:*
      - *Individual Assignments:* Complete 10 unique projects with your
      mentor.
      - *Group Capstone Project:* Collaborate in teams on a capstone
      project, with specific roles assigned to each intern. All necessary
      resources will be provided by the company.

*Class Formats:*

   1. *Blended Learning:*
      - Access recorded sessions and join live doubt-clearing sessions
      every weekend.
   2. *Live Mentor-led Classes:*
      - Attend live Zoom sessions 2-3 times per week at 6:30 PM, with
      recorded sessions available for later review. You will also have
access to
      our Learning Management System (LMS) for six months.

*Certificates and Benefits:*

Upon completion, students will receive:

   - A *Certificate of Completion* from Cognizance IIT Roorkee.
   - Verified certificates through *Wipro Dice ID*.
   - A *Co-branded Internship Certificate* from leading MNCs.
   - *100% Placement Assistance* and entry to a growing professional
   network.
   - Training on *Low-Code and No-Code Tools*.
   - Curriculum focused on *Generative AI and Prompt Engineering*.
   - Exclusive *Masterclasses* with industry leaders.
   - Personalized mentorship for tailored guidance.



*Don‚Äôt miss out on this valuable opportunity!*
*Interested students should submit their applications to be part of this
transformative experience.*


Submit your Application
<https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLScvYrnZebeH9i8L6E_AYZP0Ppa7izhxfQZ06E4oDR4SdhTgFQ/viewform?usp=sf_link>



*Best regards,*

*AKASH KAPOOR*
*Senior Academic **Counselor*
*HR MANAGER'S TNK*

Dear *CHARUSAT* Student,* Congratulations for getting a chance for the
Training and Internship Program!*

As mentioned above, *Teachnook* in collaboration with *IIT Roorkee
(Cognizance)* is organizing a *WIPRO Verified 2-Month Training + Internship
Program*. This is your chance to master Low Code, No Code, and Prompt
Engineering while gaining real-world experience!

<https://forms.gle/WsnTxKdcRwpD8ZXw6>*

<https://chat.whatsapp.com/K43ThNxKpaXAfLfHio5hRq>

*Explore the details below to see what awaits you:*
*1. Training üéì*

   - *Professional Mentors*: Learn from industry experts who will guide you
   through every step.
   - *From Scratch*: Master fundamentals and advanced skills, perfect for
   any skill level.
   - *Low Code/No Code*: Build powerful applications with minimal coding
   knowledge.
   - *Generative AI*: Develop and fine-tune AI models for cutting-edge
   applications.
   - *Prompt Engineering*: Learn to design and optimize AI prompts for
   enhanced performance.

*2. Internship üë©‚Äçüíª*

   - *10+ Live Projects*: Apply your knowledge in real-world projects and

   projects.
   - *Resume Building*: Get expert guidance to craft a standout resume that
   gets noticed.
   - *Mock Interviews*: Receive feedback from industry experts to sharpen
   your interview skills.
   - *Masterclasses*: Learn from top leaders in global companies through
   exclusive sessions.

*Certification üéñÔ∏è*

   - *Course Certificate*: Receive a prestigious certificate from IIT
   Roorkee Cognizance.
   - *Internship Certificate*: Earn a certificate from our partnered
   companies to bolster your resume.
   - *Verified by WIPRO Dice ID*: Gain credible and valuable credentials
   recognized in the industry.


*Warisha*
*Key Account Manager*
*9364102817*
*warisha.nouman@teachnook.com <warisha.nouman@teachnook.com>*

subject: Students: kickstart Your Career under Industrial experts guidanceüíº on giving eligiblity
snippet: HELLO STUDENTS.... CHARUSAT üéØAre you ready to transform your career? We extend a warm invitation for you to participate in the COGNIZANCE (IIT ROORKEE) Industrial Learning and Certification Program. We
content:
HELLO STUDENTS.... CHARUSAT
üéØAre you ready to transform your career? We extend a warm invitation for
you to participate in the COGNIZANCE (IIT ROORKEE) Industrial Learning and
Certification Program.
                         *We kindly request you to fill out the application
form to provide us with more information about you:*

Submit Your Application

GOOGLE link:
https://forms.gle/5QsUKieWT6hfopYE7

Join Our Official WhatsApp Group For More Information:
https://chat.whatsapp.com/BWQFpMKPbgLDeQ8cwmm1WU


*FIND THE BELOW ATTACHMENTS FOR REFERENCE:*

*üìöFirst month:* IIT training has been designed in the form of Live
lectures along with living mentorship from industry professionals. (Login
credentials will be provided to students after registration)

*üßë‚ÄçüíªSecond month:* Internship with live mentorship for projects from
professionals. The LIVE INDUSTRY PROJECT will give students experience in
solving real-world problems.



*Project 1- *10 individual projects are assigned to each intern, which they
must complete with their mentor.

*Project 2-* Capstone Project: It's a group project assigned to 15 interns.
For each intern particular work will be assigned to them, and they have to
work on it.

(Essential data and materials required for the project will be provided by
the company side itself)

üî•Don't miss out‚Äîthis opportunity is too good to keep to yourself. Share it
with your peers and let‚Äôs grow together!

Learn More About The Program <https://teachnook.com/mentor>



*Program Highlights:*

   - India's First - offering programs with low-code and no code tools,
   with a promise of 100% outcome-driven results
   - Linked In Top Startup 2023
   - Certifications from Cognizance - IIT Roorkee verified through Wipro
   Dice ID
   - Learn from tech - giant mentors and industry leaders
   - Cutting-edge curriculum including generative AI and prompt engineering
   - Exclusive masterclasses with students, founders, and CXos from top
   global companies
   - Personalized instructors for comprehensive guidance from start to
   finish

*üåüStudent Success Stories*

"Introduced myself to data science and deep dived in to core of it while
doing projects. Had a good learning experience."

- Atul Kumar (" LinkedIn Profile
<https://www.linkedin.com/posts/atul-kumar-325086260_python-ai-ml-activity-7206308025538621440-oT5h?utm_source=share&utm_medium=member_desktop>
")

"Successfully completed "MICROBIOLOGY" course on Teachnook,Strengthened
expertise in core concepts of microbiology."
- Ashrita (" LinkedIn Profile
<https://www.linkedin.com/in/ashrita-panuganty-417315229?lipi=urn%3Ali%3Apage%3Ad_flagship3_profile_view_base_contact_details%3BaxzuAcKNQ7WrWrpUMJRfdw%3D%3D>
")

"Excited to have completed my online internship! It was an incredible
learning journey that enhanced my skills and broadened my perspective on
Artificial intelligence."
- YuvaSri (" LinkedIn Profile
<https://www.linkedin.com/in/yuvasri-n-7a85aa234?lipi=urn%3Ali%3Apage%3Ad_flagship3_profile_view_base_contact_details%3Bf1Xs3GLPSZOmQn%2B%2BVb%2BU6g%3D%3D>
")

"Excited to share my latest achievement: completing an internship in the
dynamic world of stock markets! üìàüéì"

- Nandana (" LinkedIn Profile
<https://www.linkedin.com/in/nandana-beneesh?lipi=urn%3Ali%3Apage%3Ad_flagship3_profile_view_base_contact_details%3BYtMYGrezQbK4iehub437og%3D%3D>
")



*üöÄSecure your spot now to pave the way for a successful career journey
with Teachnook !*

Please find the list of Mini Project Definitions for the CCP subject. You  
are required to select a definition from the list for your mini project.

Important Points to Note:
‚Ä¢ Form your group within your class only ‚Äì no interbatch groups are allowed.
‚Ä¢ Each group must consist of exactly 3 students.
‚Ä¢ Project definitions will be approved on a first-come, first-served basis  
by me.
‚Ä¢ No two groups will be allowed to work on the same project definition.

content:
Mark the deadline.

subject: CHARUSAT - FMS - IIIM - Invitation @ Prabandhan 2024 (Exhibition cum Sale) - Inaugural Ceremony
snippet: Dear All, Greetings! We are thrilled to inform you that Indukaka Ipcowala Institute of Management (IIIM) is organising PRABANDHAN ‚Äì 2024 from October 25 to 28, 2024 (10:00 AM to 09:00 PM). Prabandhan
content:
Dear All,



Greetings!



We are thrilled to inform you that Indukaka Ipcowala Institute of
Management (IIIM) is organising *PRABANDHAN ‚Äì 2024 *from October 25 to 28,
2024 (10:00 AM to 09:00 PM).


Prabandhan is a student-driven event in which students work in close
collaboration with industries, entrepreneurs, gruh-udhyog, and SMEs to
understand the product, devise marketing strategies, learn financial
management and negotiation skills, and ultimately sell the product.


You are invited to visit the exhibition with your family, friends, and
relatives to motivate the student participants.




The inaugural ceremony details are as follows:



*Chief Guest: Anitaben Patel & Aartiben Patel (IPCO Parivar)*

*Place: Sardar Patel Banquet Hall, Anand (Opp. D Z Patel High School, 80
Feet Road, Anand)*

*Date: October 25, 2024 (Friday)*

*Timing: 10:00 AM*



*Please find the attached invitation and product poster herewith this mail.*


*Hoping to see you all at Prabandhan 2024 during all the four days of the
event (October 25-28, 2024).*



*Regards,*



*TEAM PRABANDHAN - IIIM*

--

subject: Fwd: Certified Ethical Hacker v13 (CEHv13) - World‚Äôs No. 1 Ethical Hacking Certification, now with the power of AI (Oct 2024) - For CHARUSAT Students Only
snippet: Dear students, We are glad to inform you that "Charotar University of Science and Technology - CHARUSAT" is the official EC-Council Academia Partner since January 2020. We are immensely
content:
Dear students,

We are glad to inform you that *"Charotar University of Science and
Technology - CHARUSAT"* is the official *EC-Council Academia Partner *since
January 2020. We are immensely pleased to welcome ‚ÄúCHARUSAT‚Äù *students* to
EC Council's newly launched *CEHv13* program. Certified Ethical
Hacker CEHv13
<https://www.eccouncil.org/programs/certified-ethical-hacker-ceh/> will
teach you the latest commercial-grade hacking tools, techniques, and
methodologies hackers and information security professionals use to hack an
organization lawfully. *100+ students have benefited from CEH at CHARUSAT
with a subsidized academia kit price.*

*What‚Äôs new in CEHv13?*: *From the creators of Certified Ethical Hacker
(CEH) comes the latest and evolved version 13 with added AI capabilities.
Structured across 20 learning modules covering over 550 attack techniques,
CEH provides cybersecurity professionals with the core knowledge they need
to detect and defend against emerging threats.*

*You will get:*

   - EC-Council Official Course Book for CEHv13 for self-study (24 Months) -
   Accessible Online/Offline. To Download App
   <https://support.vitalsource.com/hc/en-us/articles/201344733-Bookshelf-Download-Options>

   - Access To iLabs for 6 Months. Check the ilabs Demo Here:
   *https://youtu.be/iU_7zKypJZI* <https://youtu.be/iU_7zKypJZI>.
   - An Exam Voucher (1 Year) - *Get a globally recognized certificate
for* passing
   the exam. Accreditations
   <https://linkprotect.cudasvc.com/url?a=https%3a%2f%2fwww.eccouncil.org%2faccreditations%2f&c=E,1,hLej6Kb3ZRL_QKhhm71kedMm89bbj8UclU3d50zuCt2frG_t19Fir_60SvUk16RJBGYXwVBLF11HLMhr7nDv8WGkPElWNiTm9zdZ_xfo&typo=1>
   - Over 200 hands-on labs with Over 3,500 hacking tools. Learn how to
   hack multiple operating systems (Windows 11, Windows servers, Linux,
   Ubuntu, Android)
   - The venue of the Exam will be our University Premises.

*Popular Cybersecurity Tools in the Course:*


* - Network scanning and mapping tools (e.g., Nmap, hping3)- Vulnerability
assessment tools (e.g., OpenVAS, Nessus)- Penetration testing tools (e.g.,
Metasploit, Aircrack-ng)- Packet sniffers and network analyzers (e.g.,
Wireshark, Omnipeek Network Analyzer)- Social engineering tools (e.g.,
Social-Engineer Toolkit (SET), SpeedPhish Framework (SPF))- Password
cracking tools (e.g., John the Ripper, L0phtCrack)- Forensics tools (e.g.
FTK, EnCase, Autopsy)- Wireless hacking tools (e.g., Aircrack-ng,
Wifiphisher)- Encryption tools (e.g., CryptoForge, VeraCrypt)*
*Master AI to automate ethical hacking tasks and hack and defend against AI
systems.*

*‚Ä¢ ShellGPT* ‚Äì Automates various reconnaissance and penetration testing
tasks using AI-driven scripting.
*‚Ä¢ ChatGPT *‚Äì Helps generate code, automate tasks, and create scripts for
ethical hacking.
‚Ä¢ *FraudGPT* ‚Äì Simulates AI-assisted malicious activities to learn defense
strategies.
‚Ä¢ *WormGPT* ‚Äì An offensive AI tool used to simulate exploitations and
malware creation.
‚Ä¢ *DeepExploit* ‚Äì AI-powered vulnerability scanning and exploitation tool.
‚Ä¢ *Nebula* ‚Äì Automates network discovery and vulnerability identification
with AI.
‚Ä¢ *Veed.io* ‚Äì Can visualize security analytics and post-exploitation
results for better reporting.


*Typical Job Roles for C|EH :*

   - Mid-Level Information Security Auditor
   - Cybersecurity Auditor
   - Security Administrator
   - IT Security Administrator
   - Cyber Defense Analyst
   - Senior Security Consultant
   - Information Security Manager
   - Senior SOC Analyst
   - Solution Architect
   - Cybersecurity Consultant



   - Vulnerability Assessment Analyst
   - Warning Analyst
   - Information Security Analyst 1
   - Security Analyst L1
   - Infosec Security Administrator
   - Cybersecurity Analyst L1, L2, & L3
   - Network Security Engineer
   - SOC Security Analyst
   - Security Analyst
   - Network Engineer

*Webinar on "A Career in Cybersecurity" by EC-Council with Collaboration of
CHARUSAT | Campus Official: *https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=X-QgxO3JhlA


*Testimonials:*

   - How Certified Ethical Hacker Helped Me Land a Job with Big4 | Sidhant
   Gupta <https://youtu.be/PLvVyh96n8M?si=IVLEptb5F-QPMUaw>
   - Catch Your Big Break in Cybersecurity with C|EH | Ravina Joshi
   <https://youtu.be/TO7veOnV9T4?si=uzHTokSpVAtp1iOm>
   - How C|EH Helped Me Build a Successful Career in Cybersecurity
   <https://youtu.be/SZ8tmKzyBh4?si=TZpSsdfrCeZf2I2j>


*Cost for CHARUSAT Students only:*

   - *We* communicated and requested *the EC-Council for the same, and they

content:
Dear* CHARUSAT UNIVERSITY* Students,

Are you still struggling to Learn *programming languages* or excel in
your *core
domain?* It's time to take the leap with LearnFlu!

LearnFlu brings you an exciting opportunity to transform your career with
our 10-week *Govt-approved Training & Internship Program* in collaboration
with *500+ MNCs and startups*. This is your chance to learn from industry
experts and gain skills equivalent to those taught at premier institutions
like *IITs and IIMs.*
Why Choose LearnFlu?

   - *Govt-Approved Training*: Trusted and recognized for its quality.
   - *Learn from Top Experts*: Learn cutting-edge skills in programming and
   your core domain.
   - *500+ MNCs & Startups*: Hands-on internships with industry leaders.
   - *Career-Boosting Internship*: Practical experience with potential job
   opportunities.
   - *Flexible Learning*: Online modules to suit your schedule.

What You Get:

   - Opportunity to network with professionals and potential employers.
   - Official certification and internship experience that stands out on
   your resume.

snippet: Dear Students, üéâ Cheers! You have been elected for the prestigious Teachnook's WIPRO-Verified 2-Month Training + Internship Program, in collaboration with IIT Roorkee (Cognizance) ü§ù. This is an
content:
*Dear Students,*
üéâ Cheers! You have been elected for the prestigious Teachnook's
WIPRO-Verified 2-Month Training + Internship Program, in collaboration with
IIT Roorkee (Cognizance) ü§ù. This is an exceptional moment to master
cutting-edge technologies and gain hands-on experience in the industry.


*üìù Appeal in this spot:** https://forms.gle/qN9ev12dRq4JrdzX9
<https://forms.gle/qN9ev12dRq4JrdzX9>*

*üì± Join Our Official WhatsApp Group For More Information:*
*https://chat.whatsapp.com/FoCH2ksmzC31ogZEhbaMTy
<https://chat.whatsapp.com/FoCH2ksmzC31ogZEhbaMTy>*

*üìö Program Highlights:*

‚ú® Expert Mentors: Learn from industry leaders and gain valuable insights
‚ú® Hands-on Learning: Develop skills in Low Code/No Code, AI Prompt
Engineering, and more
‚ú® Work on 10+ Live Projects: Apply your skills to real-world problems and
showcase your expertise
‚ú® Capstone Project: Collaborate with companies and demonstrate your
competence
‚ú® Career Boost: Receive expert resume-building advice, practice interviews,
and masterclasses from renowned global leaders

*üìù Certification:*

‚ú® Official Certificates: Obtain outstanding credentials from IIT Roorkee
and our partner companies
‚ú® Verified Credentials: Stand out with a WIPRO Dice ID
‚ú® Placement Assistance: Join our Growth Community for immediate job
placement assistance

üë• Hear from our previous interns who have benefited from this program:

üöÄ " Drive branding success through research, content creation, and
campaign support. Collaborate for consistent messaging, analyze data for
insights, and contribute to elevating brand awareness.  "*LinkedIn*
<https://www.linkedin.com/in/anupam-anand05/>- *Anupam Anand, NIT DELHI*

üöÄ " Honored to be recognized as a keen and enthusiastic candidate
throughout the program, and I‚Äôm looking forward to applying these skills to
protect organizations and ensure digital safety üåçüí°.  "*LinkedIn
<https://www.linkedin.com/posts/dev1106_cybersecurity-securityanalyst-internship-activity-7249092344665325569-1gXu?utm_source=share&utm_medium=member_desktop>
*
- *Dev Suthar, Gandhi University*

üåü " I‚Äôm thrilled to announce that I‚Äôve completed an internship program
with Teachnook, powered by IIT Roorkee! üöÄ This incredible opportunity
allows me to dive deeper into [ Graphic designer ] while working alongside
experienced professionals and mentors from one of India‚Äôs premier
institutions.  " -*LinkedIn*
<https://www.linkedin.com/posts/shivani-754417298_internship-teachnook-iitroorkee-activity-7248744007520972803-xXNJ?utm_source=share&utm_medium=member_desktop>
 *Shivani, BIT Mesra*

üìà "I'm happy to share that I'm starting a  position as Campus Ambassador
at TEACHNOOK...!" -*LinkedIn* <https://www.linkedin.com/in/tiya-6b0386283/>
  *TIYA**, NIT DELHI*

üëâ Don't miss this occasion to boost your career! Pursue and take the first
step towards a bright future.

Best Regards,
IIT ROORKEE (Cognizance)

P.S. Don't forget to follow us on LinkedIn for more updates and
opportunities! üíº

subject: AICTE Approved Internship to Get Certified by CISCO, META, IBM to Kick Start your Journey.
snippet: Dear CHARUSAT Student, Applause for being shortlisted for the internship program! As mentioned above, Teachnook in collaboration with MNC & IIT ROORKEE (Cognizance) is organizing a 2-month training
content:
Dear *CHARUSAT *Student, *Applause for being shortlisted for the internship
program!*

As mentioned above, *Teachnook in collaboration with MNC & IIT ROORKEE
(Cognizance)* is organizing a  2-month training + Internship program
designed by the Mentors of MNCs.

*Interested students can Apply If you're selected for the shortlist, our HR
team will contact you;*

*Apply Here  üëâ*   *https://forms.gle/WsnTxKdcRwpD8ZXw6*
<https://forms.gle/WsnTxKdcRwpD8ZXw6>

*Join Our Official WhatsApp Group For More Information;*

 https://chat.whatsapp.com/K43ThNxKpaXAfLfHio5hRq








*Top Preferred Courses:‚úÖ Artificial Intelligence.‚úÖ Data Science.‚úÖ Machine
Learning.‚úÖ Cloud Computing.‚úÖ Full Stack Web Development.Below is an
overview of the program's structure.*

*First month:* During the first month of the program, training will be
conducted in the mode of live lectures, and you will have live mentorship
from industry professionals. You will be provided admittance to your
personal *LMS portal* where you can interact with the trainers and fellow
students. Login credentials will be provided to registered students.

*Second month:* Internship with live mentorship for projects from
professionals. *The LIVE INDUSTRY PROJECT* will give students an experience
in solving real-world problems.

*10+ Minor Project: *The minor project is an individual project, Where
students will be doing projects on each topic they will be learning.

*Major Project (CAPSTONE):* The major project is a group project, and you
will work in a group of 3-4 interns, with specific responsibilities
assigned to each intern. The company will provide you with the required
data and materials for the project.

*Third month:* Based on your enactment during the first two months of the
program, we will conduct a technical interview in the same company during
the third month. You will be offered a stipend-based Internship if you
perform well in the interview.





*After Completion of the program, the student shall receive a :‚úÖ Program
completion certificate issued by IIT-ROORKEE Cognizance.‚úÖ The WIPRO Dice ID
verified the co-branded internship certificate.‚úÖ Letter of Recommendation
from the Company.‚úÖ Admittance to a growth community.*

*Warisha*
*Key Account Manager*
*9364102817*
*warisha.nouman@teachnook.com <warisha.nouman@teachnook.com>*

Dear Students,

We are excited to invite you to participate in the selection process for
the CHARUSAT team at the upcoming All India/West Zone Inter University
Youth Festival 2024-25. This festival is a prestigious platform where you
can showcase your talents and represent our university on a national level.

*Benefits of Participation:*

- Recognition and Exposure: Gain visibility and recognition for your
talents.

- Skill Development: Enhance your leadership, teamwork, and creative skills.

- National-Level Opportunities: The chance to represent CHARUSAT at
national youth festivals.

- Networking: Build connections with peers across universities.

*Important Details:*

*- Registration Form: *https://forms.gle/C1VFdPTgfucvzUHKA

*- Deadline for Registration:* 1st November, 2024

*- Guidelines, Rules, and Regulations*: Please review the attached
documents carefully for event details and required documents.

We encourage all students to take advantage of this opportunity to grow and
make CHARUSAT proud. For any queries, feel free to contact us.

subject: Fwd: VIVIBHA 2024 - National Conclave, 15-17 November 2024-Reg
snippet: Dear all, I am happy to share that Jeel Mehta [B.Tech (CE) semester 5] has achieved recognition in the VIVIBHA 2024 National Research Paper Competition. Being among the top 0.7% of submissions
content:
Dear all,

I am happy to share that *Jeel Mehta [B.Tech (CE) semester 5] *has achieved
recognition in the VIVIBHA 2024 National Research Paper Competition.

Being among the *top 0.7% of submissions nationwide* is a significant
achievement. Congratulations to Jeel Mehta.

*Best regards,*
*Mr. Jay Patel,*
*Assistant Professor,*
*University-Level Central Students Council**,*
*Department of Computer Engineering,*
*Devang Patel Institute of Advance Technology and Research (DEPSTAR)*
*Charotar University of Science and Technology (CHARUSAT)*
*(M) +919428153390*
*LinkedIn: *www.linkedin.com/in/jrbpatel

*Stay healthy and fit.*
  *Please don't print this e-mail unless you really need to.*


---------- Forwarded message ---------
From: Dr Dweepna Garg <dweepnagarg.ce@charusat.ac.in>
Date: Wed, Oct 16, 2024 at 4:25‚ÄØPM
Subject: Fwd: VIVIBHA 2024 - National Conclave, 15-17 November 2024-Reg
To: Depstar <depstar@charusat.ac.in>
Cc: Principal DEPSTAR <principal.depstar@charusat.ac.in>


Dear all,

It gives me immense pleasure to share that one of *our student Jeel Mehta
[B.Tech (CE) semester 5]* has achieved recognition in the VIVIBHA 2024
National Research Paper Competition.

Her paper titled "The Power of Creativity," was selected as one of the
top *1,200
research articles from a pool of 1,68,000 submissions* across Bharat
in *VIVIBHA
2024 (Vision for Viksit Bharat)*, a National Level Research Paper Writing
Competition.

Jeel has got an opportunity to represent CHARUSAT at the VIVIBHA 2024
National Conference from November 15-17, 2024, at SGT University, Gurugram,
Haryana (however participation is subjective to the university examination
schedule).  The conference offers several prestigious opportunities like
Publication of best research papers, Scholarship support for paper
publication, Esteemed internship opportunities at Institutes of National
Importance across Bharat

Being among the *top 0.7% of submissions nationwide* is a significant
achievement.

Thank you

subject: Fwd: Mandatory Foundation course Quiz for All BTech Students
snippet: ---------- Forwarded message --------- From: Sanni <sannikapatel.phys@charusat.ac.in> Date: Wed, Oct 16, 2024 at 10:14 AM Subject: Mandatory Foundation course Quiz for All BTech Students To: <
content:
---------- Forwarded message ---------
From: Sanni <sannikapatel.phys@charusat.ac.in>
Date: Wed, Oct 16, 2024 at 10:14‚ÄØAM
Subject: Mandatory Foundation course Quiz for All BTech Students
To: <24cspitstudents@charusat.edu.in>, Bhavika Patel <
bhavikapatel.dce@charusat.ac.in>, Dipak Ramoliya <
dipakramoliya.ce@charusat.ac.in>, Ritika Jani <ritikajani.dit@charusat.ac.in
>
Cc: Head Electrical CHARUSAT <hod.ee@charusat.ac.in>, Dean FTE CHARUSAT <
dean.fte@charusat.ac.in>, Head Mechanical CHARUSAT <hod.me@charusat.ac.in>,
Head Physics <head.physics@charusat.ac.in>, Head Maths <
head.maths@charusat.ac.in>, Pratik Pataniya <
pratikpataniya.phys@charusat.ac.in>, Sachin Patel <
sachinpatel.phys@charusat.ac.in>, Dr. Rajesh V. Savalia <
rajeshsavalia.maths@charusat.ac.in>


Dear Students,

*About Foundation Course: *
Foundation Course in Math and Physics, which is a *mandatory audit course*
for all *1st semester BTech students*. This course is designed to bridge
the gap between high school and university-level concepts, focusing on
fundamental topics such as calculus, algebra, mechanics, electromagnetism,
etc. The aim is to build a strong foundation for your advanced engineering
studies.


*Course Evaluation:*>> Internal Online Quiz: 25 Marks *(Date: 19/10/2024 |
3:00 PM to 3:30 PM) (Link will be provided before 05 mins of the quiz time)*
>> External Online Quiz: 25 Marks *(to be announced later with the external
theory exam)*
>> Total: *50 Marks*
>> Both quizzes will be conducted *online (Google Forms)*.
>> Questions in both quizzes will be asked from the question banks attached
with this email.


*Important Note:*
*1) No excuse for internet connectivity, device failure, etc will be
entertained. If you failed to attend the quiz then you shall be marked
absent.*
*2) This is a separate course that has to do nothing with your
ongoing Engineering Physics and Engineering Mathematics courses.*

*Attachments*
1) Syllabus of Foundation Course
2) Question Bank of Physics and Mathematics

For any queries, please feel free to reach out.

Best regards,
Sanni
--

subject: Announcement of ULSC Logo Competition Winner
snippet: Dear Students and Faculty, We are excited to announce the winner of the ULSC Logo Competition! After careful consideration and review of all the creative submissions, we are pleased to congratulate
content:
Dear Students and Faculty,

We are excited to announce the winner of the ULSC Logo Competition!

After careful consideration and review of all the creative submissions, we
are pleased to congratulate *Satyam Charola (ID: 22CE016)* as the winner of
this competition. His design will represent the ULSC, and we appreciate the
effort and creativity he put into the logo.

Satyam was awarded with a cash prize for his achievement.

We extend our heartfelt thanks to all participants for their outstanding
contributions and enthusiasm. Stay tuned for more such opportunities!

Best regards,

*Convener*


*University Level Central Students Council*

*CHARUSAT.*

--

subject: Fwd: Urgent: Encouragement for Student Participation in Yuva Sangam Phase-5.
snippet: ---------- Forwarded message --------- From: Principal DEPSTAR <principal.depstar@charusat.ac.in> Date: Tue, Oct 15, 2024 at 9:04 AM Subject: Fwd: Urgent: Encouragement for Student Participation
content:
---------- Forwarded message ---------
From: Principal DEPSTAR <principal.depstar@charusat.ac.in>
Date: Tue, Oct 15, 2024 at 9:04‚ÄØAM
Subject: Fwd: Urgent: Encouragement for Student Participation in Yuva
Sangam Phase-5.
To: Depstar <depstar@charusat.ac.in>




---------- Forwarded message ---------
From: AICTE(no-reply) <noreply1@aicte-india.org>
Date: Mon, Oct 14, 2024 at 5:42‚ÄØPM
Subject: Urgent: Encouragement for Student Participation in Yuva Sangam
Phase-5.
To: <principal.depstar@charusat.ac.in>


*Gentle Reminder!*

Dear Vice Chancellor/Director/Principal/ Dean,
Greetings from AICTE!

As you know, Yuva Sangam is a key initiative under the Ek Bharat Shreshtha
Bharat (EBSB) program, launched by the Hon'ble Prime Minister of India.
This flagship program facilitates exposure tours for youth primarily
students from Higher Educational Institutions (HEIs) to experience diverse
cultures and achievements across different states. Through these exchanges,
we aim to foster national integration and understanding among young people.

Yuva Sangam not only emphasizes cultural exchange but also includes
activities designed to enhance leadership, sports, and soft skills.
Participants will engage in workshops on communication and teamwork, take
part in sports events organized by SAI, and have the chance to interact
with VVIPs and notable personalities from the host state.

The success of previous Yuva Sangam phases underscores the vital role of
youth in building connections across communities. This initiative has
positively impacted the lives of thousands, contributing to a more united
and inclusive India.

I encourage you to motivate your students to register for Yuva Sangam
Phase-5, an enriching student exchange program under EBSB.

Registration is open from *October 10, 2024* to *October 21, 2024* and can
be completed online at https://ebsb.aicte-india.org/.

Please find attached a document with strategies to inspire student
registrations for Yuva Sangam.

Thank you for your support.

PFA:
https://drive.google.com/file/d/185HEA2xFC-E7F_m5B2ltwDzMUkeHmx52/view?usp=sharing


PFA:
https://drive.google.com/file/d/17xAJKN_yZcXZ4Q2ZyN-XDgba3JeuA1JL/view?usp=sharing


PFA:
https://docs.google.com/document/d/1uTQIiAiaeBZ19EvRBtyKXhNsSAqkynme/edit?usp=sharing&ouid=117518947182740027481&rtpof=true&sd=true


*Best regards,*
*Naresh Grover*

*Director (Nodal Officer, Yuva Sangam)AICTE*

snippet: Dear 1st Year Student Of Depstar, Having Enrollment Number 24dce084 Congratulations on Starting Your New Technical Journey Into The Campus! As mentioned above, The Student Internship Portal Is in
content:
*Dear 1st Year Student Of Depstar, Having Enrollment Number 24dce084*
*Congratulations on Starting Your New Technical Journey Into The Campus!*

*As mentioned above, The Student Internship Portal Is in collaboration with
IIT Roorkee Cognizance & Top MNCs is organizing a 2 Month Training +
Internship program designed by Industrial Mentors From Top Tech Giants.*

*Students Kindly Go Through All The Information Which Is Mentioned In the
Description Of the  Google Form, **Before Filling The Google Form:*

*Application Form:*
*https://forms.gle/LEvnwM67eV494eD89 <https://forms.gle/LEvnwM67eV494eD89>*

*The Certifications Which Is Provided After Completion Of Internship, has
To Be Submitted In University Portal For Internship Benefits **& Authorised
Certification.*

*Program Highlights:*

*1.Training Sessions: *
*Provides a comprehensive and immersive learning experience by industry
professionals having 10+ years of work experience with over 80+ hours of
content spread across 25-30 modules(Login credentials will be provided to
students after registration)*

*2.Internship: *
*You'll be deployed in the particular MNCs that we are in collaboration
with for the respective domain. There you'll be working as an intern with
that company on 10+ live projects. Essential data and materials required
for the project will be provided by the company side itself. *

*3.Growth Community Access:             *
*We are pleased to inform you that as part of our commitment to
 recognizing and rewarding outstanding performance, You can Apply Stipend
based Internship on their second  month of the internship Performance from
Top MNCs.*


*(And also You'll be having a Mentor from the same MNC, who will be guiding
you in each and every moment of your Internship period.)*


*After Completion of the program the student will receive:*

   - *Course Completion Certificate in collaboration with cognizance
   IIT-Roorkee.*
   - *Internship Completion Certificate from Top MNCs.*
   - *Letter of Recommendation based upon the performance.*
   - *Wipro Company(MNC) DICE ID Certifications.*
   - *Placement Assistance with Resume Building Training.*
   - *Growth Community Access for further opportunities.*

snippet: I would like to bring to your attention the Post Matric Scholarship for SC Students for the academic year 2024-25, This scholarship is aimed at supporting students from Scheduled Castes pursuing in our
content:
I would like to bring to your attention the *Post Matric Scholarship for
SC Students* for the academic year 2024-25, This scholarship is aimed at
supporting students from Scheduled Castes pursuing in our institute, below
mentioned are  some key details

Key details:

   - Eligible students must apply through the *Digital Gujarat Portal* (
   https://www.digitalgujarat.gov.in).
   - Students must complete their registration and upload the required
   documents, including Aadhaar-based biometric eKYC, as part of the process.
   - Scholarships are available for various courses, including ITI,
   Diploma, Medical, Engineering, M.Phil, and Ph.D. programs.
   - Financial assistance includes tuition fee support, coaching, tablet
   assistance, and more depending on the course and student's financial
   background


For further details, students can visit the Digital Gujarat portal or
contact the helpline at 1800-233-5500.

Thank you for your cooperation.

Dear Researcher(s)
