of International Conference on Sustainable Communication Networks and
Application (ICSCNA 2024), which will be held on December 11 - 13, 2024 at
BNEC Campus, Theni, Tamil Nadu, India |*Event Format : Hybrid (In-person
and Virtual)*|. This conference event gathers researchers, scholars, and
industry professionals from around the world to discuss the latest
advancements and innovative research in the field of  computing and
communication technologies.

*Conference Website: https://icoscn.com/
<https://emailapp.tittu.in/p/aHR0cHM6Ly9pY29zY24uY29tLw/click/MTcyODUzNjYyODU1MTEyNC42NzA3NjAzNDBjYzI0QGljb3Njbi5jb20>ICSCSNA

Call for Papers
We encourage you to submit your original research articles and review
studies for presentation at the conference and publication in IEEE.
Submissions are welcome in the following topics (but not limited to):
‚úì Computing and Communication Technologies
‚úì  Sustainable Networking Technologies
‚úì  Emerging Applications

Submission Guidelines
Submitting papers must comply with the conference paper template. Please
note that a .docx and LaTex template is available for formatting your
paper.  Also note that, the ICSCNA Paper Template is a blank Word file,
wherein it includes the pre-prepared styles for headings etc.

*All accepted, registered and presented papers will be published in the 5th

*Contact Information:*

subject: INFO_STUDENT NOTICE
snippet: Dear First Year Student of Charotar University of Science and Technology Congratulations on being shortlisted for our AICTE-approved Internship Program! NOVEMBER-DECEMBER BATCH Teachnook, in
content:
Dear First Year Student of *Charotar University of Science and Technology *


*Congratulations on being shortlisted for our AICTE-approved Internship
Program!*
*NOVEMBER-DECEMBER BATCH*

Teachnook, in collaboration with Cognizance IIT Roorkee, is offering a
2-month Training + Internship program. This opportunity is available for
every department with fixed slots. We invite you to complete the
application form to secure your spot.

*FINAL CALL FOR NOVEMBER BATCH*

*  Application Form:  *
*https://forms.gle/8bQxSh9Rcyzqo72o8 <https://forms.gle/8bQxSh9Rcyzqo72o8>*
*(LAST 10 SLOTS ARE AVAILABLE)*


*PROGRAM DETAILS*
*- First Month: Training includes live lectures and mentorship from
industry professionals. Login credentials will be provided upon
registration.*

*- Second Month: Internship with live mentorship on projects from
professionals. Experience real-world problems through:*

  *- Project 1:* 10 individual projects to be completed with your mentor.
  *- Project 2:* Capstone Group Project with specific tasks assigned to
each intern.

*Benefits:*

- Program Completion Certificate from IIT Roorkee Cognizance.
- Internship Certificate from Top MNCs with Wipro Dice ID verification.
- 6-month LMS portal access.
- Growth Community pass with placement assistance.
- 24/7 personalized mentorship.
- Complimentary sessions on Gen AI & Prompt Engineering.
- Guidance on Low Code & No Code applications.
- Live & doubt-clearing sessions conducted by industrial experts.
- Guest lectures from Microsoft & Meta.

To enroll in this program, please complete the application form at your
earliest convenience.



*STUDENTS WHO ARE ALREADY ENROLLED, IGNORE THIS MAIL.*

Warm regards,

Teachnook
*Cognizance IIT Roorkee*

subject: Seeking Interns: Apply for a Professional Experience with an AICTE Internship to Kick Start your Journey.
snippet: Dear CHARUSAT Student, Applause for being shortlisted for the internship program! As mentioned above, Teachnook in collaboration with MNC & IIT ROORKEE (Cognizance) is organizing a 2-month training
content:
Dear *CHARUSAT *Student, *Applause for being shortlisted for the internship
program!*

As mentioned above, *Teachnook in collaboration with MNC & IIT ROORKEE
(Cognizance)* is organizing a  2-month training + Internship program
designed by the Mentors of MNCs.

*Interested students can Apply If you're selected for the shortlist, our HR
team will contact you;*

*Apply Here  üëâ*   *https://forms.gle/WsnTxKdcRwpD8ZXw6*
<https://forms.gle/WsnTxKdcRwpD8ZXw6>

*Join Our Official WhatsApp Group For More Information;*

 https://chat.whatsapp.com/K43ThNxKpaXAfLfHio5hRq









*Top Preferred Courses:‚úÖ Artificial Intelligence.‚úÖ Data Science.‚úÖ Machine
Learning.‚úÖ Cloud Computing.‚úÖ Full Stack Web Development.Below is an
overview of the program's structure.*

*First month:* During the first month of the program, training will be
conducted in the mode of live lectures, and you will have live mentorship
from industry professionals. You will be provided admittance to your
personal *LMS portal* where you can interact with the trainers and fellow
students. Login credentials will be provided to registered students.

*Second month:* Internship with live mentorship for projects from
professionals. *The LIVE INDUSTRY PROJECT* will give students an experience
in solving real-world problems.

*10+ Minor Project: *The minor project is an individual project, Where
students will be doing projects on each topic they will be learning.

*Major Project (CAPSTONE):* The major project is a group project, and you
will work in a group of 3-4 interns, with specific responsibilities
assigned to each intern. The company will provide you with the required
data and materials for the project.





*After Completion of the program, the student shall receive a :‚úÖ Program
completion certificate issued by IIT-ROORKEE Cognizance.‚úÖ The WIPRO Dice ID
verified the co-branded internship certificate.‚úÖ Letter of Recommendation
from the Company.‚úÖ Admittance to a growth community.*

subject: Fwd: Invite Your Students to Participate in the XR Creator Hackathon ‚Äì A Prestigious National-Level Opportunity
snippet: ---------- Forwarded message --------- From: Principal DEPSTAR <principal.depstar@charusat.ac.in> Date: Wed, Oct 9, 2024 at 9:13 AM Subject: Fwd: Invite Your Students to Participate in the XR
content:
---------- Forwarded message ---------
From: Principal DEPSTAR <principal.depstar@charusat.ac.in>
Date: Wed, Oct 9, 2024 at 9:13‚ÄØAM
Subject: Fwd: Invite Your Students to Participate in the XR Creator
Hackathon ‚Äì A Prestigious National-Level Opportunity
To: Depstar <depstar@charusat.ac.in>




---------- Forwarded message ---------
From: Chhavi Garg <chhavi@bharatxr.co>
Date: Tue, Oct 8, 2024 at 11:56‚ÄØPM
Subject: Invite Your Students to Participate in the XR Creator Hackathon ‚Äì
A Prestigious National-Level Opportunity
To: Principal Depstar <principal.depstar@charusat.ac.in>


Respected Sir/Ma'am,

Are your students ready to take the leap into the future of technology? The *XR
Creator Hackathon <https://forms.gle/3A9XmiQbcx76LUaU6>* is not just
another competition; it's a* gateway to innovation*,* recognition, and
real-world experience* in the thriving field of Extended Reality (XR)! We
invite your esteemed institution to be a part of this transformative
challenge, proudly presented under the *"Create in India" initiative* at
the *WAVES Summit (World Audio Visual & Entertainment Summit)
<https://bharatxr-dot-yamm-track.appspot.com/2HUCq26MeJMXJl19DnlBbBTm4nTkC-suE3F0hrbhjN2T-QPRskgFkwyYJWufNamnf0QSX7g0kUmTtofrVVLvT0aff-uNMtHspgOSAku0wXPTyifprWfg9wikDaY5skQus9eebkHfZdYm8BVyULyAJ6pFHqjOLyC46WB1De4_nN-FPyg>,
*in collaboration with the *Ministry of Information & Broadcasting
<https://bharatxr-dot-yamm-track.appspot.com/2nGIF5f2RutoKyLKWBBb8K00uYrAQ9RdT8VO0ghWHdPEBQfRskgFky6fDjv889b-RcvuaENJn4L5oV-JRubGRn9xj5wRmR8ThvhicikGsoN4tvvblkEd6WKiYAboODzh22Zw4cloMDCqIjfBHUKa5ZPelHvByghpbjw444S5KrUCInkw>,
Bharat XR,
<https://bharatxr-dot-yamm-track.appspot.com/28-WaDsymZgg9SRn415QBFM8wUgJf_NOXsTeJY97hOr0DQfRskgEPotDczTVFEbbDAJmkxZwGoI6SOigwzDNDK0-oEBdOENBBIsCl0l-21T4OmdRvKbfBbd9zyL0A3s-ut1X6u7jjqDP5FIO3Mj9apmbWgCqlC_8FB6E_M3VntKi7Ctk>
Wavelaps, and XDG.*

At *Bharat XR
<https://bharatxr-dot-yamm-track.appspot.com/2TqD2nVTfjJpghpWdCFL0k6jvuDrjhA-Hg20msn-mtUYGQfRskgFAr3lMXKb_7c9l7VfEMVZuVoeU-rQcucbI6ieTZ0LUbN3qRH9EVMlBe-JJf7TOv73oJ8kgA0OylM0heRwmvrfBhk2gdABl5jNjvaGGv85E5Ku8ATof-0cgFoucL5w>*,
we are passionate about leading the charge in Extended Reality technologies
in India. Our mission is to *empower and nurture the next generation of XR
talent,* and this hackathon is a direct extension of that vision. By
participating, your students have the chance to engage with the latest
AR/VR tools, gain hands-on experience, and be recognized on national and
global stages.

*What Awaits the Participants?  *

   - A prize pool of 5 lakh INR
   - Investment opportunities for their winning ideas
   - Global recognition in the XR industry
   - A fully sponsored trip to the WAVES Summit in New Delhi
   - Exclusive chances for sponsored trips to international AR/VR
   conferences

*Choose from Exciting Themes:*
Students can dive into one of five dynamic themes:

   - Healthcare, Fitness, Well-Being
   - Educational Transformation
   - Immersive Tourism
   - Digital Media & Entertainment
   - E-Commerce & Retail Transformation

*How to Register?*

   - Form to nominate yourself as the *PoC* for the hackathon:
   https://forms.gle/dhqDYnkvcBM2ySjX9
   <https://bharatxr-dot-yamm-track.appspot.com/2H2wWoZQmtvt2K0oJxqQo0zolSUAzcL-mNaMzAV4vVPUJQfRskgEylTD0KCvVrLF78i_k4Hdt7Qwnb24b_YGfHVA8s22eiCnpDEQWfiltZsJrCPIflrifqKNOAHmB8wxo6Bd4wzvWm_FKGAOBPAgEMUjCCQIPGUyg_3eVItlU78DeA5BhJaXNrt2JOcDAM_NI7Q>
   - About XR Creator Hackathon: https://wavelaps.com/xrcreatorhackathon/
   <https://bharatxr-dot-yamm-track.appspot.com/2h2Tvnvrvpj7WzNFu9yyAM6sqW4TCY9VMQhz8dn_1-BoLQfRskgFGqZisTc4I04fUt68FoOhoCmfQif8pUS9hGxb8Qla3NBaxIY1tVWWxNN-D6rtJm5bM4SoBzSlRTA1jw0a0car44YaOLbua1JnckV4tltqhCuljJJ9HZw1MVopsurK25vggRZAXJS7C8ck>
   - Encourage your students to *register individually* here, exclusively
   for the college students: https://forms.gle/3A9XmiQbcx76LUaU6
   <https://bharatxr-dot-yamm-track.appspot.com/2uNlK7ddGfMTB6yUiEqPTqJaR2L397T8Wj5jwy1-rxjEOQfRskgEo7m0K2BayFBEzyVzl8ipJGp83q5MxppZ0WxxTUeYMDZzf6lbTpdIUsCtZKX6Y_E47h8LEbqtuPjJBh0Adi88ylsrAJOQEsZSs_ipIdvj-qc-mJRx-WUv_EMYN-EgBNaP358SclcrYDoQ3YA>
   - *WAVES Summit:* https://wavesindia.org/
   <https://bharatxr-dot-yamm-track.appspot.com/2of5ReGGRIaA2zI4JTkd8nAu2BJulYoCcryXohTMcJ2MQQfRskgFgf8SWsQvuIidtHftHleZ42kl8ETMJhU2PNbGvfu7vfGFJyVofNaA38cyMRBNmquaysa8ljQM_Hud_aBCf_233GeEhxWq0-Q9bTXsFQB0Ks_5LuiyyKsVvfXNJeQ>

*Incentives for Your Institution:*
Your institution can shine brighter with our incentives:

   - *100+ registrations*: The point of contact will receive a digital
   certificate of appreciation featuring the Ministry of Information &
   Broadcasting logo.
   - *200+ registrations*: Your college's logo will be displayed on our
   official event website, enhancing your institution's visibility across the
   nation.

*Why Is This Challenge Essential?*
We urge your institution to rally your students to register before the
*deadline* on *October 15, 2024*. This remote challenge is open to all
Indian citizens and offers a platform for students to develop their skills,
innovate with cutting-edge technologies, and connect with industry
professionals.

*Support for Beginners:*
To empower every student, we are offering dedicated learning sessions for
beginners during the ideation and implementation phases. The first session
on* October 11, 2024*, will unveil the latest advancements in AR and VR. We
are also open to organizing tailored sessions for your college to ensure
students have the best possible start.

Attached is an official letter from* Mrs. Neerja Sekhar, IAS, Additional
Secretary to the Government of India, Ministry Of Information &
Broadcasting*, which provides further details about our collaboration and
the significance of this event.

By partnering with *Bharat XR* and other esteemed organizations, your
institution will play a pivotal role in shaping the future of XR in India.
Join us in inspiring the next generation of XR innovators! Your support can
be the catalyst that propels your students into an exciting future.
Together, we can foster a culture of creativity and excellence in AR/VR
technology.

Let‚Äôs make history together by shaping the future of XR technology!

Warm regards,
Chhavi Garg
<https://bharatxr-dot-yamm-track.appspot.com/2nDoN2GlGs6Kq3gresiDhlG_3s7hqoFS7IVyzwvk6ltoTQfRskgFaXVYZ_f2_sRIjl6YQp6o8HLCm6u51SAYWY3__dS01-XBd7WoFN-MFx0NNZD0_7bRzjlviWgGPOS0LB5pZ-InYZAx_PFQF2yF_SqgLWoTgiWB0LgrUeCDZ1aR5EZ_TdGVO>
Founder & CEO, Bharat XR
<https://bharatxr-dot-yamm-track.appspot.com/2-oPCcLoPBfqN7p3leYV-v5grQ9PiGQeBieN-Bfdy6wMVQfRskgF2G8KVzAcWHgrvcg7OHicUjw3s77qeps3LFwwRuGJKHQuMcFI1h36xbWDLShDJP2OkIbAFXa1a7_oJjvnbc7sdQ4_FGPlDtew-tjkhj8WCSBj__a3y0CrZp6O3bukt295l-kvw8roq>
7678158081

content:

  Dear Students
Good Morning
Kindly note that the link to the quiz -1 is as follows. You must have your
CHARUSAT Mail ID to appear in quiz-1.
 If you have any queries, consult me in the staff room 309 Ec-Ee building,
CSPIT.
If you cannot access the quiz through your phone, sign out all Gmail
accounts from your device and then sign in CHARUSAT mail ID. After this,
you can appear in the quiz.
*If you do not have your institute mail id or password of it, then consult
me in the staff room at 11:10 AM. I will make other arrangements for such
students.*

submit the form on or before 11:26 AM. *

content:
Be the member of IEEE community.

Join now.

---------- Forwarded message ---------
From: Harshul Yagnik <harshulyagnik.cse@charusat.ac.in>
Date: Mon, Oct 7, 2024, 5:55‚ÄØPM
Subject: Discount Promocodes available for IEEE membership
To: CSE CSPIT <cse@charusat.ac.in>, IT <it@charusat.ac.in>, CE CSPIT <
ce.cspit@charusat.ac.in>, EC CSPIT <ec.cspit@charusat.ac.in>, AIML <
aiml@charusat.ac.in>, EE CSPIT <ee.cspit@charusat.ac.in>, DEPSTAR <
depstar@charusat.ac.in>
Cc: Amit Thakkar <amitthakkar.it@charusat.ac.in>, Trushit Upadhyaya <
trushitupadhyaya.ec@charusat.ac.in>, HOD Depstar <hodds@charusat.ac.in>,
HOD Group <hod@charusat.ac.in>


Dear Faculty Members,
IEEE is celebrating IEEE Day 2024 in this week. They have offered special
membership offers. They are active between *29 September ‚Äì 12 October
2024. *

1. For new joining *IEEE professional members* or someone who is
renewing IEEE professional membership after two years, avail $30 discount
using code: IEEEDAY2430.
(Kindly note membership will be valid till December 2025.)

There are promocodes available for some IEEE societies also.* Kindly note
you must be a IEEE member first before taking any IEEE society membership.*

2. IEEE Broadcast Technology Society will be *free* using code:
IEEEDAY2024BTS

3. IEEE communications society: 50% discount for new members only:
IEEEDAYCOMSOC50

4. IEEE Computer Society: 50% discount for all IEEE members: CSIEEEDAY24

5.  IEEE Education Society: 50% discount for all IEEE members:EDIEEEDAYHG25

6. IEEE Electronics Packaging Society will be *free* using code:
IEEEDAY2024EPS

7. IEEE Geoscience and Remote Sensing Society: 50% discount for new members
only: IEEEDAY2024GRS

8. IEEE magnetics Society will be *free* using code:IEEEDAY2024MAG

9.  IEEE Power and Energy Society: 50% discount for all IEEE members:
IEEEDAY24PES

10. IEEE Reliability Society: 50% discount for all IEEE members:
IEEEDAY2024RLS

11. IEEE Signal Processing Society: 50% discount for new members only:
IEEEDAY2024SPS

12. IEEE Smart cities technical community will be *free* using code:
SMARTCITIES100

13. IEEE Vehicular Society: 50% discount for new members only:
IEEEDAY2024VTS

Benefits of Becoming IEEE member:
https://www.ieee.org/membership/benefits/index.html

Special Offers on IEEE Day Link:
https://ieeeday.org/special-activities-offers/

Join IEEE using link: https://www.ieee.org/membership/join/index.html

Faculty members interested to join can take benefit of these promocodes.
Kindly also encourage students to be IEEE member (There are some promocodes
of IEEE societies for student members also)

With regards
-- 

Harshul Yagnik

Assistant Professor,

Department of Computer Science Engineering,

Charotar University of Science & Technology <https://www.charusat.ac.in/>

+91-9737642757

<https://www.linkedin.com/in/harshul-yagnik-81a6a022/>

subject: AICTE Approved Internship to Get Certified by CISCO, META, IBM to Kick Start your Journey.
snippet: Dear CHARUSAT Student, Applause for being shortlisted for the internship program! As mentioned above, Teachnook in collaboration with MNC & IIT ROORKEE (Cognizance) is organizing a 2-month training
content:
Dear *CHARUSAT *Student, *Applause for being shortlisted for the internship
program!*

As mentioned above, *Teachnook in collaboration with MNC & IIT ROORKEE
(Cognizance)* is organizing a  2-month training + Internship program
designed by the Mentors of MNCs.

*Interested students can Apply If you're selected for the shortlist, our HR
team will contact you;*

*Apply Here  üëâ*   *https://forms.gle/WsnTxKdcRwpD8ZXw6*
<https://forms.gle/WsnTxKdcRwpD8ZXw6>

*Join Our Official WhatsApp Group For More Information;*

 https://chat.whatsapp.com/K43ThNxKpaXAfLfHio5hRq









*Top Preferred Courses:‚úÖ Artificial Intelligence.‚úÖ Data Science.‚úÖ Machine
Learning.‚úÖ Cloud Computing.‚úÖ Full Stack Web Development.Below is an
overview of the program's structure.*

*First month:* During the first month of the program, training will be
conducted in the mode of live lectures, and you will have live mentorship
from industry professionals. You will be provided admittance to your
personal *LMS portal* where you can interact with the trainers and fellow
students. Login credentials will be provided to registered students.

*Second month:* Internship with live mentorship for projects from
professionals. *The LIVE INDUSTRY PROJECT* will give students an experience
in solving real-world problems.

*10+ Minor Project: *The minor project is an individual project, Where
students will be doing projects on each topic they will be learning.

*Major Project (CAPSTONE):* The major project is a group project, and you
will work in a group of 3-4 interns, with specific responsibilities
assigned to each intern. The company will provide you with the required
data and materials for the project.





*After Completion of the program, the student shall receive a :‚úÖ Program
completion certificate issued by IIT-ROORKEE Cognizance.‚úÖ The WIPRO Dice ID
verified the co-branded internship certificate.‚úÖ Letter of Recommendation
from the Company.‚úÖ Admittance to a growth community.*

*Advaya*
*Key Account Manager*
*9364102817*
*advaya.pathak@teachnook.com <advaya.pathak@teachnook.com>*

subject: Fwd: Online Meeting regarding ABC-ID for First Year(2024 admitted) students
snippet: Dear Students, You might know that the Government of India has initiated National Education Policy 2020 (NEP-2020). One of the important points under the policy, applicable to higher education, is to
content:
Dear  Students,

You might know that the Government of India has initiated *National
Education Policy 2020 (NEP-2020)*. One of the important points under the
policy, applicable to higher education, is to provide a  *CREDIT transfer
facility* through *ABC-ID*(Academic Bank of Credits-ID).

In line with the above-mentioned subject, you all are requested to *create
the ABC-ID* (IF you havn't created yet) from the below-given website. The
details of the need for ABC-ID and its benefits are mentioned in the
presentation as available in the link below. please go through the
presentation for a detailed understanding of the same.

*Kindly find the attachment regarding different ways to create ABC-ID.*

*Link of ABC-ID Presentation manual*:
https://docs.google.com/presentation/d/1vokIiR3YRPeU_4qNAxa3cosi9lHFewm5HBUxfJA-IQw/preview?slide=
id.p
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
*Regarding ABC ID*
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Steps to create ABC id is:

step-1: create abc id from: https://www.abc.gov.in/
step-2: Select student as shown below:

[image: image.png]

*The online meeting to solve doubts/queries (If any) regarding the ABC-ID
is scheduled as per below:*

Date:  07/10/2024, Monday
Time: 11.10 am
Meeting Link: Meeting link will be shared soon [Microsoft Team]




-- 
*Regards,*

*Nirav Bhatt*

--

subject: Fwd: Revised Date : Register for the Advanced Drone Technology (Air Taxi ) Workshops - ( Space Education & Employment) for all the Students
snippet: ---------- Forwarded message --------- From: Principal DEPSTAR <principal.depstar@charusat.ac.in> Date: Fri, Oct 4, 2024 at 10:16 AM Subject: Fwd: Revised Date : Register for the Advanced Drone
content:
---------- Forwarded message ---------
From: Principal DEPSTAR <principal.depstar@charusat.ac.in>
Date: Fri, Oct 4, 2024 at 10:16‚ÄØAM
Subject: Fwd: Revised Date : Register for the Advanced Drone Technology
(Air Taxi ) Workshops - ( Space Education & Employment) for all the Students
To: Depstar <depstar@charusat.ac.in>




---------- Forwarded message ---------
From: CHARUSAT <info@charusat.ac.in>
Date: Fri, Oct 4, 2024 at 9:47‚ÄØAM
Subject: Fwd: Revised Date : Register for the Advanced Drone Technology
(Air Taxi ) Workshops - ( Space Education & Employment) for all the Students
To: Principal C.S.Patel Institute of Technology <
principal.cspit@charusat.ac.in>, Principal DEPSTAR <
principal.depstar@charusat.ac.in>




---------- Forwarded message ---------
From: <info@isl.ac.in>
Date: Thu, Oct 3, 2024 at 6:42‚ÄØPM
Subject: Revised Date : Register for the Advanced Drone Technology (Air
Taxi ) Workshops - ( Space Education & Employment) for all the Students
To:


Respected Authority,

 ‚ÄúThe revised date for registering for the Advanced Drone Technology (Air
Taxi) Workshops, part of the broader initiative on Space Education and
Employment for all students, has been updated‚Äù-Reg


This is in continuation of our previous communication in September 2024
regarding the initiatives by India Space Lab (‡§≠‡§æ‡§∞‡§§ ‡§Ö‡§Ç‡§§‡§∞‡§ø‡§ï‡•ç‡§∑ ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§Ø‡•ã‡§ó‡§∂‡§æ‡§≤‡§æ) to
advance space science and technology. We are delighted to invite you to
Advanced Drone Workshop, The primary goal of this workshop is to enhance
space education and explore opportunities for technological advancement.

The Government of India, under the visionary leadership of Honorable PM
Shri Narendra Modi, has initiated groundbreaking reforms in the space
sector. These initiatives are designed to enhance and promote space
education, research, and development across the nation. A key highlight of
these efforts is the celebration of India Space Week, scheduled from August
12 to August 18, along with National Space Day on August 23. This event is
organized by the Bharat Antriksh Saptah/India Space Lab(‡§≠‡§æ‡§∞‡§§ ‡§Ö‡§Ç‡§§‡§∞‡§ø‡§ï‡•ç‡§∑
‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§Ø‡•ã‡§ó‡§∂‡§æ‡§≤‡§æ) include with the Department of Science and Technology.
Following the successful India Space Week event held from August 12 to 18,
and National Space Day, India Space Lab is conducting an Advanced Drone
(Air Taxi) workshop.

Public Notice/ Important Update:

Who can participate?
Anyone with a background in science and technology, including students and
faculty, is welcome to join the Advanced Drone Technology workshop.

Attached to this email is the link to register the workshop:
https://docs.google.com/forms/d/1ZrHoMC16lgB593-_uylE-7Aq_gqDVy2gdIhns_68Fy0

Website : https://isl.ac.in/workshops.html

Mode: Online

Duration : 120 min ( 2 Hrs)

Date: October (5th, 12th, 13th & 19th) at 2 pm.

Medium: English, Hindi( Opt accordingly)

Those with exams or other commitments on the 5th can attend the workshop on
Sunday, October 13th. The workshop date will be set as per the students'
schedule, either on a Saturday or Sunday, to avoid disrupting the students'
schedules. Based on student requests, Students now have the flexibility to
attend the workshop on either October 5th or October 12th, 13th and 19th,
If some students cannot attend on these dates, we will organize an
additional workshop to accommodate them. We aim to ensure minimal
disruption to the students' schedules, so the adjustments will be made
based on the students' preferences ( Saturday or Sunday).

Additionally, we have lined up a series of workshops in upcoming months:
1. Advanced Drone Technology (Air Taxi)
2. CanSat & CubeSat ( Satellite Technology)
3. Astronomy & Astrophysics (Astrophotography)
4. Rocketry ( Advanced Rocket )

We look forward to your participation and engagement in our Advanced Drone
Workshop (Air Taxi).

Affiliation Regulatory Authority
India Space Lab( ‡§≠‡§æ‡§∞‡§§ ‡§Ö‡§Ç‡§§‡§∞‡§ø‡§ï‡•ç‡§∑ ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§Ø‡•ã‡§ó‡§∂‡§æ‡§≤‡§æ)
Email: info@isl.ac.in / indiaspacelab@gmail.com
Contact No:  7042880241 / 7042788858
Website: www.isl.ac.in

subject: Fwd: Workshop on GitHub for Beginners ‚Äì 5th September 2024
snippet: Dear all, Dear Students, We are pleased to inform you about a workshop on GitHub for Beginners, scheduled on 5th October 2024. All First-Year students are requested to attend the workshop without fail.
content:
*Dear all,*

Dear Students,
>
> We are pleased to inform you about a *workshop on GitHub for Beginners,*
> scheduled on *5th October 2024*. All First-Year students are requested to
> attend the workshop without fail. This workshop will cover the basics of
> GitHub, an essential tool for version control and collaboration in software
> development.
>
>
> *Workshop Details:*
>
>    - Date: 5th September 2024
>    - Time: 9:00 AM onwards
>    - Venue: 329 Seminar Hall
>    - Target Audience: 1st Year (CE/CSE/IT)
>
> Please ensure your attendance, as this workshop is an important part of
> your learning journey.
>
> For any queries, feel free to reach out.
>
> *Thanks & Regards,*
> *Bansari Patel*
> *Department of Computer Science & Engineering,*
> *Devang Patel Institute of Advance Technology and Research (DEPSTAR),*
> *Charotar University of Science and Technology (CHARUSAT)*
>
--

Head Maths <head.maths@charusat.ac.in>


Dear Students
Good Morning
Kindly note that the online quiz of MSUD101 will be conducted on 07/10/2024
between 11:15 and 11:25 on Google Forms.
The link will be shared on your institute mail ID.
*Make sure you have your institute mail id (________@charusat.edu.in
<https://mail.google.com/mail/?view=cm&fs=1&to=________%40charusat.edu.in&authuser=0>)
otherwise, you will not be able to give the exam.*
*Syllabus of the exam : *
Unit 1
Lagrange‚Äôs Mean Value Theorem, Local Maxima and Minima of the function of
one variable
Successive differentiation: nth derivative of elementary functions:
rational, logarithmic, trigonometric, exponential and hyperbolic
Leibnitz rule for the nth-order derivatives of the product of two functions
Power series expansion of a function: Maclaurin‚Äôs and Taylor‚Äôs series
expansion.
L‚ÄôHospital‚Äôs rule and related applications, Indeterminate forms

Unit 3
Definition of Matrix, types of matrices and their properties
Determinant and their properties
Rank and nullity of a matrix
Determination of rank
Solution of a system of linear equations by Gauss elimination and Gauss
Jordan Methods


Unit 4
Partial derivative and geometrical interpretation

*BEST OF LUCK*

*Thanks and regards,*
*Rajesh V. Savalia *
*PhD, MPhil*
*Assistant Professor*
*Department of Mathematical Sciences*
*P. D. Patel Institute of Applied **Sciences*
*Charotar University of Science and Technology*
*Accredited Grade 'A+' by NAAC *
*Website: https://www.charusat.ac.in/ <https://www.charusat.ac.in/>*
*M. No. 94292 22899*





-- 
*Bhavika N. Patel*
*Assistant Professor,*
*Department of Computer Engineering*
*Devang Patel Institute of Advance Technology & Research (DEPSTAR),*
*Charotar University of Science & Technology.*

--

subject: Fwd: EOC Activity by CSPIT[CE] CREATIVE PROJECT IDEAS FOR IMPROVING THE LIVES OF SPECIALLY ABLED PEOPLE
snippet: Dear All, U & P U. Patel Department of Computer Engineering, CSPIT organizes following Event in step towards helping people having disabilities or Physically Challenged. Title of the Event: "
content:
Dear All,



U & P U. Patel Department of Computer Engineering, CSPIT organizes
following Event in step towards helping people having disabilities or
Physically Challenged.



*Title of the Event:* " CREATIVE PROJECT IDEAS FOR IMPROVING THE LIVES OF
SPECIALLY ABLED PEOPLE "



Guidelines:



1.    Students may submit their creative working project ideas on
a drawing sheet of paper/PPT/PDF.


Submission Link: https://forms.gle/GUHRx6sLvhYPatmx7


These can be further modified on the day of presentation [*7/12/2024*].

2.    Last *Extended Date* of Entry Submission: 30th November, 2024 [Ideas
through online shared google form]. Each student has to make a separate
entry using the shared google form link.

3.    Students may use a pen, pencil, sketch pens or any other tools
[Computer Software/Hardware] to depict their ideas on the day of
presentation [Date: 7/12/2024, Venue: MAC LAB (601), A7 Building].
Participants have to remain present in MAC LAB (601) [A7 Building]
from 09:15 am to 12:00 pm on 07/12/2024, Saturday to present their
project ideas.
Students may use presentation and poster to demonstrate their project ideas.

4.    Students may show Project Implementation

5.    Students may submit their ideas in a group of maximum 3 students.

6.    Best of the THREE Innovative Ideas will be awarded prize money &
certificate *(First prize 1500 Rs/-, Second Prize 1000 Rs/-, Third Prize
500 Rs/-)*. Others will receive a certificate of participation.



*EOC Department Coordinators are requested to encourage students for
participation and please forward this mail to students of your department.*


*For any further query you may please contact student coordinators (**23CE022
- Devam Bhaveshbhai Ghodasara *and *23CE115 - Priya Babubhai Pedhadiya* *).*

Dhaval Bhoi
Assistant Professor,
U & P U. Patel Department of Computer Engineering,
Chandubhai S Patel Institute of Technology,
CHARUSAT, Changa.
Ta-Petlad Dist.Anand
PIN-388421 GUJARAT, INDIA

subject: Fwd: Student Achievement Records
snippet: Dear Students, Greetings!!! Devang Patel Institute of Advance Technology and Research (DEPSTAR) always believes that Achievements (Academics)/Co-curricular Activities & Extra Co-curricular
content:
Dear Students,

Greetings!!!

Devang Patel Institute of Advance Technology and Research (DEPSTAR) always
believes that *Achievements (Academics)/Co-curricular Activities & Extra
Co-curricular Activities/Competitive Exams* are equally important for the
holistic development of students.

We always encourage students to take participation in various activities
which are listed below:

1. *Technical *(hackathon/coding competition/web development
competition/robot fight)
*2*. *Non-Technical* (poster presentation/paper presentation/debate)
*3*. *Cultural* (dance/singing/rangoli/mehndi/music
competition/crafting/painting)
4. *Sports* (indoor games/outdoor games)
*5*. *Competitive Exams*

You all are requested to enter the details of your achievement in the
below-mentioned link.


*Note :*
1. Duration you need to consider for entering the details of
your achievement:  *1/5/2024 to 01/10/2024*
2. This form accepts only *PDF* File.

Link: *https://forms.gle/1Ce84RQrNx7ru6uC6*
<https://forms.gle/1Ce84RQrNx7ru6uC6>
-- 
Thanks & Regards,
Aishwariya Budhrani
Assistant Professor,
Devang Patel Institute of Advance Technology and Research (DEPSTAR),
Charotar University of Science and Technology (CHARUSAT)

--

subject: AICTE Approved Internship to Get Certified by CISCO, META, IBM to Kick Start your Journey.
snippet: Dear Students of CHARUSAT. Teachnook is conducting an AICTE APPROVED Internship for STUDENTS, Kindly go through this and join the group as well as fill out the form also ASAP. Register before Slots get
content:
*Dear Students of CHARUSAT.*

Teachnook is conducting an *AICTE APPROVED* Internship for STUDENTS, Kindly
go through this and join the group as well as fill out the form also ASAP.
Register before Slots get filled.



*Greetings!*

*We are pleased to share that our company is collaborating with top Notch
MNCs to offer a unique 2-month Training + Internship  Program. This
advanced program will provide you with the practical skills that you need
to enhance your career.*

 We are enrolling only *LIMITED STUDENTS* in the program.



*It is Mandatory for Interested students to fill out the form, if you get
shortlisted you will get a call from our HR Team:GOOGLE
FORM: https://forms.gle/WsnTxKdcRwpD8ZXw6
<https://forms.gle/WsnTxKdcRwpD8ZXw6>*

*To know more information join in WhatsApp group:*

*https://chat.whatsapp.com/K43ThNxKpaXAfLfHio5hRq
<https://chat.whatsapp.com/K43ThNxKpaXAfLfHio5hRq>*


*FIND THE BELOW ATTACHMENTS FOR REFERENCE:*

*First month:* Training has been designed in the form of Live lectures
along with living mentorship from industry professionals. (Login
credentials will be provided to students after registration)
No Prerequisites Required.

*Second month: *Internship with live mentorship for projects from
professionals. The LIVE INDUSTRY PROJECT will give students experience in
solving real-world problems.

*Project 1:- *10 individual projects are assigned to each intern, which
they must complete with their mentor.

*Project 2:-  *Capstone Project: It's a group project assigned to a
group of 10-12 interns. For each intern, a particular work will be assigned
to them, and they have to work on it.
(Essential data and materials required for the project will be provided by
the company side itself)

*Here are two types of Sessions we are providing:*

*1. Blended Program/Recorded Sessions: *You will receive recorded sessions,
whatever doubts you have you can clear them in live doubt-clearing sessions
which will be organized every weekend.

*2. Mentor-led/Live Sessions: *You will be having live Zoom classes after 7
PM for 2 to 3 days a week. You will get your recorded sessions as well
*LMS(Learning Management System)* portal which you will have access to for
6 months.

After Completion of the program, the student shall receive :


[image: ‚úÖ] Program completion certificate issued by MNCs and Verified By
Wipro DICE ID.

[image: ‚úÖ] Co-Branded Internship certificate from Top MNCs.

[image: ‚úÖ] Get certified by CISCO, META, IBM, and Microsoft Certified
Fundamentals.

[image: ‚úÖ] 100% Placement Assistance.

[image: ‚úÖ] Access to a growing community.


*Shashi*
*Key Account Manager*
*9364102817*
*shashidhara.d@teachnook.com <shashidhara.d@teachnook.com>*

subject: Training and Internship Opportunities to Kick Start Your Journey with Top-Notch MNC's
snippet: Dear CHARUSAT Student, Applause for being shortlisted for the internship program! As mentioned above, Teachnook in collaboration with MNC & IIT ROORKEE (Cognizance) is organizing a 2-month training
content:
Dear *CHARUSAT* Student, *Applause for being shortlisted for the internship
program!*

As mentioned above, *Teachnook in collaboration with MNC & IIT ROORKEE
(Cognizance)* is organizing a  2-month training + Internship program
designed by the Mentors of MNCs.

*Interested students can Apply If you're selected for the shortlist, our HR
team will contact you;*

*Apply Here  üëâ*   *https://forms.gle/WsnTxKdcRwpD8ZXw6*
<https://forms.gle/WsnTxKdcRwpD8ZXw6>

*Join Our Official WhatsApp Group For More Information;*

 https://chat.whatsapp.com/K43ThNxKpaXAfLfHio5hRq








*Top Preferred Courses:‚úÖ Artificial Intelligence.‚úÖ Data Science.‚úÖ Machine
Learning.‚úÖ Cloud Computing.‚úÖ Full Stack Web Development.Below is an
overview of the program's structure.*

*First month:* During the first month of the program, training will be
conducted in the mode of live lectures, and you will have live mentorship
from industry professionals. You will be provided admittance to your
personal *LMS portal* where you can interact with the trainers and fellow
students. Login credentials will be provided to registered students.

*Second month:* Internship with live mentorship for projects from
professionals. *The LIVE INDUSTRY PROJECT* will give students an experience
in solving real-world problems.

*10+ Minor Project: *The minor project is an individual project, Where
students will be doing projects on each topic they will be learning.

*Major Project (CAPSTONE):* The major project is a group project, and you
will work in a group of 3-4 interns, with specific responsibilities
assigned to each intern. The company will provide you with the required
data and materials for the project.

*Third month:* Based on your enactment during the first two months of the
program, we will conduct a technical interview in the same company during
the third month. You will be offered a stipend-based Internship if you
perform well in the interview.





*After Completion of the program, the student shall receive a :‚úÖ Program
completion certificate issued by IIT-ROORKEE Cognizance.‚úÖ The WIPRO Dice ID
verified the co-branded internship certificate.‚úÖ Letter of Recommendation
from the Company.‚úÖ Admittance to a growth community.*

*Anusha*
*Key Account Manager*
*9364102817*
*anusha.hr@teachnook.com <anusha.hr@teachnook.com>*

subject: Blood Donation Camp on 30/09/2024
snippet: Dear CHARUSAT Family, We hope this message finds you well. We are excited to announce a special event that can make a significant impact on the lives of others in our community. CHRF and NSS units of
content:
*Dear CHARUSAT Family,*

We hope this message finds you well. We are excited to announce a special
event that can make a significant impact on the lives of others in our
community. CHRF and NSS units of CHARUSAT, BDIPS, ARIP and MTIN
have organized a Blood donation camp in collaboration with the Lions Club
of Nadiad Mains, and Indian Red Cross Society. We invite each one of you to
participate and contribute to this noble cause.

Blood Donation Camp details are as under:



*Date: 30/09/2024*

*Time: 09:30 am to 3:30 pm*

*Location: Physiotherapy Department, Ground floor, CHRF, CHARUSAT *



Let's come together as a university community and make
this Blood Donation Camp a resounding success. Your contribution can truly
make a life-saving difference.

If you have any questions or need further information, please feel free to
contact the NSS Department.

Thank you for your willingness to participate, we are looking forward to
seeing you at the Blood Donation Camp!

Link for registration into Blood Donation Camp: *(Fill this out on or
before 27/09/2024)*


https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSd_asjz8lC4zZHjVyxqu8PSZdZhPSnsSu0RJpj7wDmdhFlEzg/viewform?usp=sf_link



*Kishan Patel*

*NSS Program Coordinator *

*Charusat NSS Cell*

subject: Training and Internship Opportunities to Kick Start Your Journey with Top Notch MNCs
snippet: Dear CHARUSAT Student, Applause for being shortlisted for the internship program! As mentioned above, Teachnook in collaboration with MNC & IIT ROORKEE (Cognizance) is organizing a 2-month training
content:
Dear *CHARUSAT* Student, *Applause for being shortlisted for the internship
program!*

As mentioned above, *Teachnook in collaboration with MNC & IIT ROORKEE
(Cognizance)* is organizing a  2-month training + Internship program
designed by the Mentors of MNCs.

*Interested students can Apply If you're selected for the shortlist, our HR
team will contact you;*

*Apply Here  üëâ*   *https://forms.gle/WsnTxKdcRwpD8ZXw6*
<https://forms.gle/WsnTxKdcRwpD8ZXw6>

*Join Our Official WhatsApp Group For More Information;*

 https://chat.whatsapp.com/K43ThNxKpaXAfLfHio5hRq








*Top Preferred Courses:‚úÖ Artificial Intelligence.‚úÖ Data Science.‚úÖ Machine
Learning.‚úÖ Cloud Computing.‚úÖ Full Stack Web Development.Below is an
overview of the program's structure.*

*First month:* During the first month of the program, training will be
conducted in the mode of live lectures, and you will have live mentorship
from industry professionals. You will be provided admittance to your
personal *LMS portal* where you can interact with the trainers and fellow
students. Login credentials will be provided to registered students.

*Second month:* Internship with live mentorship for projects from
professionals. *The LIVE INDUSTRY PROJECT* will give students an experience
in solving real-world problems.

*10+ Minor Project: *The minor project is an individual project, Where
students will be doing projects on each topic they will be learning.

*Major Project (CAPSTONE):* The major project is a group project, and you
will work in a group of 3-4 interns, with specific responsibilities
assigned to each intern. The company will provide you with the required
data and materials for the project.

*Third month:* Based on your enactment during the first two months of the
program, we will conduct a technical interview in the same company during
the third month. You will be offered a stipend-based Internship if you
perform well in the interview.





*After Completion of the program, the student shall receive a :‚úÖ Program
completion certificate issued by IIT-ROORKEE Cognizance.‚úÖ The WIPRO Dice ID
verified the co-branded internship certificate.‚úÖ Letter of Recommendation
from the Company.‚úÖ Admittance to a growth community.*

*Shashi*
*Key Account Manager*
*9364102817*
*shashidhara.d@teachnook.com <shashidhara.d@teachnook.com>*

this Blood Donation Camp a resounding success. Your contribution can truly

contact the NSS Department.

Thank you for your willingness to participate, we are looking forward to
seeing you at the Blood Donation Camp!

*Kishan Patel*

*Charusat NSS Cell*

snippet: Dear Students of CHARUSAT. Teachnook is conducting an AICTE APPROVED Internship for STUDENTS, Kindly go through this and join the group as well as fill out the form also ASAP. Register before Slots get
content:
*Dear Students of CHARUSAT.*

Teachnook is conducting an *AICTE APPROVED* Internship for STUDENTS, Kindly
go through this and join the group as well as fill out the form also ASAP.
Register before Slots get filled.



*Greetings!*

*We are pleased to share that our company is collaborating with top Notch
MNCs to offer a unique 2-month Training + Internship  Program. This
advanced program will provide you with the practical skills that you need
to enhance your career.*

 We are enrolling only *LIMITED STUDENTS* in the program.



*It is Mandatory for Interested students to fill out the form, if you get
shortlisted you will get a call from our HR Team:GOOGLE
FORM: https://forms.gle/WsnTxKdcRwpD8ZXw6
<https://forms.gle/WsnTxKdcRwpD8ZXw6>*


*To know more information join in WhatsApp group:*

*https://chat.whatsapp.com/K43ThNxKpaXAfLfHio5hRq
<https://chat.whatsapp.com/K43ThNxKpaXAfLfHio5hRq>*


*FIND THE BELOW ATTACHMENTS FOR REFERENCE:*

*First month:* Training has been designed in the form of Live lectures
along with living mentorship from industry professionals. (Login
credentials will be provided to students after registration)
No Prerequisites Required.

*Second month: *Internship with live mentorship for projects from
professionals. The LIVE INDUSTRY PROJECT will give students experience in
solving real-world problems.

*Project 1:- *10 individual projects are assigned to each intern, which
they must complete with their mentor.

*Project 2:-  *Capstone Project: It's a group project assigned to a
group of 10-12 interns. For each intern, a particular work will be assigned
to them, and they have to work on it.
(Essential data and materials required for the project will be provided by
the company side itself)

*Here are two types of Sessions we are providing:*

*1. Blended Program/Recorded Sessions: *You will receive recorded sessions,
whatever doubts you have you can clear them in live doubt-clearing sessions
which will be organized every weekend.

*2. Mentor-led/Live Sessions: *You will be having live Zoom classes after 7
PM for 2 to 3 days a week. You will get your recorded sessions as well
*LMS(Learning Management System)* portal which you will have access to for
6 months.

After Completion of the program, the student shall receive :


[image: ‚úÖ] Program completion certificate issued by MNCs and Verified By
Wipro DICE ID.

[image: ‚úÖ] Co-Branded Internship certificate from Top MNCs.

[image: ‚úÖ] Get certified by CISCO, META, IBM, and Microsoft Certified
Fundamentals.

[image: ‚úÖ] 100% Placement Assistance.

[image: ‚úÖ] Access to a growing community.

*Advaya*
*Key Account Manager*
*9364102817*
*advaya.pathak@teachnook.com <advaya.pathak@teachnook.com>*

subject: Apply for Start-up Gujarat Seed Fund (30 Lakhs-40 Lakhs) via CIVF
snippet: Dear Start-up, As you know CIVF (CHARUSAT Innovative Ventures Foundation)- a section-8 company of Charusat University has been officially recognized as a Nodal Institute by the Industries
content:
Dear Start-up,
As you know CIVF (CHARUSAT Innovative Ventures Foundation)- a section-8
company of Charusat University has been officially recognized as a *Nodal
Institute* by the *Industries Commissionerate, Govt. of Gujarat*. We invite
you to apply for a seed grant to fuel your growth and innovation. Don't
miss this opportunity to accelerate your startup journey! (Find the scheme
document as *Ann-1*)

As a Nodal Institute, CIVF can now offer the following support:

   - Assistance up to *INR 30 lakh* as a *seed support* to the startups.
   - Sustenance allowance of *INR 20,000 per month *to the startups and *INR
   25,000 per month* to *women-led startups* for a period of one year.
   - Additional assistance up to *INR 10 lakh *for the startups generating
   significant impact on the society. Thus seed support extends to up to INR
   40 lakhs.
   - Assistance up to *INR 1 lakh* per startup for obtaining* training in
   soft skills *on a reimbursement basis.
   - Assistance up to *INR 3 lakh* to enroll and participate in
   national/international recognized *acceleration programs.*
   - Additional 1% Interest Subsidy, maximum up to* 9% on term loans* to
   applicants under the scheme's provisions for assistance to MSMEs.

The application process is as Under:

1. Read the eligibility criteria of the scheme. (Product/service should be
innovative, Company should be registered and the Start-up should be based
in Gujarat) *(*Refer to detailed eligibility criteria in* Ann-2)*

2. Fill out the form based on the benefit you want to avail. (Find all
applicable forms in the attachment as *Ann-3, Ann-4, Ann-5 & Ann-6. *Take
the pdf content of the application form in Word, enter the details in soft
copy, take print and sign and stamp on hard copy and send the original file
at CIVF- 209, IIIM)

2. Pitch deck presentation in front of CIVF Internal Committee.

3. CIVF will recommend the selected start-ups to Industries Commissionerate
for seed grant or other benefits.

4. If approved at the SLEC committee of  *Industries Commissionerate*, the
grant will be given to NI (i.e. CIVF) and be disbursed to start-up in
tranches based on your milestones.

All the Very Best and Feel free to seek further information.

*Deadline: 01/10/2024 till 12:30 PM*

Note: "Please share the above information with eligible start-up founders
to ensure that the deserving candidates can benefit from the government
scheme."
*Regards,*

*Dr. Swati Joshi, *
*Senior Executive Officer (SEO), *
*CHARUSAT Innovative Ventures Foundation (CIVF), **209, IIIM,*
*Charotar University of Science and Technology (CHARUSAT) *
*CHANGA - 388 421 *
*GUJARAT - INDIA *

*Contact no.: +91- 7383491911*
*E-mail: seo@civf.co.in <http://seo@civf.co.in/swatijoshi@civf.co.in>*

--

subject: Reg. Anti-ragging Registration (2024-25)
snippet: Dear students, Greetings...! Kindly find the below mentioned affidavit of the anti-ragging registration for AY 2024-25. You are informed to complete it on or before 27/09/2024 (Friday). Kindly find the
content:
Dear students,

Greetings...!

Kindly find the below  mentioned affidavit of the anti-ragging registration
for AY 2024-25. You are informed to complete it on or before *27/09/2024
(Friday).*

Kindly find the revised process for filing the anti-ragging affidavit.

Step-1: Go to www.antiragging.in or
http://www.antiragging.in/affidavit_university_form.php read and confirm
you and your parents have read and understood the AICTE regulations on
curbing the menace of ragging. Confirm and agree that you will not engage
in ragging in any form.

Step-2: Fill in the information as desired and submit the form. Read and
confirm that you and your parents have read and understood the AICTE
regulations

Step-3: On successful completion, you will receive an email regarding the
reference number and weblink where you will be able to check your
registration status

Step-4: Go to http://www.antiragging.in/undertaking_request.php and *generate
an undertaking document. Take a print of it. Put your signature and your
parent's signature and submit the hard copy of it to your respective
counselor Faculties. The counselor will submit it to me on  04/10/2024 once
all students have completed it for their batch*.
[Reference ID can be found in your mail received from the anti
-ragging committee.]

Step-5: Go to this google form link https://forms.gle/EdHWy3qPo8QAvZzs5
and Submit Anti-Ragging Form(Signed copy of Student & Parents)

*Refer to this information for filling up the online affidavit:*
Principal Name: Dr. Bankim Patel
College phone no: 02697-247500
Nearest Police station: Mehlav

-- 
*Thanks & Regards,*
*Kajal Parmar*
*Assistant Professor,*
*Department of Computer Engineering,*
*Devang Patel Institute of Advance Technology & Research (DEPSTAR),*
*Charotar University of Science & Technology (CHARUSAT),*
*At. & Post Changa-388421, Ta: Petlad, Dist: Anand, (Gujarat) India. *

--

subject: Final Batch Allocation for AICTE-Approved Advanced training and Internship Program
snippet: Dear Student of Charotar University of Science and Technology, We are pleased to inform you that you have been shortlisted for the AICTE-approved Internship Program offered in collaboration with
content:
Dear Student of* Charotar University of Science and Technology*,

We are pleased to inform you that you have been *shortlisted* for the
AICTE-approved Internship Program offered in collaboration with
Cognizance, *IIT
Roorkee*. This opportunity is for the *October-November Batch*, and we
encourage you to secure your spot as soon as possible, as this is the* Final
batch allocated for your university*.

*Program Overview*
The program is a comprehensive *2-month Training + Internship* designed to
provide hands-on experience and professional mentorship. It is open to all
departments, though availability is limited.

*Application Deadline: 21/09/2024, till 11.59 PM (Final 10 Slots Remaining)*
*Click here to apply* <https://forms.gle/g9FSBC8THfCWzQW37>

*Program Structure*

   -

   *First Month:*
   Training includes live lectures and mentorship from industry
   professionals. Upon registration, you will receive login credentials to
   access the learning platform.
   - *Project 1:* Complete 10 individual projects under the supervision of
      your mentor.
   -

   *Second Month:*
   A fully mentored internship focusing on real-world projects with
   guidance from professionals:
   - *Project 2:* Engage in a Capstone Group Project with specific roles
      assigned to each intern.

*Program Benefits*

   - Certificate of Completion verified by DICE ID powered by WIPRO and *IIT
   Roorkee Cognizance*.
   - Internship Certificate from top MNCs with *Wipro Dice ID verification*.
   - 6-month access to the *Learning Management System (LMS)*.
   - Membership to the *Growth Community* with placement assistance.
   - 24/7 personalized mentorship.
   - Complimentary sessions on *Generative AI & Prompt Engineering*.
   - Guidance on *Low Code & No Code applications*.
   - Live doubt-clearing sessions with industry experts.
   - Guest lectures featuring professionals from *Microsoft & Meta*.

To secure your participation in this prestigious program, kindly complete
the *application form* at your earliest convenience.

*Apply Now* <https://forms.gle/g9FSBC8THfCWzQW37> ‚Äì *Last 10 slots
available!*

Please note: *If you have already enrolled, you may disregard this email.*

We look forward to your participation in this exciting opportunity.

Warm regards,
*Teachnook*
In Collaboration with *IIT Roorkee Cognizance*

subject: Fwd: Promoting a Continuous Learning Environment: Clubs Management | Technical Club
snippet: ---------- Forwarded message --------- From: Dipika Damodar <dipikadamodar.dit@charusat.ac.in> Date: Fri, Sep 20, 2024, 2:09 PM Subject: Promoting a Continuous Learning Environment: Clubs
content:
---------- Forwarded message ---------
From: Dipika Damodar <dipikadamodar.dit@charusat.ac.in>
Date: Fri, Sep 20, 2024, 2:09‚ÄØPM
Subject: Promoting a Continuous Learning Environment: Clubs Management |
Technical Club
To: DEPSTAR <depstar@charusat.ac.in>
Cc: Dr Dweepna Garg <dweepnagarg.ce@charusat.ac.in>, HOD Depstar <
hodds@charusat.ac.in>, Principal DEPSTAR <principal.depstar@charusat.ac.in>


Dear all,



In our pursuit of fostering a vibrant learning culture, Clubs Management |
Technical Club is excited to introduce the "*Learn After College Hours*"
initiative. We believe that education extends beyond the classroom and that
collaborative learning can thrive even after formal college hours.

In this context, we are organizing a webinar on *"Blockchain Foundations:
The Core of Trustless Technology"*. This session will be delivered by *Ms.
Naina Parmar*



*Webinar Details:*

   - *Date:* 25th September,2024
   - *Time:* 8:00 PM to 9:00 PM
   - *Mode:* Online (MS Teams - The joining link will be sent to registered
   participants only.)

*Why Attend?*

Blockchain technology is reshaping industries by enabling secure,
decentralized, and transparent systems. Through this session, you will:

   - Understand the core principles of blockchain and its architecture.
   - Explore the concept of a *trustless system* and how blockchain ensures
   security without intermediaries.
   - Learn about the real-world applications of blockchain in various
   sectors like finance, healthcare, and supply chain.
   - Get insights into future career opportunities in the blockchain domain.

 *Registration Process:*

To attend this insightful session, please click the link below to register:

¬∑       Registration link: https://forms.gle/LfTufATSkW11wUGK6

¬∑       Registration Deadline: 23rd , September 2024

It‚Äôs a fantastic opportunity to expand your technical knowledge and explore
the future of digital trust.

For any queries, please feel free to contact Ms. Dipika Damodar (Email id:
dipikadamodar.dit@charusat.ac.in | Contact: 7405862155).

We look forward to your active participation!


--
Best Regards,
Clubs Management | Technical Club

subject: AICTE Approved Internship to Get Certified by CISCO, META, IBM to Kick Start your Journey.
snippet: Dear CHARUSAT Student, Applause for being shortlisted for the internship program! As mentioned above, Teachnook in collaboration with MNC & IIT ROORKEE (Cognizance) is organizing a 2-month training
content:
Dear *CHARUSAT* Student, *Applause for being shortlisted for the internship
program!*

As mentioned above, *Teachnook in collaboration with MNC & IIT ROORKEE
(Cognizance)* is organizing a  2-month training + Internship program
designed by the Mentors of MNCs.

*Interested students can Apply If you're selected for the shortlist, our HR
team will contact you;*

*Apply Here  üëâ*   *https://forms.gle/WsnTxKdcRwpD8ZXw6*
<https://forms.gle/WsnTxKdcRwpD8ZXw6>

*Join Our Official WhatsApp Group For More Information;*

 https://chat.whatsapp.com/K43ThNxKpaXAfLfHio5hRq









*Top Preferred Courses:‚úÖ Artificial Intelligence.‚úÖ Data Science.‚úÖ Machine
Learning.‚úÖ Cloud Computing.‚úÖ Full Stack Web Development.Below is an
overview of the program's structure.*

*First month:* During the first month of the program, training will be
conducted in the mode of live lectures, and you will have live mentorship
from industry professionals. You will be provided admittance to your
personal *LMS portal* where you can interact with the trainers and fellow
students. Login credentials will be provided to registered students.

*Second month:* Internship with live mentorship for projects from
professionals. *The LIVE INDUSTRY PROJECT* will give students an experience
in solving real-world problems.

*10+ Minor Project: *The minor project is an individual project, Where
students will be doing projects on each topic they will be learning.

*Major Project (CAPSTONE):* The major project is a group project, and you
will work in a group of 3-4 interns, with specific responsibilities
assigned to each intern. The company will provide you with the required
data and materials for the project.

*Third month:* Based on your enactment during the first two months of the
program, we will conduct a technical interview in the same company during
the third month. You will be offered a stipend-based Internship if you
perform well in the interview.





*After Completion of the program, the student shall receive a :‚úÖ Program
completion certificate issued by IIT-ROORKEE Cognizance.‚úÖ The WIPRO Dice ID
verified the co-branded internship certificate.‚úÖ Letter of Recommendation
from the Company.‚úÖ Admittance to a growth community.*


  Bipin Shah
Key Account Manager,Teachnook

| teachnook.com
| bipin@teachnook.com

subject: Fwd: An Expert Session on "Time Management" for the students of CSPIT & DEPSTAR
snippet: Dear all, We are excited to invite you to an insightful seminar on "Time Management" organised by the Club "House of Innovation". This session is designed to equip you with
content:
Dear all,

We are excited to invite you to an insightful seminar on "*Time Management"*
organised by the Club "*House of Innovation"*. This session is designed to
equip you with practical tools and strategies to manage your time more
effectively, enhance productivity, and achieve your goals.

*Seminar Details:*

*Topic:* "Time Management: Master Your Day, Master Your Life"

¬∑        *Date:* 20th September 2024 (Friday)

¬∑        *Time:* 12:00 PM ‚Äì 02.00 PM

¬∑        *Speaker:* Mr. Mann Solanki, JCI & ISTD Chapter

¬∑        *Venue: *2nd Floor Seminar Hall, EC/EE Building

¬∑        *Target Audience:* Students of FTE, CHARUSAT

In today‚Äôs fast-paced world, effective time management is a crucial skill
that can help you balance academic responsibilities, extracurricular
activities, and personal growth. This seminar will provide actionable
insights to help you optimize your time and increase efficiency.


*How to Register:*

To reserve your spot, please click on the link to register:
https://forms.gle/BrC7TjeiHABzEJAV7


Seats are limited, so be sure to register soon!

All participants will receive an *e-certificate* as a token of their
participation and engagement.

If you have any questions, please feel free to contact us at *+91 70166
09343/+91 9913208633 or email us at **club.houseofinnovation@gmail.com*
<club.houseofinnovation@gmail.com>*.*

We look forward to seeing you there and helping you unlock the power of
time management!


Best regards,
*Club House of Innovation*

Dear Students,

We are excited to announce the Digital Logo Making Competition for the
students of CHARUSAT. This is a unique opportunity to showcase your
creativity and design skills while contributing to an important aspect of
our student governance body.

*Competition Details:*
*Theme : *Design a logo that represents the values, vision, and mission of
the University level Central Students Council(ULSC).
*Eligibility : *Open to all students of CHARUSAT.
*Submission Format :* Logo designs must be created digitally and submitted
in .PNG or .JPEG format (high resolution).
*Submission Deadline : 22th September, 2024*

   - *VISION: - *To build an inclusive student community that fosters
   academic excellence, cultural enrichment, leadership, and holistic
   development.
   - *VALUES: - *We value inclusivity, collaboration, and excellence in all
   endeavors. Leadership, integrity, innovation, and student well-being are at
   the core of our actions.
   - MISSION: - Our mission is to provide opportunities for students to
   grow academically, culturally, and personally, promote teamwork and
   leadership, and advocate for student needs to create a supportive
   university environment.

*Google Form: *https://forms.gle/VEQhCobuiNDhT7ri8
Submit your entries here

Further details have been shared in the document attached below.

We look forward to seeing your creative submissions!

Best regards,

*Convener*


*University Level Central Students Council*

*CHARUSAT.*

subject: Fwd: Logo Design Contest for SHAPHARI Certification Scheme ‚Äì reg.
snippet: Dear all, Greetings from MPEDA! MPEDA has initiated a certification scheme called SHAPHARI for hatcheries and aquaculture farms. 'SHAPHARI' is a Sanskrit word meaning superior quality fishery
content:
Dear all,


Greetings from MPEDA!


MPEDA has initiated a certification scheme called SHAPHARI for hatcheries
and aquaculture farms. ‚ÄòSHAPHARI‚Äô is a Sanskrit word meaning superior
quality fishery products suitable for human consumption. To promote
SHAPHARI certification among farmers and hatchery operators, and to raise
awareness about avoiding antibiotic abuse, MPEDA is hosting a Logo Design
Contest. The winning logo will be featured on SHAPHARI certificates, with a
prize of ‚Çπ10,000.


We encourage students to participate and submit their designs through the
link below by 03.10.2024. Please review the attached guidelines before
submission.

https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSe1WgYlXoPKivxOYdMnWvYhs_WweIj2as3shTTSLekDVgTh1w/viewform



Thank you,


With regards,


Neenu Peter

Deputy Director,

Aquaculture Section

Head Office

The Marine Products Export Development Authority

Govt. of India

Kochi - 36

Ph: +91 484 2311901





<https://amritmahotsav.nic.in/>



-- 

Charotar University of Science & Technology
Accredited Grade A+ by NAAC
Accorded with Centre of Excellence by Govt. of Gujarat
Web: www.charusat.ac.in

subject: Fwd: Workshop on Theory cum Practical Energy Conservation Awareness on September, 30 2024
snippet: Dear all, Greetings!! Devang Patel Institute of Advance Technology and Research (DEPSTAR), CHARUSAT in association with Gujarat Energy Development Agency (GEDA) is going to organize a workshop on
content:
Dear all,

Greetings!!

Devang Patel Institute of Advance Technology and Research (DEPSTAR),
CHARUSAT in association with Gujarat Energy Development Agency (GEDA) is
going to organize a workshop on "Theory cum Practical Energy Conservation
Awareness" on September, 30 2024 from 12:00 Noon to 3:00 PM.


Venue will be communicated to registered participants.

*The workshop will cover a range of topics, including:*

1. The importance of energy conservation.

2.  Practical techniques for energy conservation in various sectors.

3. Case studies and real-world examples.

4.  Interactive sessions and hands-on activities.



*The main objectives of this workshop are:*


   1. To raise awareness about the significance of energy conservation and
   its impact on the environment.
   2. To encourage individuals to adopt energy-conserving habits and
   behaviours.

The registration is open for all the interested students and staff members
|  Last date to register for participation through below-mentioned link is
September 26, 2024

Registration Link:  https://forms.gle/kHZehVh9DweT1Yjr6

We look forward to your participation and hope to see you at the workshop.
e-certificates will be provided to all the participants who register and
attend the entire session.

For additional information or query, please feel free to contact the
coordinators of the workshop:

   1. Ms. Neeta Chudasama (neetachudasama.dce@charusat.ac.in)
   2. Dr. Khushi Patel (khushipatel.ce@charusat.ac.in)

Thank you

--

subject: Expert Session on "Navigating New Beginnings: Bridging Life, Learning, Evaluation & Transition".
snippet: Dear All, Greetings!!! It gives us immense pleasure to announce that the Counselling Team of Devang Patel Institute of Advance Technology & Research (DEPSTAR) has organized an expert talk on "
content:
Dear All,

Greetings!!!

It gives us immense pleasure to announce that the Counselling Team of
Devang Patel Institute of Advance Technology & Research (DEPSTAR) has
organized  an expert talk on "Navigating New Beginnings: Bridging Life,
Learning, Evaluation & Transition" by  Dr. Heena Rachh.

This talk is organized to explore the principles of change management,
managing transitions, life beyond school, and integrating life objectives
into curriculum design for holistic student development.

It is mandatory for the students of first year CE, CSE and IT to attend it.

The schedule is as follows:
*Day and Date*: Friday - September 20, 2024
*Time*: 09:30 AM to 11:30 AM
*Location*: PDPIAS Auditorium
*Expert Name*: Dr. Heena Rachh
*Designation*: Passionate Educator and Thought Leader
*Affiliation of expert*: Founder & Director of Dr. Heena's Finishing School

For any queries, please feel free to contact Ms. Kinjal Gandhi and Ms.
Shital Sharma.
For your reference, a brochure is attached herewith.



-- 
*Thanks & Regards,*
*KINJAL GANDHI*
*Assistant Professor,*
*Department of Computer Engineering,*
*Devang Patel Institute of Advance Technology & Research (DEPSTAR),*
*Charotar University of Science & Technology (CHARUSAT),*
*At. & Post Changa-388421, Ta: Petlad, Dist: Anand, (Gujarat) India.*

--

subject: Steps to access WiFi Internet on laptop and computer labs
snippet: Dear New Students... To access wifi internet, please follow under mentioned steps: 1:- open URL http://egov.charusat (Open URL within campus only) 2:- Login with your egovernance ID and Password 3:-
content:
Dear New Students...

To access wifi internet, please follow under mentioned steps:

1:-   open URL http://egov.charusat  (Open URL within campus only)
2:-   Login with your egovernance ID and Password
3:-   Top left cornet (3 horizontal bar) go to settings
4:-   Select "Internet WiFi password change"
5:-   You may set a strong password for your internet access. With the help
of your student ID and Wi-Fi password, you can access the internet from
permitted computer labs and on your laptop. (WiFI on mobile is restricted)

To access WiFi from Laptop, connect to either CHARUSAT WiFi or WINCell SSID
with password "charusat"

You may also get a better idea with the attached video.

*Best Regards*


*Ritesh Bhatt *Head Datacenter, WIN-Cell
Charotar University of Science & Technology (CHARUSAT)
Accredited *Grade 'A+'* by NAAC

At. Changa 388 421, Ta. Petlad,
Dist. Anand
O: +912697-265106 / 07

subject: Batch Allocation for AICTE-Approved Advanced training and Internship Program
snippet: Dear Student of Charotar University of Science and Technology, We are pleased to inform you that you have been shortlisted for the AICTE-approved Internship Program offered in collaboration with
content:
Dear Student of* Charotar University of Science and Technology*,

We are pleased to inform you that you have been *shortlisted* for the
AICTE-approved Internship Program offered in collaboration with
Cognizance, *IIT
Roorkee*. This opportunity is for the *October-November Batch*, and we
encourage you to secure your spot as soon as possible, as this is the
*First** batch allocated for your university*.

*Program Overview*
The program is a comprehensive *2-month Training + Internship* designed to
provide hands-on experience and professional mentorship. It is open to all
departments, though availability is limited.

*Application Deadline: 19/09/2024, till 11.59 PM (Final 20 Slots Remaining)*
*Click here to apply* <https://forms.gle/g9FSBC8THfCWzQW37>

*Program Structure*

   -

   *First Month:*
   Training includes live lectures and mentorship from industry
   professionals. Upon registration, you will receive login credentials to
   access the learning platform.
   - *Project 1:* Complete 10 individual projects under the supervision of
      your mentor.
   -

   *Second Month:*
   A fully mentored internship focusing on real-world projects with
   guidance from professionals:
   - *Project 2:* Engage in a Capstone Group Project with specific roles
      assigned to each intern.

*Program Benefits*

   - Certificate of Completion verified by DICE ID powered by WIPRO and *IIT
   Roorkee Cognizance*.
   - Internship Certificate from top MNCs with *Wipro Dice ID verification*.
   - 6-month access to the *Learning Management System (LMS)*.
   - Membership to the *Growth Community* with placement assistance.
   - 24/7 personalized mentorship.
   - Complimentary sessions on *Generative AI & Prompt Engineering*.
   - Guidance on *Low Code & No Code applications*.
   - Live doubt-clearing sessions with industry experts.
   - Guest lectures featuring professionals from *Microsoft & Meta*.

To secure your participation in this prestigious program, kindly complete
the *application form* at your earliest convenience.

*Apply Now* <https://forms.gle/g9FSBC8THfCWzQW37> ‚Äì *Last 20 slots
available!*

Please note: *If you have already enrolled, you may disregard this email.*

We look forward to your participation in this exciting opportunity.

Warm regards,
*Teachnook*
In Collaboration with *IIT Roorkee Cognizance*

subject: Tips for using your new inbox
snippet: Welcome to your inbox Find emails fast With the power of Google Search in your inbox, you can archive all your email and find it later in a flash. Your inbox stays tidy, and you never need to worry
content:
Tips for using your new inbox
[image: Gmail]

Welcome to your inbox
[image: Search]
Find emails fast
With the power of Google Search in your inbox, you can archive
<https://support.google.com/mail/answer/6576?hl=en&utm_source=gmailwelcomeemail&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=gmailwelcome>
all your email and find it
<https://support.google.com/mail/answer/6593?hl=en&utm_source=gmailwelcomeemail&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=gmailwelcome>
later in a flash. Your inbox stays tidy, and you never need to worry about
what to keep.
[image: Personalize]
Personalize Mail Server for Student of CHARUSAT Mail
Customize inbox backgrounds, email signatures, and other options in Mail
Server for Student of CHARUSAT Mail settings
<https://support.google.com/mail/answer/6562?hl=en&utm_source=gmailwelcomeemail&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=gmailwelcome>.
Review and adjust your privacy and security settings at My Account
<https://myaccount.google.com/>.
[image: Organize]
Organize your email
You can organize email with labels
<https://support.google.com/mail/answer/118708?hl=en&utm_source=gmailwelcomeemail&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=gmailwelcome>,
which are like folders, but you can add more than one label to a message.
You can also use filters
<https://support.google.com/mail/answer/6579?hl=en&utm_source=gmailwelcomeemail&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=gmailwelcome>
to automatically sort and categorize messages as they come in.
[image: Social]
Chat and meet directly from your inbox
Message with contacts in Google Chat
<https://support.google.com/chat/answer/9341104?hl=en&utm_source=gmailwelcomeemail&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=gmailwelcome>
and start video meetings with up to 100 people in Google Meet
<https://support.google.com/mail/answer/9822902?hl=en&utm_source=gmailwelcomeemail&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=gmailwelcome>
all without leaving Gmail.

Get training and tips
Find Gmail guides, tips, cheat sheets, help switching from Microsoft¬Æ
Outlook¬Æ, and more at the Google Workspace Learning Center
<https://support.google.com/a/users/answer/9259748?hl=en&utm_source=gmailwelcomeemail&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=gmailwelcome>
.
Visit the Learning Center
<https://support.google.com/a/users/answer/9259748?hl=en&utm_source=gmailwelcomeemail&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=gmailwelcome>

Happy emailing,
The Gmail Team
[image: Google Cloud]

¬© 2024 Google LLC 1600 Amphitheatre Parkway, Mountain View, CA 94043

about important changes to your Google Cloud product or account.*
